SAP S/4 HANA Experience or training in SAP Cloud Platform, and Cloud Platform Integration Experience in Cloud integrations required with preferably Cloud Foundry, AWS EC2, Beanstalk SAP S/4HANA & Cloud Appliance Library Cloud-based Architecture Basis administration

title: Especialista Tecnologia
description:
Resumo da vaga: Responsável em propor soluções de melhorias nos processos industriais, através da utilização de tecnologias de automação de processos voltados a Indústria 4.0 bem como de tecnologias de Cloud, visando eficiência, redução de tempo e desperdícios de material em conformidade com as normas e procedimentos estabelecidos.

Requisitos: Graduação completa: Engenharia Eletrônica, Engenharia Automação, Engenharia da Computação, Ciências da Computação e Sistemas de Informação; Conhecimento em Cloud AWS e Banco de dados SQL; Linguagem Python ou Java Script; Desejável conhecimento em SAP; Desejável Power BI e SQL.

Atividades: Identificar as oportunidades de melhoria nos processos digitais da área Industrial; Mapear e validar as oportunidades que serão trabalhadas, entendendo os principais impactados do processo e identificando ações necessárias na proposta de melhoria; Elaborar junto com o cliente propostas de solução em melhorias processuais, analisando as tecnologias habilitadoras da indústria 4.0 pertinentes em cada item; Construir protótipo de solução por meio digital, construindo em sistema simulações que permitam a avaliação da melhoria tecnológica proposta; Prospectar fornecedores que possam atender as especificações técnicas estabelecidas para cada desenvolvimento de protótipo; Criar um ambiente de desenvolvimento de projetos que se conecte entre os diversos projetos, possibilitando assim o ganho em escala; Analisar e apresentar os ganhos estimados por projeto através da mensuração de tempo, processos envolvidos e tecnologias; Acompanhar junto aos fornecedores e área cliente a execução de projetos aprovados garantindo as especificações aprovadas.

title: Bio-Economy Experts - EIB Framework Contract EIBAS LOT 6
description:
NTU International A/S, leading a strong international consortium, is proud to have been awarded the next 4 years of EIBAS FWC Lot 6!

We are building up a pool of experts who will be interested in short term assignments on the various EIB priorities under this framework contract.

Keep updated and follow us at

for more information on our projects.

Position : Bio-economy Expert Location : Inside and outside EU-27 Assignment duration:

48 months Project budget:

10M EUR

Qualifications and skills: · At least 10 years professional experience in the field. · Experience working with EU, EIB, WB etc. financed projects. · A Master’s Degree or Bachelor's Degree relevant to the topic

Specific professional experience within at least one of the following sectors: Natural resources and natural capital management: · Management and reclamation of land, water, and biosphere resources, including projects addressing land degradation, natural ecosystems and forests, nature-based solutions, natural capital and ecosystem restoration, soil salinity, nonpoint source pollution or promoting sustainable land and/or water management practices or sustainable forest management, including afforestation and reforestation.

Rural infrastructure, equipment, machinery, and input supply: · Rural roads, rural markets, irrigation, drainage, water storage, field machinery and equipment as well as projects related to input supply including seeds and fertilisers.

Primary production and biomass: · Primary production and biomass from agriculture, forestry, fisheries, and aquaculture. This includes sub-sectors such as perennial crops, annual crops, livestock rearing, forestry production including for feeding biomass for related industries.

Food and biomass material manufacturing: · Agro-processing (e.g., nuts or vegetable processing and packing), biomass transformation (e.g., dairy processing), and biomass utilisation for energy or materials production (e.g. use of wood residues as biofuel or to produce plywood) and the pulp and paper and other forest industries.

Transport and storage: · Storages facilities such as warehouses and silos including port silos to improve transport facilities, food/grain conservation and reduce losses. In addition, services will also be related to systems designed around this infrastructure, like warehouse receipt systems to improve access to finance for agricultural producers.

Improve access to rural finance: · Support to counterparty banks and financial intermediaries to improve their knowledge and capacity to design products better suited to clients in the primary agriculture, forestry, fisheries and associated agro-processing sub-sectors through institutional and capacity building activities, enhancement of risk management systems or support in the appraisal and monitoring of loans. · Lastly, it may also include value chain analysis and market studies to tailor financial products.

Language skills: · Excellent command of English (CEFR C1) (Minimum requirement

If you are interested in this position, please apply, and upload your CV. Please also make sure that you include one or more telephone numbers.

The work location is Remote.

Only selected candidates will be contacted.

title: Senior Devops Engineer (South America)
description:
Fully Remote Contract Position for Devops Engineers in Europe or South America.

Saturn Cloud is building an AI engineering platform for the next 100 million developers and data scientists. We enable everyone from hobbyists to Fortune 1000 to launch easily-configurable cloud notebooks with GPUs, jobs, deployments and a lot more. . Experience working with Kubernetes. Experience working with Terraform and Helm Experience with Engineering best practices.

Code quality, maintainability, and test-ability are very important to us.

title: Machine Learning Engineer | Sponsor US H1B
description:
Project Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled and versatile Machine Learning and Data Engineer to join our team. This role involves developing sophisticated image-based solutions for plant phenotyping and pulling, stitching, and wrangling data from various sources for advanced analytics. The successful candidate will work on a cross-functional team, collaborating closely with crop scientists, plant pathologists, cloud engineers, and data scientists to enable access to relevant data and deploy machine-learning models and solutions.

Responsibilities: Develop and implement image-based solutions for quantifying various traits and features of plants. Pull data from first and third-party sources, prepare it for analysis by filtering, tagging, joining, parsing, and normalizing datasets. Collaborate with team members to research data sources, design and deploy data loaders, and ensure the availability of data for analytical activities. Provide technical expertise in the design and implementation of data management and architecture solutions. Develop, evolve, and implement concepts of data ops in partnership with cloud and ML engineers. Architect, develop, deliver, and support ML products and solutions, ensuring successful deployment into production. Automate model training, testing, and deployment processes. Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines and ETL processes.

Requirements: Master’s degree or higher in Data Science, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Robotics, Physics, Mathematics, or related fields. Deep understanding and experience with Image Theory, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Python Programming, TensorFlow, or PyTorch. Strong experience in designing and implementing large-scale data processing, analysis, and exploration solutions. Proficiency in R, Python, advanced SQL skills, and a good understanding of data management principles. Experience with cloud technologies (Azure or GCP preferred) and deploying CI/CD pipelines. Knowledge of Git, PySpark, Data Bricks, and database management (SQL/PLSQL/Snowflake preferred). Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently and collaborate across teams. 2+ years of industry or academia experience in image processing, computer vision, or related fields.

Work Details: Location: Remote, candidates must work in the PST time zone. Work Hours: 40 hours per week. We sponsor US work visa after 1 year of service

title: SAP Data Migration Lead Consultant
description:
ABOUT US Syniti

is

the

enterprise data partner, empowering anyone who relies on data to make business-critical decisions by delivering data they can trust through a unique combination of intelligent software and experts who deeply understand the role of data in enterprise growth.

Trusted by the Fortune 2000, Syniti helps leading businesses reconfigure the role of enterprise data from afterthought to foundational first step; enabling them to unlock valuable insights that ignite growth, reduce risk, and expand their competitive advantage.

Syniti’s

Data First

philosophy and enterprise data management platform supports data migration, data quality, data replication, data matching, master data management, analytics, data governance, and data strategy in a single, unified solution.

As an innovative, global leader in Enterprise Data Management, the combination of our award-winning software platform and premier consultants creates a unique advantage for leading enterprises. Syniti is also a preferred data solution used by the

world’s top system integrators .

Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with offices in 25 countries around the world, Syniti operates in all global regions and industry verticals, and maintains a 100% client success rate across thousands of complex data projects and initiatives.

The ROLE We are recruiting talented and motivated individuals to join our team delivering data projects for clients across the globe. As a lead data migration consultant at Syniti, you will be responsible for managing a team of migration consultants on all aspects of data work for a process area/workstream. You will work closely with functional consultants and key customer resources, gathering requirements through workshops, building conversion objects, and driving your team’s value through all data project phases. You will be responsible for making sure that your team uses your data skills and the Syniti data management platform to assess and iterate through design, build, and deployment, ensuring that the highest customer value is derived from your assigned objects. As a lead member of a Syniti Data Migration team, you will execute against the best practices for successful business transformation and become skilled in the strongest platform to meet all of our customer’s needs.

WHAT YOU WILL DO After an initial training period, a Lead Data Migration Consultant will be expected to:

Demonstrate a strong understanding of Syniti’s Data Migration methodology. Demonstrate strong proficiency in Syniti’s tools, working to prescribed development standards. Good understanding of business processes for one or more assigned functional area, and the ability to quickly learn about new areas. Effectively manage a small team of data migration consultants, to meet assigned responsibilities against the overall project plan. Demonstrate a strong knowledge of underlying technical data structures and definitions of assigned functional process area. Develop data migration rules and reports in the Syniti’s tools as per supplied specification. Evaluate and contribute to ongoing data migration design for assigned process area through data analysis, reporting and collaboration with on-site Syniti and client colleagues. Create and maintain data load programs. Maintain related documentation and clearly communicate status to Syniti Team Leadership and customer PMO. Execution of end-to-end data loads and reconciliations. Support and mentor junior colleagues.

WHAT IT TAKES Degree level qualification in Computer Science (or other technology related field). Experience in ETL / Data Migration / Data Quality / Data Analysis. Experience managing resources to deliver a collective goal/responsibility. Functional ERP experience. Project experience across multiple ERP implementations. Database experience - SQL Server, Oracle etc. Customer facing skills. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Willingness to travel according to project requirements up to 100%.

WHAT WE OFFER Autonomy and Trust:

Trust that you are proficient at what you do. At Syniti, you will find a supportive environment and access to learning tools, with minimal micromanagement. Growth Opportunities:

We are growing rapidly, offering you the chance to grow with us, shape our journey, and share in our success story. Collaborative Support:

We value collaboration and support each other, ensuring you won't stand alone in your endeavors. Diversity of Stories:

Genuine interest in your unique story and journey. We celebrate individual achievements and want to hear everyone's story. Recognition:

We appreciate and celebrate individual achievements, acknowledging the contribution of each team member. Open Organization:

We embrace an open and inclusive culture, where hierarchies are minimized, and access is ensured across the board. Everyone is valued, and ideas are welcomed.

title: Manager, Corporate Development
description:
Manager, Corporate Development

Easy Payroll Global Limited Ireland and their local affiliate ITOS Brasil LTDA is looking to hire a Manager, Corporate Development, to provide services to companies within the Perseus Group (“Perseus”).

Perseus is an Operating Group of Constellation Software Inc. (csisoftware.com | TSX:CSU), a Canadian-based publicly held company. Perseus has over 6,000 employees, across 70+ software business units, operating in 12+ software industry verticals, and located in over 40 offices.

Location:

Brazil

The Role: The services to be provided by the Manager, Corporate Development, encompasses building strong strategic business relationships that lead to the sourcing of current and future M&A opportunities for Perseus. These relationships will be formed with software company decision makers (e.g. CEOs, VPs of Corporate Development, founders, and/or owners) of software companies, M&A advisors, and private equity/ venture capital professionals. Success in this role is defined by building and maintaining meaningful relationships that ultimately lead to Perseus’ acquisition of software companies.

The process of initiating relationships, maintaining relationships, and ultimately making an acquisition typically takes multiple years. Measurable outcomes, continuous value-add through many M&A conversations/ relationships, and high-quality market research are what ultimately generate successful acquisitions through time.

Outcomes: Develop and manage an M&A pipeline through Salesforce CRM and create market maps to build strong relationships in assigned software industry vertical(s). Meet and exceed monthly M&A targets, such as meaningful contacts and other measurable M&A sourcing KPIs. Work both autonomously and with M&A leadership to qualify M&A opportunities with efficiency. Ensure the lead database is allocated accurately within portfolio verticals. Effectively qualify opportunities at the top-end of the acquisition funnel to maintain focus for the Portfolio Managers of the business units.

Relevant Experience & Competencies: At least 3+ years of experience in a Business Development/Sales position at a software company or client-facing M&A/finance role within business development, sales, and/or account management. Preference for experience in outbound-focused origination roles. A clear interest in developing a long-term pipeline of meaningful relationships with prospects as a career trajectory within software investing. Previous high-performance in Business Development, winning in an autonomous role, or prior success in other walks of life outside professional BD experience, such as entrepreneurship, will be considered. Advanced verbal and written communication skills, with the confidence and executive presence to speak with CEOs, M&A advisors, corporate development, private equity and venture capital professionals. Organized, detail-oriented, and able to work variable hours. Extraordinary work ethic, proactive with a sense of urgency.

Other Requirements: This role will require occasional in-person travel, which may include Canada, the U.S., Mexico, Colombia, Chile, and/or Peru, and can be primarily performed remotely.

title: Analista de Suporte PL - Especialista Dynatrace
description:
Descrição da vaga Na Stefanini, acreditamos no poder da colaboração. Co-criamos soluções inovadoras em parceria com nossos clientes, combinando tecnologia de ponta, inteligência artificial e a criatividade humana. Estamos na vanguarda da resolução de problemas de negócios, proporcionando impacto real em escala global.

Ao se juntar à Stefanini, você se torna parte de uma jornada global de transformação. Estamos empenhados em criar impacto positivo não apenas nos negócios, mas também na vida de nossos colaboradores. Se você procura uma oportunidade de crescimento profissional em uma empresa que valoriza inovação, respeito, autonomia e parceria, você encontra aqui!

Junte-se a nós e seja parte da mudança!

Responsabilidades e atribuições O que esperamos que você realize: Acompanhamento de ocorrência de alarmes de TI; Filtragem de alarmes para determinar eventos críticos; Execução de respostas pré-configuradas de tratamento; Correlação e encerramento de alarmes; Registro e acompanhamento (follow-up) de incidentes de TI.

title: Digital Advertising - PPC Specialist
description:
About this Role

Location: Remote (Brazil)

United World Telecom (est. 1996) offers cloud communication solutions to help businesses around the world communicate with their customers. We have a global and diverse team and over 8,000 customers worldwide.

We’re growing our marketing team and are looking for a Digital Advertising - PPC Specialist with strong technical analytics skills to manage, run, and monitor ad campaigns. An ideal candidate must have proven experience in tracking and managing paid advertisement budgets, ensuring the best returns on the campaigns. They must reside in

Brazil

and work alongside the digital marketing team to create strategic PPC campaigns that drive performance and deliver results.

PPC Responsibilities

Manage and Optimize Campaigns

Manage, monitor, optimize, plan, and create PPC campaigns across channels such as Google Ads, Bing Ads, and social media. Research and analyze data to identify the most effective keywords (add relevant keywords and negative keywords) and strategies for our PPC campaigns. Conduct competitors analysis to identify new opportunities and improve our PPC campaigns. Optimize bidding at keyword, placement, device, geographic, demographic, and other levels. With the help of our in-house content team, write engaging and concise copy to modify ads to boost click-through rates and landing pages to boost conversion rates.

Conversion Tracking Implementation and Troubleshooting

Audit, implement, and maintain accurate conversion tracking across all paid campaigns (Google Ads, Facebook, , etc.). Set up custom conversion events and parameters to align with account goals and ensure accurate reporting.

Google Tag Manager Expertise

Build and manage GTM containers to deploy tags, triggers, and variables for tracking user interactions (e.g., form submissions, button clicks, scroll depth). Debug and troubleshoot tag firing issues using tools like Google Tag Assistant and GTM preview/debug mode. Optimize GTM setup for scalability and ensure proper data layer implementation.

GA4 Setup and Optimization

Configure GA4 properties, events, and goals in line with campaign KPIs. Troubleshoot discrepancies between GA4, Google Ads, and other platforms to ensure consistent data reporting. Implement enhanced measurement events and custom dimensions/metrics as needed.

Data Accuracy and Reporting

Conduct regular audits of conversion tracking, tags, and analytics accounts to ensure data integrity. Resolve tracking issues (e.g., broken tags, missing events, attribution gaps) swiftly and effectively.

Collaboration and Communication

Work closely with developers to ensure accurate data layer implementation and troubleshoot complex tracking issues. Provide actionable recommendations to improve the quality of conversion data and its alignment with business goals.

Monitoring & Reporting

Perform daily account monitoring and management of PPC campaigns: Review expensive under-performing keywords, ensure PPC campaign does not exceed weekly and monthly ad spend budget, and maintain Quality Score, impression share, and other important metrics. Document and update processes and changes in the internal document server. Send daily & weekly reports to the marketing team.

Requirements / Skills

:

Proven experience as a PPC Specialist or similar role, with a solid understanding of PPC advertising principles and best practices across various platforms. 5-10 years PPC experience in SaaS and telecom industries with B2B emphasis is preferred but not required. Proven experience with Google Ads and Bing Ads; Facebook ads and

ads experience would be an added bonus. Advanced Proficiency in Google Tag Manager: Experience setting up and managing complex GTM implementations, including custom HTML/JavaScript tags and data layer dependencies. Expertise in Google Analytics 4 (GA4): Proven track record of configuring GA4 properties, events, and reports for detailed campaign tracking and attribution analysis. Strong Knowledge of Conversion Tracking: Hands-on experience implementing and troubleshooting tracking setups for platforms like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and

Ads. Debugging and Problem-Solving: Familiarity with debugging tools such as Google Tag Assistant, GTM Debug Mode, Chrome DevTools, and server-side tracking setups. Ability to integrate tracking systems with CRM platforms, marketing automation tools, or custom APIs is preferred but not required. Basic understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and website architecture to collaborate effectively with developers and resolve tracking issues. Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously. Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with other team members. Google Ads and Bing Ads certifications within the last 6 to 12 months are a plus. Must be located in

Brazi .

Schedule

: 40 hours a week

Benefits

:

Paid time off Growth opportunities Work with a global team

Compensation

: Will be based on the candidate's experience, earnings in previous jobs, and the local job market.

To apply, email your resume and cover letter to

: Meryl D’Sa-Wilson, Digital Marketing Manager:

title: Business Development Manager – South America
description:
Somos

Phosphea , una empresa global especializada en la fabricación de macrominerales para la nutrición animal. Contamos con más de 40 años de experiencia ofreciendo soluciones competitivas e innovadoras para el sector de nutrición animal a través de una presencia mundial.

Pertenecemos al Groupe Roullier , que está presente en todos los continentes, con representación comercial en varios países y más de 8,500 colaboradores.

Si te apasiona la innovación y los desafíos, tenemos una oportunidad para que te unas a nuestro equipo como

Business Development Manager - América del Sur.

PRINCIPALES RESPONSABILIDADES:

Recopilar y analizar información de mercado (competencia, clientes potenciales, monitoreo regulatorio, etc.). Prospectar y desarrollar la cartera de clientes del sector de alimentación animal (integradores, fábricas de piensos, fabricantes de premezclas, etc.). Fidelizar a los clientes, estableciendo una relación privilegiada con ellos a través de la realización de visitas comerciales regulares: el 50% de tu tiempo será destinado a las visitas a clientes. Elaborar y negociar contratos comerciales para optimizar los resultados (precios, márgenes, volúmenes y cuota de mercado). Seguimiento de los contratos comerciales, monitoreando la satisfacción y necesidades de los clientes. Garantizar el correcto procesamiento de los pedidos de los clientes, logística y pagos. Gestionar el P&L de tu área. Proporcionar asesoramiento técnico y soporte personalizado.

REQUISITOS:

Formación en Nutrición Animal, Zootecnia, Medicina Veterinaria, Agronomía o áreas relacionadas. Mínimo 2 años de experiencia en ventas de ingredientes especiales para piensos animales. Español Avanzado o Nativo. Inglés Intermedio. Orientado a negocios y resultados. Fuerte espíritu emprendedor. Personalidad abierta, orientada al trabajo en equipo y dinámica. Excelentes habilidades de negociación y comunicación. Autonomía y mentalidad intercultural. Responsable, abierto y transparente. Disponibilidad para viajes de negocios frecuentes. Disponibilidad para residir en Curitiba.

title: Profissional Back End – .NET Core SR
description:
Código da vaga: 44051

Sobre a BRQ Digital

Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.

Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.

BRQ WAY

No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!

É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.

Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.

Ei #fera em desenvolvimento, estamos ampliando nossa operação na América do Norte, precisamos de você!

- O que procuramos?

Buscamos um(a) #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!

- O que você deve ter?

Experiência sólida com .NET Core, conhecimentos avançados em AWS (incluindo servidores, bancos de dados e serviços de rede). Experiência com bancos de dados relacionais e não relacionais (...).

- Diferenciais:

Experiência com Front End, usando ReactJS. Experiência com metodologias ágeis, como Scrum ou Kanban, certificações em AWS ou .NET. Familiaridade com ferramentas de CI/CD para automação de processos de desenvolvimento. Familiaridade com processamento em fila, container e ferramenta de cache.

- O que temos pra te oferecer?

Mais do que um plano de carreira !

A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:

Carreira técnica:

Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!

Carreira de Liderança:

Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.

Experiência internacional:

Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.

Empreendedorismo:

De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.

- E os benefícios?

Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Home Office; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!

- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?

Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions

Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

based on

maintenance guideline decks

VoIP (3cx), Slack, and Gmail

for communication. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

title: AI Platform Engineer
description:
We are looking for an

AI Platform Engineer

to lead the adoption, integration, and operationalization of AI tooling across our organization. This role will focus on enabling teams to work more efficiently by implementing AI-powered solutions, best practices, and MLOps strategies. The ideal candidate has

proven experience working with engineering and technology companies to drive AI adoption across engineering, sales, and marketing , ensuring AI initiatives deliver measurable impact and efficiency gains.

This role requires a combination of

technical expertise

in AI/ML infrastructure,

strategic thinking

to identify high-value AI opportunities, and

cross-functional collaboration

to help teams seamlessly integrate AI into their workflows. The AI Platform Engineer will play a key role in

automating processes, optimizing team operations, and ensuring AI solutions align with business goals .

Key Responsibilities:

AI Tooling & Infrastructure:

Design, implement, and scale AI/ML tooling that improves team efficiency, streamlines workflows, and enhances automation. MLOps Best Practices:

Help engineering teams implement effective MLOps processes, including model deployment, monitoring, and lifecycle management. Cross-Team Collaboration:

Work closely with software engineering, data science, and operations teams to integrate AI capabilities into their workflows. AI Adoption & Enablement:

Drive organization-wide adoption of AI by identifying key pain points, providing education, and ensuring seamless integration of AI solutions. Automation & Efficiency:

Develop AI-powered automation solutions to reduce manual work, improve productivity, and optimize team operations. Scalability & Performance:

Ensure AI infrastructure and workflows are scalable, resilient, and efficient to support company-wide initiatives. Security & Compliance:

Implement AI governance, security best practices, and compliance measures to align with organizational and regulatory standards. Monitoring & Evaluation:

Establish metrics and feedback loops to measure the impact of AI tooling on team efficiencies and continuously improve processes.

Qualifications:

Technical Expertise:

5+ years of experience in software engineering, MLOps, or AI infrastructure roles. Strong programming skills in Python, Go, or another relevant language. Experience with AI/ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face. Proficiency in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and AI/ML services. Hands-on experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and orchestration tools. Familiarity with AI observability, monitoring, and governance tools. Strong understanding of CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code (Terraform, Pulumi), and automation best practices.

MLOps & AI Operations:

Experience implementing MLOps pipelines for model training, deployment, and monitoring. Familiarity with vector databases, feature stores, and AI-powered search. Knowledge of distributed computing and optimizing AI workloads for efficiency. Soft Skills & Adoption Focus: Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills to identify high-impact AI solutions. Ability to work cross-functionally and communicate effectively with non-technical stakeholders. title: Analista de Modelagem Hidráulica Pleno
description:
A Aegea Criada em 2010, a Aegea é líder no setor privado de saneamento básico no Brasil. Em cada município onde atua, leva mais saúde e qualidade de vida para a população, respeitando sempre o meio ambiente e a cultura local.

Programa Respeito dá o Tom O programa nasceu com a meta de espelhar a demografia da população brasileira no quadro de funcionários da empresa. Em 2022 a Aegea emitiu um título sustentável atrelado a metas que incluem alcançar 45% de mulheres e 27% de negros em cargos de liderança até 2030, sendo pioneira em se comprometer com meta de diversidade racial em cargos de liderança.

A Aegea tem o compromisso com a promoção de um ambiente de trabalho mais igualitário, diverso e inclusivo, e estimula o respeito e a valorização das diferenças. Aqui, todos os candidatos qualificados serão considerados no processo seletivo, independentemente de raça, gênero, orientação sexual, religião, naturalidade, nacionalidade, deficiência, idade ou outras características. Responsabilidades e atribuições

Apoiar na análise e modelagem hidráulica de sistemas de abastecimento de água e esgotamento sanitário Realizar a análise crítica de dados, como medições de vazão e pressão, propondo melhorias nos processos e avaliando riscos Participar de estudos de viabilidade técnica e econômica em projetos de infraestrutura para saneamento básico Colaborar na elaboração de documentação técnica e validar estudos realizados por terceiros Apoiar a implementação de sistemas de monitoramento e controle para otimização do desempenho de redes de água e esgoto Interpretar normas e regulamentações, assegurando conformidade em projetos e operações Contribuir em reuniões técnicas, interagindo com equipes diversas e participando de discussões para a solução de problemas

Requisitos e qualificações

Superior completo em Engenharia Civil, Sanitária, Ambiental, Tecnólogo em Hidráulica e Saneamento, Gestão Ambiental ou áreas correlatas Vivência em modelagem hidráulica, utilizando softwares como Watercad, Sewercad, Bentley ou Epanet, entre outros Conhecimento intermediário/avançado em Excel, com foco em construção e análise de dados Conhecimento básico em GIS Disponibilidade para viagens pontuais em todas as unidades da Aegea

Informações adicionais

Assistência médica; Assistência odontológica; Zenklub (atendimento direcionado à saúde mental e nutricional); Serviço de assistência gratuito (social, jurídico e financeiro); Seguro de vida; Vale transporte; Gympass; Vale alimentação e/ou refeição; Participação nos Lucros e Resultados; Kit office.

title: Machine Learning Engineer | Sponsor US H1B
description:
Project Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled and versatile Machine Learning and Data Engineer to join our team. This role involves developing sophisticated image-based solutions for plant phenotyping and pulling, stitching, and wrangling data from various sources for advanced analytics. The successful candidate will work on a cross-functional team, collaborating closely with crop scientists, plant pathologists, cloud engineers, and data scientists to enable access to relevant data and deploy machine-learning models and solutions.

Responsibilities: Develop and implement image-based solutions for quantifying various traits and features of plants. Pull data from first and third-party sources, prepare it for analysis by filtering, tagging, joining, parsing, and normalizing datasets. Collaborate with team members to research data sources, design and deploy data loaders, and ensure the availability of data for analytical activities. Provide technical expertise in the design and implementation of data management and architecture solutions. Develop, evolve, and implement concepts of data ops in partnership with cloud and ML engineers. Architect, develop, deliver, and support ML products and solutions, ensuring successful deployment into production. Automate model training, testing, and deployment processes. Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines and ETL processes.

Requirements: Master’s degree or higher in Data Science, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Robotics, Physics, Mathematics, or related fields. Deep understanding and experience with Image Theory, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Python Programming, TensorFlow, or PyTorch. Strong experience in designing and implementing large-scale data processing, analysis, and exploration solutions. Proficiency in R, Python, advanced SQL skills, and a good understanding of data management principles. Experience with cloud technologies (Azure or GCP preferred) and deploying CI/CD pipelines. Knowledge of Git, PySpark, Data Bricks, and database management (SQL/PLSQL/Snowflake preferred). Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently and collaborate across teams. 2+ years of industry or academia experience in image processing, computer vision, or related fields.

Work Details: Location: Remote, candidates must work in the PST time zone. Work Hours: 40 hours per week. We sponsor US work visa after 1 year of service

title: Consultor de Prospecção
description:
Na ADP somos movidos pelo seu sucesso. Envolvemos seus talentos e perspectivas únicos. Congratulamo-nos com suas ideias sobre como fazer as coisas de forma diferente e melhor. Em seus esforços para alcançar, aprender e crescer, apoiamos você todo o caminho. Se o sucesso te motiva, você pertence ao ADP.

Nós nos esforçamos para que todas as interações sejam conduzidas por nossos valores CORE: Perícia perspicaz, integridade é tudo, excelência em serviços, inovação inspiradora, cada pessoa conta, orientada por resultados e responsabilidade social.

Nossa cultura acolhe diversas perspectivas e cria um lugar onde as carreiras podem florescer.

Nós respeitamos e valorizamos as diferenças com oportunidades iguais de emprego, independentemente de raça, religião, gênero, orientação sexual, idade, cultura, deficiência ou status social.

Todas as nossas vagas respeitam esse compromisso. Faça parte do nosso time!!!

RESUMO DA POSIÇÃO

Você é uma pessoa altamente motivada e orientada para resultados, com paixão por vendas? Estamos em busca de um talentoso Representante de Desenvolvimento de Vendas para se juntar à nossa dinâmica equipe baseada no Brasil. Como parte integrante de nossa força de vendas, você desempenhará um papel crucial no impulsionamento do crescimento da receita e na expansão de nossa base de clientes.

RESPONSABILIDADES

Prospectar e qualificar leads: Utilizar diversos canais e técnicas para identificar potenciais clientes, gerar leads e qualificá-los com base em critérios definidos. Você será responsável por construir um pipeline robusto de prospects qualificados

Realizar abordagens e engajar os prospects: Entrar em contato com potenciais clientes por meio de várias plataformas de comunicação, incluindo ligações telefônicas, e-mails e redes sociais. Seu objetivo é criar conversas significativas, compreender suas necessidades e cativar o potencial cliente para conhecer nossas soluções

Agendar e coordenar reuniões: Colaborar com a equipe de vendas para agendar compromissos e demonstrações com prospects qualificados. Garantir uma coordenação perfeita e fornecer as informações necessárias a todas as partes envolvidas para otimizar o processo de vendas

Gerenciamento da carteira de leads: Acompanhar e documentar todas as interações, progressos e resultados em nosso sistema de CRM (salesforce). Manter registros precisos e atualizados de leads, oportunidades e informações de clientes

Colaborar com a equipe de vendas: Trabalhar em estreita colaboração com nossos executivos de vendas para elaborar e implementar abordagens de vendas eficazes. Fornecer informações valiosas e feedback obtidos por meio de interações com prospects para melhorar continuamente nossas estratégias de vendas

REQUISITOS

Educação superior completa

Nível avançado de inglês (escrito e verbal

Experiência comprovada em desenvolvimento de vendas, geração de leads ou função similar (desejável)

Excelentes habilidades de comunicação e interpessoais, com capacidade para estabelecer rapport e envolver os prospects de forma eficaz

Habilidades de resolução de problemas e capacidade de pensar criativamente para superar objeções e desafios

Familiaridade com sistemas de CRM e outras ferramentas de vendas

Automotivação e capacidade para trabalhar de forma independente, ao mesmo tempo em que é um membro colaborativo da equipe

O modelo de trabalho adotado pela ADP é office based/presencial, com a possibilidade de trabalho em home-office por até duas vezes na semana

“Considerando que as atividades desempenhadas pelos ocupantes deste cargo envolvem acesso a informações altamente confidenciais e sensíveis de clientes da ADP e de seus respectivos empregados, a ADP reserva-se o direito de conduzir checagem de histórico, de tempos em tempos, conforme autoriza o Incidente de Recurso de Revista Repetitivo nº 01 do Tribunal Superior do Trabalho, mediante consentimento do candidato/trabalhador.”

Buscamos constantemente criar maneiras melhores de se trabalhar para que você alcance o seu potencial máximo. Seguidamente nomeada como uma das ‘Empresas mais admiradas’ pela revista FORTUNE® e reconhecida pela DiversityInc® como uma das ‘Principais 50 empresas com foco em diversidade’, a ADP trabalha com mais de 740.000 organizações no mundo inteiro para ajudar pessoas a trabalhar de maneira mais inteligente, embarcar em novos desafios e alavancar seus talentos. “Always Designing for People” significa que estamos criando plataformas que transformarão a forma de se trabalhar e juntos vamos descobrir um mundo de oportunidades.

title: Android Developer
description:

Competencies in software development, architecture, configuration management, integration, and validation for Realtime, embedded, concurrent applications in the automotive field.

title: Estágio em Desenvolvimento de Software
description:
Aqui na Nelogica, desenvolvemos tecnologias e pessoas de alta performance com o propósito de transformar o futuro do mercado financeiro!

Você tem sede de desafios e está a fim de fazer parte de um time que busca a excelência, impactando diretamente milhares de usuários?

Estamos sempre com posições abertas nas mais diversas frentes de atuação, para desenvolvedores apaixonados por transformar inteligência em código, além de termos muitas oportunidades legais para você iniciar sua carreira aqui dentro também!

Confira mais informações por aqui para estagiar em nossos times de desenvolvimento de software!

As principais atividades são:

Desenvolvimento de soluções escaláveis para nossos produtos, visando a excelência técnica; Investigação de problemas e criação de soluções junto ao time de forma ágil; Realização de testes e melhorias contínuas de usabilidade, performance e alta disponibilidade dos serviços.

O que é essencial:

Ensino superior em andamento em Ciência da Computação, Engenharia da Computação, Análise e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas ou áreas afins de Tecnologia da Informação; Desejo de trabalhar em um ambiente ágil e acelerado; Ter disponibilidade para trabalhar presencialmente em Porto Alegre/RS.

O que é um diferencial:

Possuir uma boa comunicação para transmitir ideias e conceitos técnicos de forma clara e eficiente tanto para clientes quanto para colegas de trabalho; Ter conhecimento relacionado ao mercado financeiro (ex: ações, opções, renda fixa, macroeconomia, HFT, criptomoedas); Experiência profissional ou acadêmica em áreas de tecnologia ou desenvolvimento de software; Envolvimento em projetos desafiadores e inovadores, com alto grau de complexidade (como projetos de pesquisa na indústria).

Consideramos como diferenciais experiências complementares além da atuação profissional, como o envolvimento acadêmico (PETs, mentorias, cursos, competições etc), ou envolvimento em comunidades de sua área de atuação, trabalho voluntário entre outros.

Além disso, por aqui jogamos juntos para promover um ambiente cada dia mais inclusivo, que valoriza todas as trajetórias independentemente de gênero, orientação sexual, raça, etnia ou deficiência.

description:

title: SR Software Engineer (Node.js and React)
description:
Aqui na ília nossas vagas estão sempre abertas para todas as pessoas e não se restringem quanto a gênero, etnia, orientação sexual, fatores sociais, condições físicas ou intelectuais (PCD) etc. Incentivamos a candidatura de integrantes de todos os grupos minoritários!

Sobre a ília Somos especialistas em tecnologia, dados e design, impulsionando a transformação digital de grandes players do mercado há mais de 10 anos, nos setores financeiro, seguros e mobilidade. Com mais de 450 profissionais, estamos presentes no Brasil e Europa, atendendo aos mercados da América Latina, Europa e América do Norte, desenvolvendo produtos digitais de alta qualidade e com foco em resultados de negócios. Somos uma equipe inovadora, criativa e apaixonada por tecnologia. Certificada pelo 5° ano consecutivo como Great Place to work aqui na ília acreditamos que pessoas mudam o mundo, e investimos nelas. Nossas awesome deliveries são feitas de pessoas para pessoas, afinal awesome people make awesome deliveries! #Vempraília!

Sobre a vaga: Como FullStack, você será um membro fundamental de uma equipe de engenharia fullstack e multifuncional. Você colaborará com líderes de Engenharia, Design, Produto, QA e equipes de negócios para desenvolver e entregar soluções de software de alta qualidade, escaláveis e flexíveis. Além disso, terá a oportunidade de orientar engenheiros de nível júnior a pleno. Nosso objetivo é fomentar uma cultura de Engenharia que valoriza equipes de desenvolvimento full stack, capacitando-as a tomar o máximo de decisões possível sobre sua direção técnica e processos.

Requisitos: Disponibilidade para trabalhar no horário EST Inglês Avançado para conversação, leitura e escrita. Experiência profissional trabalhando em equipes de engenharia de software 5+ anos de experiência relevante em desenvolvimento web full-stack em produção, utilizando NodeJS/Typescript e React Histórico de sucesso na execução de projetos Experiência em dividir requisitos de produto em tarefas de engenharia gerenciáveis e trabalhar com a equipe para concluí-las Disposição para transformar necessidades e problemas de negócios abstratos em tarefas concretas, em colaboração com os times de produto e engenharia Disposição para defender as necessidades da equipe e se envolver em decisões estratégicas Experiência sólida com tecnologias de API Experiência sólida com tecnologias RDBMS Experiência trabalhando com AWS Experiência com aplicações web de alto tráfego Compreensão de design de sistemas, estruturas de dados e algoritmos, além de experiência na criação e avaliação de documentos técnicos de design

Diferenciais: Experiência trabalhando com equipes full-stack que suportam uma fatia vertical do produto Experiência na construção de APIs REST backend usando Golang Familiaridade com as melhores práticas de SRE (como SLOs, KPIs, post-mortems, gerenciamento de incidentes, redução de toil, etc.) Compreensão de metodologias ágeis (preferencialmente Scrum) e disposição para adaptar e definir processos de desenvolvimento de software Experiência na definição de roadmaps técnicos e iniciativas, além de liderança em guildas entre equipes

Benefícios e Incentivos: Nossa contratação é CLT- 40h semanais com jornada flexível, sendo executada 100% de forma remota. Os benefícios da ília são pensados para proporcionar uma experiência AWESOME para cada ílian, abaixo você encontra os benefícios de forma resumida. #vempraília Para Saúde e bem-estar: Plano de Saúde e Odontológico SulAmérica extensivo a dependentes; Vale Alimentação/Refeição em cartão fléxivel Picpay benefícios Seguro de Vida; Auxílio Home-Office em cartão fléxivel Picpay benefícios; Wellhub (Gympass) TotalPass

Para o seu Desenvolvimento: ília University: Universidade Corporativa com mais de 20 mil cursos disponíveis para desenvolvimento pessoal e profissional; Language Academy: Escola de idiomas para ílians; í-talks e Chapter: Momentos e cerimônias em que o time compartilha práticas, estudos, projetos e ideias. Nas chapters ainda se reúnem pessoas com skills similares para compartilhamento de ideias, práticas e experiências;

Gostamos de ir além no cuidado com as nossas pessoas, então dispomos também de alguns benefícios não convencionais: Plano de Saúde PET- Guapeco BYOD- Alugamos o seu notebook pessoal te pagando um valor mensal para que você o use, mas disponibilizamos também máquinas de trabalho para ílians. Você quem decide! Seu Niver, seu bolo! Seu Networking Vale Prêmio- Programa de premiação a indicação de novos funcionários.

title: Analista de Infraestrutura Cloud Pleno- Foco em Suporte Especializado
description:
Sobre a

TIVIT

|

Seu futuro, nosso desafio A

TIVIT

é uma multinacional brasileira e one-stop-shop de tecnologia, presente no mercado há 20 anos e com operação em dez países da América Latina. Por meio de quatro unidades de negócios:

Digital Business ,

Cloud Solutions, CyberSecurity

e

Technology Platforms , a empresa oferece respostas personalizadas e soluções que impactam nos negócios, e na rotina de empresas e pessoas. Com o uso de tecnologias emergentes, parcerias tecnológicas e serviços inovadores, a

TIVIT

apoia seus clientes na jornada da transformação digital, em diversos setores como meios de pagamento, serviços financeiros, utilities, varejo, manufatura, entre outros. A companhia conta com uma forte estratégia de inovação, com o TIVIT Labs (hub que apoia as empresas a descobrirem e solucionarem os seus maiores desafios de inovação) e a TIVIT Ventures, braço de aquisição de empresas inovadoras, que já conta com as marcas Stone Age, tbankS, Privally, DevApi, Lambda3,

SENSR.IT

e XMS.

Analista de Suporte Especializado Pleno - Foco em Infraestrutura Cloud Atuação principal com foco na operação/sustentação do ambiente de infraestrutura On Prem e Cloud. CLT Híbrido para SP Capital, residentes de outros estados vaga é 100% remota Horário das 14:00 ás 22:00

Responsabilidades e atribuições: Atuação principal com foco na operação/sustentação do ambiente de infraestrutura On Prem e Cloud. Buscamos alguém com facilidade para absorção e compartilhamento de conhecimento, que tenha prazer em trabalhar com novas tecnologias e sinergia para trabalhar em equipe!

Requisitos e qualificações Ensino Superior Completo Experiência em Suporte Especializado Experiência com Infraestrutura Cloud Experiência em Sistemas Operacionais Linux e Windows - Experiência em Cloud AWS Experiência em Cloud GCP Experiência em Kubernets (Openshift, EKS, ECS) Experiência em middleware WebSphere Experiência em cultura SRE e DevOps (Desenvolvimento e análise de pipelines em terraform ou ansible) Conhecimento em Gestão de Usuários Experiência em dinâmicas/ritos de metodologias ágeis (daily, planning, review, etc) Experiência com troubleshootings em cenários de indisponibilidade ou crise; Experiência em realizar análises.

O que oferecemos para você? ✔Vale Refeição ou Alimentação; ✔Assistência médica e Odontológica; ✔Convênio Farmácia (descontos na compra de medicamentos); ✔Seguro de Vida; ✔Convênio Academia; ✔TIVIT Club (descontos e parcerias com as melhores lojas); ✔PAC - Programa de aceleração de carreira; ✔Reembolso para certificações; ✔MOBIFLIX – Nossa academia corporativa tem cursos presenciais e online, alinhados as novas tendências do mercado de tecnologia; ✔Plataforma online de crédito consignado, a TIVIT te ajuda a realizar os seus objetivos pessoais como reforma no seu apê/casa, financiar estudos e quitar dívidas, de acordo com as regras e políticas da cia; ✔Programa de Apoio Pessoal com orientação psicológica, financeira e jurídica em parceria com a Alelo.

Acreditamos que o presente é plural e a inclusão transforma, por isso, todas as pessoas são bem-vindas em nossas vagas, para promovermos um ambiente de trabalho inclusivo, de respeito, justiça e equidade.

Topa embarcar nesse desafio com a gente? #vemserTIVIT

title: Senior CRM analyst
description:
About the role

This is a 100% remote position for people located in Brazil

We are looking for a

Senior CRM Analyst

to development and execution of advanced CRM strategies, focusing on

customer lifecycle management, retention, and revenue growth . In this role, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams in a

fast-paced, multicultural environment , leveraging data-driven insights to optimize campaigns and drive business impact.

What you will be doing: Lead the design and implementation of multichannel CRM strategies, including automated and ad-hoc journeys; Develop and optimize communication flows to enhance customer engagement and retention; Conduct advanced A/B tests and experiments to optimize campaign performance; Analyze CRM metrics and business results, providing actionable insights to stakeholders and leadership; Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align CRM strategies with business goals; Manage relationships with external partners and vendors; Mentor and guide junior team members, fostering a culture of learning and growth; Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to drive innovation in CRM strategies.

What you´ll need to succeed in this role: Advanced knowledge of CRM platforms (e.g., Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Insider, or similar); Expertise in customer lifecycle management and multichannel strategies; Proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, Google Sheets, Metabase, or similar); Strong experience with A/B testing and campaign optimization techniques; Familiarity with data visualization and reporting tools (e.g., Looker Studio) is a plus. Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or a related field; Advanced degree or certifications in CRM, digital marketing, or data analysis are a plus.

Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or a related field; Advanced degree or certifications in CRM, digital marketing, or data analysis are a plus. 3+ years of experience in CRM, digital marketing, or a related field; Proven track record of designing and implementing successful CRM strategies; Experience working in a multicultural, multiproduct, and multiplatform environment. Fluent in Portuguese (both written and spoken); Advanced English (both written and spoken).

Why choose SandBox

Engage. Entertain. Educate . Sandbox Group is set to redefine learning through its portfolio of award-winning digital & physical products and services for kids, parents, and teachers. The business is focused on bringing families and educators the best experiences in a safe and fun environment, and hopes to create a world where everyone is empowered to learn! The team at Sandbox understands the time, discipline, and expertise needed to develop brilliant learning experiences. Over the next few years, their aim is to reach more kids, parents, and teachers across the world. They intend to build and diversify their current offering by bringing additional products and services into the Sandbox family, covering the core audiences; Pre-K, K-8 Kids, Parents, and Teachers.

✊ Our compromise with DE&I At our company, we firmly believe that diversity is the key to success. We are dedicated to fostering an inclusive atmosphere and actively seeking team members from a wide range of professional and cultural backgrounds. If you're eager to take on your next significant career opportunity, we eagerly await your application! Benefits Package (Brazil only)

At Sandbox, we highly value your work journey with us! That’s why we offer a complete benefits package to make your day-to-day easier, which includes: Meal/Food Voucher : R$924/month, so you can enjoy a good meal every day! Health and Dental Insurance : 100% covered for employees and 50% covered for dependents, with no co-pay. Home Office Allowance : R$250/month to help cover your electricity, internet, and other expenses. Furniture Allowance : In your first month of work, we’ll provide a one-time payment of R$800 for you to set up your workspace as you like. Childcare Allowance : We reimburse part of the cost for daycare or a nanny until your child turns 5 years old. Gympass : To help you stay physically fit. Life Insurance : So you’re always protected. ‍‍

Extended Maternity and Paternity Leave : So you can make the most of this special moment!

description:

title: Lead Backend Engineer (Python)
description:
The company and our mission:

Zartis is a digital solutions provider working across technology strategy, software engineering and product development.

We partner with firms across financial services, MedTech, media, logistics technology, renewable energy, EdTech, e-commerce, and more. Our engineering hubs in EMEA and LATAM are full of talented professionals delivering business success and digital improvement across application development, software architecture, CI/CD, business intelligence, QA automation, and new technology integrations.

We are looking for a

Lead backend Engineer

to work on a project in the data analytics industry.

The project:

Our teammates are talented people that come from a variety of backgrounds. We’re committed to building an inclusive culture based on trust and innovation. You will be part of a distributed team developing new technologies to solve real business problems. Our client is seeking an energetic individual with experience building cloud-first software in AWS to join their team in developing cutting-edge, custom analytics and data socialization solutions. In this role, you will collaborate with other engineers and teams to build their data socialization and visualization application, Atlas.

What you will do:

Collaborate with the team to develop and maintain the backend functionalities of the Atlas platform. Collaborate with the team to develop and maintain AWS platform operations, ensuring robustness and scalability. Write comprehensive unit and integration tests, adhering to best practices in testing. Participate in Code Review and Peer Programming as needed. Collaborate with the Frontend, Data Engineering, and Product teams to align on project requirements and features. Produce Technical Requirements Documents for new features. Schedule and lead design meetings with cross-functional teams. Break down technical epics into manageable stories for estimation and execution. Ensure efficient and effective communication across teams via Slack, Zoom, and email. Understand business requirements and suggest engineering solutions to address business challenges. Engage in client interactions, providing technical insights and support as needed. Participate in an off-hours on-call rotation to provide platform support and address critical issues as they arise.

What you will bring:

Proficiency in Cloud technologies (AWS ideally). Experience with Git, CI/CD, Docker. Strong programming skills in high-level languages such as Python, Java, or Golang. Experience working with SQL and KeyStores. Experience in creating and managing Docker containers and using orchestration services like ECS and EKS. Experience building CI/CD pipelines. Advanced relational database design skills. Experience with software design patterns/design idioms in distributed and serverless architectures.

Nice to have:

Experience with statistical programming, ideally in R or Python. Development experience in a Linux or Mac environment. Experience with React, Angular, HTML, Javascript/Typescript or other web development tools. Experience with integrating Business Intelligence/Data Visualization tools like Tableau or PowerBI. Experience with Terraform, Snowflake, Databricks, Athena, GraphQL.

What we offer:

100%

Remote Work WFH allowance:

Monthly payment as financial support for remote working. Career Growth:

We have established a career development program accessible for all employees with a 360º feedback that will help us to guide you in your career progression. Training:

For Tech training at Zartis, you have time allocated during the week at your disposal. You can request from a variety of options, such as online courses (from Pluralsight and Educative.io, for example), English classes, books, conferences, and events. Mentoring Program:

You can become a mentor in Zartis or you can receive mentorship, or both. Zartis Wellbeing Hub (Kara Connect) : A platform that provides sessions with a range of specialists, including mental health professionals, nutritionists, physiotherapists, fitness coaches, and webinars with such professionals as well. Flexible Working schedule . Multicultural working environment:

We organize tech events, webinars, parties, and activities to do online team-building games and contests.

title: Site Readiness Engineer
description:
Pathlock is a leader in application security, access governance, and compliance automation. Our cloud-based solutions help organizations secure critical applications, mitigate risk, and enforce policies across a diverse IT landscape.

We are looking for a skilled

Site Readiness Engineer (SRE)

with experGse in CI/CD automaGon and Azure cloud technologies. In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring deployment readiness across our infrastructure, automaGng deployment processes, and maintaining opGmal site performance within our cloud environment.

Key Responsibilities Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines to support application deployment and infrastructure provisioning. Develop and enhance automation scripts to streamline deployment processes and minimize manual tasks. Configure, manage, and optimize cloud resources in alignment with security standards and best practices. Collaborate with development teams to troubleshoot and resolve deployment and site readiness issues. Monitor site performance, identify bottlenecks, and implement improvements to enhance system reliability and efficiency. Participate in on-call rotations to provide production deployment support and incident resolution. Create and maintain technical documentation for deployment processes, system configurations, and troubleshooting procedures. Conduct site readiness assessments and validation tests to ensure infrastructure and applications are production ready. Implement and enforce Infrastructure as Code (IaC) practices using tools such as Terraform and ARM templates. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to deployment failures, infrastructure provisioning, and application performance. Qualifications 3-5 years of experience in site reliability engineering, DevOps, or similar roles Strong proficiency in CI/CD tools such as GitHub Actions, or similar Solid experience with Azure cloud services, including Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), Database services and networking controls Hands-on experience automating deployment workflows and infrastructure provisioning Working knowledge of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform, ARM templates, or similar tools Proficiency in scripting languages such as PowerShell, Bash, Python, or similar Experience with GitOps tools like ArgoCD or Flux Familiarity with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) Strong understanding of networking principles and Azure networking services Knowledge of security best practices for cloud environments Must be able to read and speak fluently in English Must be able to work at least some time in the US or EU time zone Preferred Qualifications Azure certifications (Azure Developer Associate, Azure DevOps Engineer Expert, or Azure Administrator) Experience with monitoring tools such as , Application Insights, ELK or Grafana Experience with log aggregation and analysis tools in particular Elastic and Prometheus Understanding of high availability and disaster recovery concepts Experience with containerized applications with a Windows OS Why Join Pathlock? Opportunity to lead a cutting-edge cloud security platform. Work in a fast-paced, high-growth environment. Competitive compensation, benefits, and equity options. Collaborative and inclusive company culture.

title: Azure Data Engineer (Relocation to Portugal)
description:
Your connection with Aubay starts in the following lines: Aubay Portugal is a multinational French company, in Portugal since 2007. We have offices in Lisbon and Oporto and we are a specialized consultant in Management, Implementation, Development and Maintenance of Information Systems. We have more than 150 active partners and we operate in sectors such as banking, insurance, telecommunications, services, energy and transports.

What are we looking for? +5 years of experience in Data Engineering; Microsoft Azure covering - designing, building, testing, and maintaining cloud applications and related services. Strong understanding of core concepts - Azure data storage, Azure compute, data connections, APIs, Databricks, Data Factory, Data Lake, and Azure Synapse on the cloud. English level B2 or higher; Willingness to move to Portugal (Mandatory).

What do we have to offer you? Health Insurance; Feedback&Coffee – the system that includes Aubay’s Performance Management Cycle, with regular moments of feedback and the Career Progression Model; Hybrid work model; A Training Academy designed to think of you and your needs. You can count on technical and behavioural training sessions (e-Learning and classroom), Meet&Techs, Webinars and Mentoring; Events and Teambuildings.

What makes us different? Our organizational culture is based on values such as transparency, team spirit, regular feedback and continuous learning; Reference prizes and birthday present; We don’t have a dress code; We call you by your name and we all address each other informally; Coffee and snacks at your disposal; You will grow in good company. Isn´t that the best way to improve professionally?

If we got your attention, we now hope to spark your enthusiasm. Ready for the first phase? We are waiting for you!

We will use personal information that you have sent us to consider your application for the relevant function. By giving us your information/documents by email, you consent to Aubay Portugal treating your personal information. Your privacy is important to us. Please check our Privacy Policy, which explains how we will use and store your personal information. It also explains the rights you have regarding your information and how you can contact us for clarification of questions or requests.

title: Senior Software Engineer - Android
description:
Design, develop, and prototype Android native customer applications for internal and external use. Participate in full app life cycle: concept, design, build, deploy, test and release to app store. Work with product teams on new product ideas, designs, prototypes and estimates. Keep up-to-date on current and upcoming features in relevant products and platforms. Drive a best practices approach to the continuous improvement of our products, processes, and tools. Assist in the creation and maintenance of documentation for all features in development

What You’ll Do: Work cross-functionally with product, design, and other engineering counterparts to execute on product and business strategy and build novel products and features that our users will love. Contribute to the full development cycle: technical design, development, test, experimentation, analysis, and launch. You’ll be reviewing code and design docs, giving feedback on product specs and mocks. Set and define standards that improve developer workflows, recommend best practices, and help coach and mentor engineers on the team to further their professional development. Continuously learn and improve your technical and non-technical abilities.

Who You Might Be: Expertise in Java or Kotlin, with 5+ years of experience in Android development. Sound software engineering fundamentals. Able to embrace the challenges of building data intensive, highly responsive, and fault tolerant apps in the constrained environment of a smartphone. Passion for developing scalable, well-designed software that improves people’s lives globally. Experience building at least one amazing Android app with a team from start to shipment. Strong organizational skills, the ability to prioritize tasks and keep projects on schedule. BS degree in Computer Science, a similar technical field of study, or equivalent practical experience. Entrepreneurial spirit. You are self-directed, innovative, and biased towards action in fast-paced environments. You love to build new things and thrive in ambiguity and even failure. Excellent communication skills. You collaborate effectively with teams in a fully remote environment and discuss complex topics with technical and non-technical audiences.

title: Senior Financial Business Partne
description:
We are seeking an experienced and results-driven

Senior Financial Business Partner

with a background in the IT services industry or other professional services industries to join our finance team. This role will act as a true partner to dedicated functions within the business, focusing on delivering critical financial insights and analysis to support business decision-making. Emphasis will be on budget vs. actual variance analysis, financial support, pricing and deal review, annual budgeting, and mid-year forecasting. The ideal candidate is a strategic thinker with exceptional analytical skills and the ability to communicate complex financial information effectively to various stakeholders.

Key Responsibilities 1. Budget vs. Actual Variance Analysis: Monitor and analyze monthly financial performance against budgets and forecasts. Identify and explain key variances, trends, and financial risks. Work with business leaders to create action plans to ensure financial targets are met. Work proactively to ensure future plans are achievable while reviewing historical performance. 2. Financial Support: Partner with Business Unit and Department leaders to provide financial insights and guidance. Assist in evaluating revenue growth opportunities and cost optimization strategies Review Realization and Utilization reports to optimize gross margin on client engagements Prepare financial reports and dashboards tailored to specific revenue centers. 3. Pricing and Deal Review: Collaborate with sales and business development teams to review and validate pricing structures. Conduct profitability and margin analysis on new and existing deals. Ensure compliance with internal policies and external regulations during deal structuring. 4. Annual Budgeting: Lead the preparation and consolidation of annual budgets, ensuring alignment with strategic goals. Work with department heads to create detailed financial plans. Present budget insights and recommendations to executive leadership.

5. Mid-Year Forecasting: Develop and update mid-year forecasts based on current performance trends and business changes. Provide variance analysis and assess the impact of forecast adjustments on long-term plans. Support scenario modeling and sensitivity analysis for key financial decisions.

Qualifications and Skills Required: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field. MBA or CPA is a plus. Experience on financial analysis. Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel and experience with financial modeling. Hands-on experience with ERP systems (e.g., SAP, Oracle, Netsuite) and financial planning tools (e.g., Hyperion, Adaptive Insights, NetSuite Planning & Budgeting). Strong English language speaking ability. Preferred: Proven track record of supporting revenue-generating functions and performing deal analysis. Ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams and influence stakeholders at various levels. Effective verbal and written communication skills, including the ability to present to senior leadership. Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple projects and meet tight deadlines.

Why Join Us? Opportunity to work in a fast-paced and innovative IT services environment. Be a key player in shaping strategic financial decisions. Collaborative company culture focused on growth, innovation, and inclusivity.

title: iOS Developer
description:
We are looking for a iOS engineer to build discovery experiences that serve the Adoption mission within our native app on surfaces such as the feed, the community tab and the post page.

We need people who can balance speed with quality while quickly building brand-new products. ● Contribute meaningfully to team strategy. We give everyone a seat at the table and encourage active participation in planning for the future. Don’t just come along for the ride. ● Communicate effectively, within the team and across disciplines. Work closely with product managers and designers to craft compelling user experiences. Experience with Storekit framework, Texture, UIKit, or SwiftUI are nice to have, but not required. ● Ability to design and implement complex distributed systems operating under high load. ● Experience developing customer-facing public applications is preferred. ● Entrepreneurial spirit. On our team, everyone needs to act like a startup CEO. You must be self-directed, innovative, and biased towards action in fast-paced environments. You live to build new things and thrive in ambiguity and even failure.

● Excellent communication skills. You must be able to collaborate effectively with teams in a fully-remote environment, and discuss complex topics with technical and non-technical audiences.

title: Pessoa Analista de Metodologias Ágeis Pleno
description:
#Nosso jeito de fazer história: Entre para a história de construção do maior Hub de Dados e Analytics do Brasil. Além de você contribuir diretamente neste objetivo, você estará se desenvolvendo constantemente, por meio de grandes desafios de negócio, junto a um time de alto impacto. Na Neoway, acreditamos em fazer as coisas de forma inovadora, colaborativa, responsável e com foco no cliente.

#Missão do Cargo: Como Analista de Agilidade, você fará parte da Unidade de Negócios de Capital Markets, atuando junto ao time de Tecnologia e será responsável por potencializar o trabalho da equipe, dar consistência no campo operacional e garantir que todos entendam e apliquem os princípios da agilidade, empoderando as pessoas e a empresa, visando primariamente o trabalho harmônico em equipe.

#Responsabilidades e principais atribuições em sua jornada: Promover a utilização de Metodologias Ágeis, garantindo que seja entendida e aplicada pelo time; Gerenciar o fluxo de trabalho e a organização do time; Conduzir as cerimônias ágeis adotadas pelo time; Ser guardião do quadro Kanban utilizado pelo time, garantindo a organização do backlog e sprints; Analisar regularmente as métricas do time, acompanhando os indicadores operacionais de eficiência do fluxo de trabalho, promovendo uma visão 360 da operação. Gerir as interferências externas de modo a assegurar foco no planejamento de trabalho; Remover impedimentos (técnicos, operacionais, contratuais, organizacionais, etc) que atrapalhem o andamento das atividades diárias do time; Estar sempre atualizado sobre metodologias ágeis e buscar formas alternativas de promover a melhoria contínua do time; Organização de documentações, políticas e acordos do time e promover a otimização de processos;

#Requisitos e qualificações: Apresentar boa comunicação, pois somos um time bastante pró ativo e com necessidade de articulação de ideias; Encarar as mudanças como oportunidades e aprender com seus erros; Facilidade em compartilhar conhecimento com seus pares; Habilidade em organização e planejamento; Apoiar no desenvolvimento da cultura de alta performance em equilíbrio com um clima leve; Saber como construir com outras pessoas e desfrutar do trabalho em equipe; Experiência atuando como Pessoa Agile Master ; Experiência em processos de desenvolvimento de software; Conhecimento em técnicas de facilitação; Conhecimento em métricas de times ágeis;

Alguns diferenciais que estamos de olho. Mas não se preocupe caso não tenha, ajudamos você nessa parte: Certificações Scrum (CSPO, CSM) ou Kanban (KMP I, KMP II) (desejável); Experiência com ferramentas de workflow como Jira, Trello, Pipefy, etc; Conhecimento em implementação e uso de OKRs.

#NeoJourney l Cardápio de Benefícios: Vale Alimentação/Refeição; Auxílio transporte; Plano de Assistência médica e odontológica; ‍‍ Licença Maternidade e paternidade estendida; PPR (Programa de participação de resultados); ️‍♀️Gympass - plataforma que te dá acesso a mais de 18 mil academias no Brasil. Nas academias conveniadas são oferecidas mais de 700 modalidades esportivas; Wellz - plataforma de saúde mental e bem estar, com terapia gratuita e muito mais; Ginástica Laboral (presencial) 1x na semana; Quick Massagem (presencial) 2x mês; Auxílio Creche; Day off no aniversário; Seguro de Vida; Parcerias Educacionais com Faculdades e Escolas de Ensino.

Mais sobre o Universo Neoway: Unimos forças com a B3, a maior potência de dados do país. Nossa meta é entrar para a história, e o capítulo deste ano é sobre acelerar. Todos e todas do time são essenciais para escrevermos este capítulo! Entendemos que as jornadas na Neoway são únicas, feitas pela soma do DNA Neoway + o potencial de cada colaborador(a).

#Somos Mudança: Acreditamos na potência da diversidade. Sabemos que temos um longo caminho pela frente, por isso estamos constantemente aprendendo e criando iniciativas para fortalecer a diversidade e inclusão. E essa jornada conta com o apoio dos nossos grupos de afinidade: #NeoLadies #NeoOba e #NeoPride, todos com o propósito de traduzir nossas mudanças internas em responsabilidade como cidadãos.

title: Lead Data Architect
description:
Building a risk applications and tools for innovative international top-tier hedge fund from the ground up, comprising the systems for traders, pre-trade checks and analysis, risks and limits management, reports of trading activities, FIX connectivity, market data providers connectivity (e.g. Bloomberg B-pipe), etc The Team is focused on the development and maintenance of various database applications supporting Risk Management.
