title: Pessoa Desenvolvedora Backend C#/.Net Pleno
description:
Venha fazer parte do time Bankly!

Somos uma plataforma de tecnologia financeira e Banking as a Service (BaaS) que tem o objetivo de alavancar tecnologia e quebrar barreiras para empoderar pessoas e empresas na transformação do ecossistema financeiro.

Dá uma olhada nos desafios que te esperam como Pessoa Desenvolvedora Backend C#/.Net Pleno aqui na Bankly:

Projetar, desenvolver e manter APIs RESTful e microserviços usando .NET Core e C#. Garantir a qualidade do código por meio de revisões, testes unitários e integração contínua. Projetar e otimizar modelos de banco de dados (SQL e NoSQL) para alta performance. Trabalhar em conjunto com outras equipes (frontend, DevOps, produto) para entregar soluções integradas. Implementar soluções com foco em segurança e melhores práticas de desenvolvimento. Monitorar e solucionar problemas de performance e escalabilidade das aplicações. Participar de discussões de arquitetura e contribuir com melhorias no design do sistema.

E aí, se identificou? Agora gostaríamos de saber se você tem o perfil e os conhecimentos abaixo:

Experiência com arquitetura de microserviços e APIs RESTful. Familiaridade com práticas de CI/CD usando ferramentas como Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions ou similares. Vivência com C#, incluindo LINQ, async/await e padrões de projeto. Experiência com Entity Framework Core e/ou Dapper. Conhecimento em bancos de dados relacionais (SQL Server, PostgreSQL) e experiência com bancos NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis). Conhecimento em contêineres (Docker) e orquestração (Kubernetes). Experiência com ferramentas de mensageria, como RabbitMQ e Kafka. Implementação de autenticação/autorização com OAuth, JWT ou IdentityServer. Familiaridade com testes automatizados.

Pra gente, conta como diferencial se você tiver:

Experiência em sistemas distribuídos e arquitetura orientada a eventos. Conhecimento em cloud computing (Azure, AWS ou GCP). Experiência com GraphQL.

title: DevOps - SRE (Site Reliability Engineering)
description:
Description

Important Information Location:

Brazil Job Mode:

Full-time Work Mode:

Work from home

Job Summary Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) is a discipline that incorporates aspects of software engineering and applies them to infrastructure and operations problems. The main goals are to create scalable and highly reliable software systems.

Responsibilities and Duties Utilize software tools and automated tasks for continuous monitoring and reliability of applications; Act swiftly in response to emergency situations impacting system reliability in production environments, performing root cause analysis for on-going incidents; Oversee and streamline change management processes to enhance system performance and reliability. Ownership of releases to production environments; Work closely with development teams throughout the software lifecycle, with a focus on contributing to solving system-related issues and eliminating toil - automating routine tasks for enhanced productivity; Focus on the reliability and scalability of systems, ensuring high performance and efficiency standards.

Essential Skills Proficiency in monitoring tools like Azure Monitoring, App Insights, Prometheus, Grafana. Project tracking and version management with tools like JIRA, SVN, GitHub; Expertise with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, ARM/Bicep, Pulumi, etc.) and release management tooling (ArgoCD, Harness, Octopus, etc.); Experience in incident alert tools (PageDuty, Opsgenie), and container orchestration tools like Kubernetes, AKS and similar.

About Encora

Encora is the preferred digital engineering and modernization partner of some of the world’s leading enterprises and digital native companies. With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora’s technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.

At Encora, we hire professionals based solely on their skills and qualifications, and do not discriminate based on age, disability, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or nationality.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
Lessons.com is a platform that connects students with the best local instructors for lessons in everything from music and sports to academics and hobbies. We’re passionate about empowering learners and helping instructors grow their businesses. Join our dynamic team to shape the future of personalized learning experiences.

Role Overview We are a small but powerful team that’s improving millions of people’s lives. We are looking for a talented

Full Stack Engineer

to join our team. In this role, you will build scalable, user-friendly applications that deliver an exceptional experience for both students and instructors. You will work closely with designers, product managers, and other developers to enhance our platform and bring new features to life.

Why Work for Lessons?

100% remote. Excellent compensation in US Dollars. Work with global teams and prominent brands. Endless opportunities for personal growth. Vast engineering challenges and responsibilities. Building features that are used by millions of people. Ability to make a huge impact quickly and excel professionally.

Responsibilities

Design and develop scalable and responsive full-stack applications. Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code for both front-end and back-end components. Integrate applications with databases and third-party APIs. Participate in the planning and execution of development projects. Stay updated on emerging technologies, frameworks, and best practices.

Qualifications

5+ years experience as a Full Stack Developer. Fluent English . Strong understanding of front-end and back-end development principles. Proficiency in front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and modern frameworks/libraries. Experience with server-side languages (e.g., Node.js, Python, Java, C#). Knowledge of database systems. Self-directed and capable of working effectively in a highly innovative and fast-paced environment.

Preferred Skills

Node.js React MongoDB GraphQL AWS Server-side Rendering

title: Salesforce Developer - Advanced English - Remote
description:
About HCLTech

HCLTech is a global technology company, spread across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering, cloud and AI, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. We re powered by our people a global, diverse, multi-generational talent - representing 161 nationalities whose unique spark, perspective and boundless passion drive our culture of proactive value creation and problem-solving.

To learn more about how we can supercharge progress for you, visit

Developer

will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing standard configuration with design in mind. The developer will also develop customized solutions within the Salesforce platform when necessary. This position should have strong technical skills and be able to describe solution options to the technical leads and architects working on the project. This role involves collaborating with various departments to understand their needs and translating those requirements into technical solutions. The developer will also be responsible for maintaining and enhancing existing Salesforce applications and ensuring their seamless integration with other systems. Candidate will need to be fluent in Portuguese and English to support our global organization (Spanish is a plus).

Key Responsibilities: Design, develop, implement and maintain standard and customized Salesforce solutions using Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning components. Implement best practices for scalability, supportability, ease of maintenance, and system performance Define solution limitations and requirements and work with Architects to ensure all systems integrate into the solution’s technology stack Communicate the solution context and intent and align development stakeholders on the technical direction Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements and translate them into technical specifications. Develop and maintain integrations between Salesforce and other systems using APIs and middleware Perform data migrations and ensure data integrity within the Salesforce platform Work with business stakeholders and IT to transition from WordPress and other CMSs to Salesforce Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Salesforce applications and integrations Create and maintain technical documentation, including design specifications, processes, user guides, and release notes Stay up-to-date with Salesforce best practices, new features, and industry trends Develop and implement maintenance procedures, monitor systems health, gather system statistics, and troubleshoot reported errors and alarms

Qualifications: Fluent in English to cover global needs Associates degree required, Bachelor's degree preferred in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field Salesforce implementation for a large organization with specific focus on the Manufacturing, Sales, Experience, Marketing and Service cloud Experience working with information technologies and systems analysis WordPress Experience to adapt similar functionality to Salesforce sites Salesforce Developer certification (e.g., Platform Developer I, Platform Developer II) is preferred Proven experience in Salesforce development, including Apex, Visualforce, Lightning components, and Salesforce APIs Strong understanding of Salesforce architecture, data model, and security model Strong knowledge of business processes, and how data and software applications support those processes Experience with integration tools and middleware as it relates to Salesforce with other systems Proficiency in web development technologies (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON) and frameworks (e.g., Angular, React) is a plus Strong understanding and knowledge of the principles and practices associated with packaged and/or SaaS applications Knowledge of agile methodologies and frameworks such as Kanban preferred Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail Strong proficiency in estimation and planning Strong communication and collaboration skills

Preferred Salesforce Developer certification (e.g., Platform Developer I, Platform Developer II) is preferred Bachelor's degree preferred in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field

title: AI Project Manager
description:
We are seeking a Project Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in project management, specifically in the AI domain.

This role involves overseeing ongoing AI projects, managing client relationships, coordinating with internal teams, and ensuring the successful delivery of projects. We are looking for individuals who are not only skilled in project management but also enthusiastic about AI and eager to drive new solutions.

While technical expertise is valuable, the primary focus is on project management and client satisfaction. This role sits in the Digital Transformation Center and will be close to delivery and research teams.

Role duration: long-term. Contract type: contractor / “PJ”. Availability to work according to European time-zone.

Job Mission :

To manage AI projects, ensuring successful delivery. To encourage a culture of excellence within the team. To advance AI initiatives through cross-functional collaboration. To engage across functions (SMEs, technical teams, leaderships) to guarantee delivery quality.

Key Responsibilities :

Project Management: Lead end-to-end project management for AI initiatives, from initiation to successful delivery. Develop project plans, allocate resources, track progress, and ensure timely completion of milestones and deliverables. Client Engagement: Serve as the primary point of contact for clients, maintaining strong relationships and ensuring clear communication. Understand client needs, manage expectations, and address concerns promptly to achieve customer satisfaction. Risk Management: Identify potential project risks and develop mitigation strategies. Proactively address issues that may impact project timelines, scope, or quality, ensuring smooth project execution. Reporting and Documentation: Maintain accurate project documentation, including project plans, progress reports, and stakeholder communications. Ensure that project status and updates are communicated effectively to both internal teams and clients. Team Leadership: Provide leadership and direction to project teams, fostering a collaborative and results-driven environment. Mentor team members, promote knowledge sharing, and support professional growth. Global Approach: Interact with other regions, partners and ventures following a global approach to ensure consistency and alignment in AI project management across the organization.

Required experience : Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, Project Management, or a related field. Around 5 years of experience as a project manager for IT. Experience in managing projects AI projects from conception to delivery. Familiarity with AI technologies and their applications. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to engage with technical and non-technical stakeholders. Proficiency in project management methodologies and tools. Problem-solving mindset with the ability to navigate challenges and adapt to changing project requirements. Critical thinking and problem solving to assess client situation and provide actionable outcome-based business/technical advice PMP, PMI-ACP, or other relevant project management certifications (preferred). Advanced proficiency in English is required. Proficiency in Portuguese is desirable.

Technical Knowledge: Familiarity with AI concepts, terminology, and industry trends. Understanding of project management methodologies specific to AI projects. Ability to evaluate technical feasibility and make informed project decisions based on technical considerations. Proficiency in using project management software and tools for AI project tracking and management. Knowledge and experience on conducting projects for IT and Service Desk solutions. A background in IT environments, including an understanding of how various IT components and systems operate, is highly beneficial. This knowledge helps in navigating technical aspects, ensuring seamless integration of AI solutions within existing IT infrastructures. Excellent communication skills Strong project management skills

What's next: It's best to apply today, because job postings can be taken down and we wouldn't want you to miss this opportunity. To apply, please submit your updated CV.

The preceding job description had been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed by employees within this classification. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties and responsibilities required of employees assigned to this job.

We have a direct presence in 41 countries, through our 70 offices located throughout the world. We have managed to become the preferred partner of many small-to-midsize local and regional companies as well. Most of our clients come from industries such as financial services, manufacturing, telecommunications, chemical, services, technology, public sector and utilities. Stefanini has career opportunities locally and around the world for professionals interested in a vibrant, passionate, team-oriented workplace. title: Profissional Back End Java /Aws - SR
description:
Código da vaga: 43812

Sobre a BRQ Digital

Há 32 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.

Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.

BRQ WAY

No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!

É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.

Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.

Ei Profissional Back End Java /Aws - SR, chegou o momento de encarar um novo desafio em sua carreira! Venha ser um #ferabrq

- O que procuramos?

Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!

- O que você deve ter?

Habilidades Principais: Tecnologias : Java 11+, Spring Boot, JUnit, Kubernetes, AWS Lambda, Cloud AWS, mensageria (Kafka/SQS/RabbitMQ), testes unitários e de integração, Design Patterns. Habilidades Técnicas : Conhecimento em SOLID, Scrum e desenvolvimento de soluções eficientes. Resolução de Problemas : Excelente raciocínio lógico e capacidade de segmentar problemas complexos. Comunicação e Liderança : Boa comunicação verbal, não verbal e escrita, além de habilidade para liderar iniciativas na squad. Responsabilidades : Desenvolver soluções escaláveis e contribuir para a evolução técnica da equipe.

- O que temos pra te oferecer?

Mais do que um plano de carreira !

A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:

Carreira técnica:

Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!

Carreira de Liderança:

Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.

Experiência internacional:

Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.

Empreendedorismo:

De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.

- E os benefícios?

Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Atuação híbrida; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!

- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?

Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions

Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

title: OPERADOR DE MANUTENÇÃO - NOVA ESPERANÇA
description:
OPERADOR DE MANUTENÇÃO- NOVA ESPERANÇA

Principais atividades:

Vaga com foco em manutenção eletromecânica e garantia do cumprimento dos procedimentos e instruções técnicas de manutenção da unidade. As atribuições básicas serão: manutenção em motobombas e motores elétricos, substituições de selo mecânico, reparo em comando eletroeletrônico, painéis elétricos NR10, parametrização de chaves de nível e transmissores radar, manutenção em tubulações, conexões e válvulas industriais; manutenção em envasadoras e sistemas pneumáticos e esporadicamente executar manutenção e conservação da parte predial/civil da unidade. Revisar e garantir a execução dos procedimentos e instruções técnicas das máquinas/equipamentos, gerir, emitir e encerrar ordens de serviços no software de manutenção (Engeman), garantir o cumprimento das guias corporativas e manutenção preventiva dos ativos. Garantir os testes do sistema de combate a incêndio e viabilizar prestação de serviços na unidade quando necessário e com aprovação da responsável da unidade. Garantir que a documentação técnica e a documentação de manutenção estejam em conformidade com as normas e legislações vigentes, inclusive participar de auditorias internas e externas em busca da excelência operacional. Auxiliar no desenvolvimento de empresas terceiras de manutenção, preenchimento de permissões de trabalho e sistemas de bloqueio, fornecedores de peças, equipamentos e calibrações de balanças e instrumentos de laboratório; Haverão trabalhos em altura, à quente, em áreas classificadas, em espaços confinados e próximo a substâncias perigosas. Escolaridade mínima: Ensino médio completo; Técnico em eletromecânica ; Técnico eletrotécnico com certificado/atribuições e experiências manutenções mecânica;

Desejável experiência/SEP para acompanhamento/execução de manutenções em média/alta tensão; Desejável conhecimento em automação;

Aceitamos candidatos das cidades mais próximas : Paranavaí, Alto Paraná, Uniflor, Colorado, Paranacity, Pres. Castelo Branco, Mandaguaçu, Iguatemi, Maringá;

A Brenntag oferece oportunidades iguais de emprego para candidatos qualificados e funcionários de todas as origens e identidades para criar um local de trabalho onde a diferença é valorizada porque forma uma organização resiliente e mais inovadora. Não discriminamos com base em idade, deficiência, identidade de gênero, orientação sexual, etnia, raça, religião ou crença, status parental e familiar ou qualquer outra característica protegida. Aceitamos inscrições de mulheres, homens e candidatos não binários de todas as etnias e origens socioeconômicas.

description:
NTU International A/S, leading a strong international consortium, is proud to have been awarded the next 4 years of EIBAS FWC LOT 2!

Keep updated and follow us at

for more information on our projects.

Position : Energy Specialist Location : Inside and outside EU-27 Assignment duration : 48 months Project budge t: 20M EUR

Qualifications and skills: At least 10 years professional experience in the field of: energy supply, renewable energy, energy infrastructure, energy efficiency, energy innovation, etc. Experience working with EU, EIB, WB etc. financed projects. A Master’s Degree or Bachelor's Degree relevant to the topic

Specific professional experience within at least one of the following sectors: Energy Supply: · Power generation and cogeneration: low-carbon power and CHP plants, carbon capture use and storage, renewable energy (hydro, wind energy, ocean, solar, geothermal, biomass, biogas, and waste to energy). · Heat production from renewable sources; · Efficient gas-fired small boilers applicable for buildings or SMEs; · Production and storage of gaseous, liquid and solid energy carriers from low-carbon energy sources; · Supply and processing of Critical Raw Material needed for key low-carbon technologies and/or energy transition in the EU.

Enabling Infrastructure: · Electricity transmission and distribution infrastructure, including storage. · Gas infrastructure: 1. connection to new sources of low carbon gases, 2. gas network projects that are planned to transport low carbon gases, including the rehabilitation and adaptation of existing gas infrastructures when it is part of this goal, 3. smart meters intended to reduce gas consumption. · District heating and cooling infrastructure, including storage. · Smart energy grids and smart meters

Energy Efficiency: · Energy efficiency in buildings (residential and non-residential sectors); · Energy efficiency in public lighting. · Energy efficiency and low-carbon technologies and processes in industrial facilities and SMEs;

Energy intensive industries and corresponding processes: · Carbon emission reduction technologies for iron and steel, refining, chemicals, cement, glass, paper refining and other industries

I nnovation: energy intensive industries and new types of energy infrastructure: · Corporate or national RDI programmes; · Commercial demonstration of innovative technologies, including demonstration projects, innovative manufacturing processes, and innovative low-carbon technologies in energy-intensive industries; · Technologies and business models that contribute to the implementation of the EU Strategic Energy Technology plan or decarbonisation of EII, including renewables, carbon capture use and storage, cross sectoral projects, sector coupling, circular economy pathways, electrification, biomass as feedstock, innovative energy carriers, nuclear fission and fusion; · New types of energy infrastructure including batteries and innovative energy storage technologies, demand response, market participants engaged in aggregation, electrification of transport, heating, digitalisation projects in energy sector; all projects that contribute towards sector coupling and increased flexibility of energy systems.

Language skills: · Excellent command of English (CEFR C1) (Minimum requirement)

If you are interested in this position, please apply and upload your CV. Please also make sure that you include one or more telephone numbers.

The work location is Remote.

Please note that only selected candidates will be contacted.

title: Procurement Manager
description:
About the Company

SHEIN is a global online fashion and lifestyle retailer, offering SHEIN branded apparel and products from global network of vendors, all at affordable prices. Headquartered in Singapore, SHEIN remains committed to making the beauty of fashion accessible to all, promoting its industry-leading, on demand production methodology, for a smarter, future-ready industry. Founded in 2012, SHEIN has more than 16,000 employees operating from offices around the world, and continues to expand operations globally. Join SHEIN and be the future!

About the Role

The Procurement Manager involves managing sourcing and vendor relationships, developing procurement strategies, ensuring optimal inventory levels, promoting sustainability initiatives, overseeing the procurement budget, and responsible for logistics packaging and warehouse procurement within the fashion retail industry.

Responsibilities

Sourcing & Vendor Management: Identify, evaluate, and negotiate with suppliers and vendors to secure the best prices, quality, and delivery terms. Develop and maintain strong relationships with key suppliers, ensuring reliability and alignment with our brand values. Purchasing Strategy: Develop and implement procurement strategies that drive cost savings, quality improvements, and operational efficiency. Analyze market trends and supplier performance to make informed procurement decisions. Inventory Management: Collaborate with inventory management teams to ensure optimal stock levels and timely replenishment of products. Monitor inventory turnover rates and implement strategies to minimize excess stock and reduce carrying costs. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with production, quality, engineering, and quality teams to ensure that procurement aligns with product development and promotional strategies. Participate in product development meetings to provide insights on material sourcing and cost implications. Sustainability Initiatives: Champion sustainable sourcing practices and collaborate with suppliers to promote environmentally friendly materials and processes. Monitor compliance with ethical sourcing standards and regulations. Budget Management: Prepare and manage the procurement budget, ensuring alignment with financial goals and targets. Track and report on savings and procurement performance metrics.

Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, Fashion Merchandising, or a related field. Minimum of 5 years of experience in procurement within the fashion retail industry. Being familiar with normal logistic packing material and service related to warehouse running. Strong negotiation skills and experience with contract management. Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities. Proven track record of developing and executing successful procurement strategies. Knowledge of sustainable and ethical sourcing practices. Proficiency in procurement software and Microsoft Office Suite. Strong interpersonal and communication skills. Fluent English.

CAREERS AT SHEIN

We Commit to Inclusion At SHEIN, we believe that diversity is the force that drives innovation. We are committed to creating an environment where all voices are heard, valued and respected. title: Sales Manager
description:
About Libiao Robotics

Libiao Robotics is the global pioneer of intelligent sorting robots in 2016, and the world's leading supplier of flexible intelligent sorting solutions, creating the world's first portable, modular and automated unit sorting system. original robot tote handling system,The company integrates logistics automation, research and development, production and sales of intelligent equipment.

Now, Libiao's intelligent sorting system has been widely applied across various industries and scenarios, including express delivery, supermarkets, retail, shoes & garments, medicine, catering, cold storage, book publications, manufacturing, etc. In addition, over 50,000 sorting robots are running in many countries and regions such as the US, Japan, South Korea, Australia and Europe.

Responsibilities: Maintain and manage the current End-User customer relationships, and develop sales pipeline to achieve annual sales & revenue targets in the local area; Cooperate deeply with the overseas sales channels, and assisted them to formulate business plan, and build up the strong long-term relationships; Generate new business opportunities, and develop the typical customers; Collect and analyze the market trends, and feedback the demands of customers and market, and promote the development of business.

Qualifications: Bachelor degree or above, science and engineering majors and those have overseas study or work background are preferred; Two year’s or above sales or business development experience in logistics automation equipment, logistics integrators, intelligent manufacturing for local area, or those have the technical support and plan & design experiences for above industries are preferred; Strong business perception and negotiation skills, pressure resistance, and career ambition; Good communication skills, fluent in English, and adapt to overseas long-term business trips.

Corporate Culture: Vision: Make the world more efficient

Mission: Focus on flexible automation of the entire logistics process

Goal: Become leading company in logistics robot industry

title: Desenvolvedor Java Sênior
description:
Quem Somos:

A Marketdata é uma das mais renomadas consultorias de estratégia de dados e tecnologia, fazendo parte do Grupo VML, que integra a gigante mundial WPP, maior conglomerado de comunicação do mundo. O grupo é conhecido por suas transformações impactantes em mercados locais e internacionais através de soluções criativas e inovadoras. Uma das maiores consultorias de Data Driven Marketing da América Latina, altamente especializada em CRM e Loyalty. Com uma história de 24 anos repleta de conquistas e em um momento de franca expansão internacional, a Marketdata se destaca não apenas por sua trajetória impressionante, mas também por seu compromisso inabalável com a inovação, a tecnologia e a análise profunda de dados. Ao longo de sua jornada, acumulou inúmeros prêmios internacionais e nacionais: A Marketdata foi eleita, por 11 vezes, a Melhor Empresa de CRM do Ano, pela Associação Brasileira de Marketing de Dados (ABEMD), além de ser a maior vencedora da categoria de Marketing Baseado em Dados do Prêmio Echo Latam.

Na Marketdata, valorizamos não apenas os resultados, mas acima de tudo, as pessoas. title: Machine Learning Engineer | Sponsor US H1B
description:
Project Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled and versatile Machine Learning and Data Engineer to join our team. This role involves developing sophisticated image-based solutions for plant phenotyping and pulling, stitching, and wrangling data from various sources for advanced analytics. The successful candidate will work on a cross-functional team, collaborating closely with crop scientists, plant pathologists, cloud engineers, and data scientists to enable access to relevant data and deploy machine-learning models and solutions.

Responsibilities: Develop and implement image-based solutions for quantifying various traits and features of plants. Pull data from first and third-party sources, prepare it for analysis by filtering, tagging, joining, parsing, and normalizing datasets. Collaborate with team members to research data sources, design and deploy data loaders, and ensure the availability of data for analytical activities. Provide technical expertise in the design and implementation of data management and architecture solutions. Develop, evolve, and implement concepts of data ops in partnership with cloud and ML engineers. Architect, develop, deliver, and support ML products and solutions, ensuring successful deployment into production. Automate model training, testing, and deployment processes. Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines and ETL processes.

Requirements: Master’s degree or higher in Data Science, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Robotics, Physics, Mathematics, or related fields. Deep understanding and experience with Image Theory, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Python Programming, TensorFlow, or PyTorch. Strong experience in designing and implementing large-scale data processing, analysis, and exploration solutions. Proficiency in R, Python, advanced SQL skills, and a good understanding of data management principles. Experience with cloud technologies (Azure or GCP preferred) and deploying CI/CD pipelines. Knowledge of Git, PySpark, Data Bricks, and database management (SQL/PLSQL/Snowflake preferred). Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently and collaborate across teams. 2+ years of industry or academia experience in image processing, computer vision, or related fields.

Work Details: Location: Remote, candidates must work in the PST time zone. Work Hours: 40 hours per week. We sponsor US work visa after 1 year of service

title: SAP Data Migration Associate Consultant
description:
ABOUT US Syniti

is

the

enterprise data partner, empowering anyone who relies on data to make business-critical decisions by delivering data they can trust through a unique combination of intelligent software and experts who deeply understand the role of data in enterprise growth.

Trusted by the Fortune 2000, Syniti helps leading businesses reconfigure the role of enterprise data from afterthought to foundational first step; enabling them to unlock valuable insights that ignite growth, reduce risk, and expand their competitive advantage.

Syniti’s

Data First

philosophy and enterprise data management platform supports data migration, data quality, data replication, data matching, master data management, analytics, data governance, and data strategy in a single, unified solution.

As an innovative, global leader in Enterprise Data Management, the combination of our award-winning software platform and premier consultants creates a unique advantage for leading enterprises. Syniti is also a preferred data solution used by the

world’s top system integrators . Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with offices in 25 countries around the world, Syniti operates in all global regions and industry verticals, and maintains a 100% client success rate across thousands of complex data projects and initiatives.

The ROLE We predominantly deliver data migration projects to global clients, while also working in data quality and data governance.

All our consultants use software created on our proprietary ‘DSP’ platform to perform all aspects of the data migration project lifecycle.

We are recruiting talented and motivated individuals to join our team delivering data projects for clients, and offer training, mentoring and project focused development opportunities for candidates passionate about pursuing a career in data.

WHAT YOU WILL DO After an initial training period, a Data Migration Consultant will be expected to:

Demonstrate a strong understanding of our own Data Migration / Data Governance methodology Demonstrate strong proficiency in our tools, working to prescribed development standards Good understanding of business processes for assigned functional area Demonstrate a strong knowledge of underlying technical data structures and definitions of assigned functional process area Develop data migration / governance rules in our tools as per supplied specification Contribute to integrated data migration design for assigned process area through data analysis, reporting and collaboration with on-site BOA and client colleagues Design, create and execute reports in alignment to project deliverables Create and maintain data load programs Maintain related documentation Execution of end-to-end data loads and reconciliations

WHAT IT TAKES Degree level qualification in Computer Science (or other technology related field) Experience in ETL / Data Migration / Data Quality / Data Analysis Functional ERP (SAP / Infor etc.) experience Project experience across ERP implementations Experience with T-SQL Database experience - SQL Server, Oracle etc. Excellent English written and verbal communication skills Proficient in MS Office

WHAT WE OFFER

Trust

that you are good at what you’re doing. At Syniti you will find a supportive environment and access to learning tools, but micromanagement is not our thing.

Growth . We are growing rapidly and steadily solving the biggest challenges enterprise companies are faced with today. There was never a better time to join and grow with us. Most importantly you will have the chance to shape our journey and share in our success story.

Support . We all rely on each other and enable each other to be successful. You won’t stand alone.

Curiosity and genuine interest in you . We all have our different stories, all equally fascinating with each depicting a different journey and we want to hear them all.

Recognition . We are the sum of individual achievements and we always take the time to celebrate them.

An open organisation . Hierarchies are not our thing and access is something we make sure of across the board. We are a family where everyone is just as important, everyone’s work is seen and ideas valued.

title: Sr. Applications Engineer (CS e-STORAGE)
description:
e-STORAGE is a subsidiary of Canadian Solar and a leading company specializing in the design, manufacturing, and integration of battery energy storage systems for utility-scale applications. The Company offers its own proprietary LFP battery solution, comprehensive EPC services, and innovative solutions aimed at improving grid operations, integrating clean energy, and contributing to a sustainable future. e-STORAGE has successfully implemented over 3.3 GWh DC of battery energy storage solutions in various locations, including the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, and China. This significant accomplishment solidifies e-STORAGE's position as a key player in the global energy storage integration industry. Currently, the Company operates two fully automated, state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities with an annual production capacity of approaching 20 GWh. e-STORAGE is fully equipped to continue providing high-quality, scalable energy storage solutions and contribute to the widespread adoption of clean energy. For additional information about e-STORAGE, visit

Solar was founded in 2001 in Canada and has been listed on NASDAQ since 2006. It is now one of the world's largest solar technology and renewable energy companies. Canadian Solar is a leading manufacturer of solar photovoltaic modules, provider of solar energy and battery storage solutions, and developer of utility-scale solar power and battery storage projects with a geographically diversified pipeline in various stages of development. Over the past 22 years, Canadian Solar has successfully delivered over 102 GW of premium-quality, solar photovoltaic modules to customers across the world. Likewise, since entering the project development business in 2010, Canadian Solar has developed, built, and connected over 9 GWp of solar power projects and over 3 GWh of battery storage projects across the world. Currently, the Company has approximately 700 MWp of solar power projects in operation, 8 GWp of projects under construction or in backlog (late-stage), and an additional 17 GWp of projects in advanced and early-stage pipeline. In addition, the Company has a total battery storage project development pipeline of 52 GWh, including approximately 2 GWh under construction or in backlog, and an additional 50 GWh at advanced and early-stage development. Canadian Solar is one of the most bankable companies in the solar and renewable energy industry.

Position Summary: The Sr. Applications Engineer provides technical expertise to support Canadian Solar’s energy storage solutions. This position will be responsible for the pre-sales activities of utility-scale Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS) including system sizing, preliminary design, and value engineering. This role will require the chosen candidate to work closely with the commercial and engineering teams to help develop proposals for new storage project opportunities and provide technical support to respond to customer needs.

Responsibilities: Understand customer’s needs from RFP or other documentation and determine project scope, schedule, technical specifications and risks. Develop size models and conceptual drawings sets by working with other application engineers as needed. Work with the procurement team to obtain quotes and prepare pricing for projects. Prepare proposals including technical and commercial documentation in collaboration with other departments. Negotiate technical and commercial contract terms with customers by working together with the commercial team. Work closely with other business development and applications staff, engineering and procurement to ensure complete and shared project understanding and priorities. Conduct technical and sales presentations and provide clarifications to customers and other departments.

Requirements: 5+ years of experience in a pre-sale engineering role. Direct experience in battery energy storage systems or utility-scale solar. Exceptional technical aptitude including the ability to read and fully understand engineering schematics, technical advisory reports, and technology reviews. Solid understanding of regulatory standards in Brazil related to energy storage and grid-interactive inverters. Global perspective and awareness, and direct experience working across diverse cultures in a multinational company would be beneficial. Bachelor’s degree in engineering (preferably Electrical or Mechanical) is required; a graduate degree is strongly preferred. Strong communication (written and verbal) skills in both Portuguese and English is required.

title: Business Development Manager
description:
Bitget is a global cryptocurrency exchange focused on derivatives tradings, headquarter located in Singapore. Bitget was founded in July 2018 in Singapore, and we have 8 million registered users worldwide.

Responsibilities -Identify and build relationships with local KOLs/influencers/communities, projects and other potential partners to promote Bitget in local market in order to achieve user growth and trading volume growth; -As a representative of Bitget, to maintain good relationship with KOLs and marketing channels to achieve long term cooperation ; -Be responsible for the execution and performance of KOL marketing strategy, track and analyze channel cooperation results and make adjustments to ensure optimal performance and maximum ROI; -Keep abreast of local industry developments trends and competitor movements and strategize corresponding actions. -Represent Bitget in the local events, media, and in communication with external stakeholders.

Qualifications -University graduate, background in business development or marketing in Crypto/Fintech industry is a must; -Excellent interpersonal and relationship building skills ; -In depth knowledge of affiliate marketing in the industry ; -Passionate about the cryptocurrency industry ; -Able to use English or Mandarin as work language ; -Work well under pressure, strong in execution.University graduate, background in business development or marketing in Crypto/Fintech industry is a must;

title: Assistente de auditoria
description:
Junte-se a Forvis Mazars

Se você quer uma carreira repleta de oportunidades, desafios, crescimento contínuo e um ambiente de trabalho dinâmico e inovador, venha para a Forvis Mazars.

Sobre Nós

Somos uma das

10 maiores empresas

em prestação de serviços, reconhecidos pela nossa excelência e capacidade de fornecer uma experiência única aos nossos clientes e equipes. Acreditamos que o crescimento sustentável é alcançado através do investimento no desenvolvimento de nossos colaboradores e novas tecnologias. Como uma empresa global mantemos alto nível de excelência garantindo uma experiência única através de qualificação, trabalho integrado, tecnologia e desenvolvimento contínuo de nosso time.

Sua Jornada Conosco

Aqui, você terá a chance de trabalhar com um time de alto nível atendendo clientes globais, construindo conexões valiosas e evoluindo suas habilidades e competências. Oferecemos programas de treinamento focados no seu crescimento e qualificação, programas de desenvolvimento & performance e um ambiente que promove a excelência e aprendizado. Além do trabalho, cuidamos do seu bem-estar, garantindo um ambiente acolhedor, cultivando a riqueza das relações interpessoais.

Sobre a área

Na nossa área de auditoria, você terá oportunidades de desenvolvimento profissional com interações e responsabilidades entre as principais linhas de frente de negócio, através disso você terá um contato maior com o time no que tange ao processo de auditoria desde o início de um projeto até o fim.

Responsabilidades e Atribuições

Prestar assistência nas atividades de prestação de serviços de auditoria contábil e financeira; Auxiliar na análise e operacionalização dos trabalhos de investigação em documentos, saldos em conta corrente, bens e valores, análise de balanços consolidados e inventários físicos; Realizar testes para avaliar controles internos e procedimentos administrativos; Auxiliar na elaboração de parecer técnico sobre as auditorias realizadas, com base nos resultados das investigações, utilizando técnicas específicas de acordo com princípios contábeis e exigências de órgãos reguladores; Prestar assistência nos trabalhos de auditoria de inventário físico, ajustando a posição teórica com a posição real do estoque conforme orientação recebida; Assistir auditores mais graduados no relacionamento com os representantes das empresas auditadas, abrangendo a execução da proposta de auditoria, ajustes de agenda e posicionamento da execução dos trabalhos; Auxiliar na apresentação dos relatórios parciais e na conclusão dos trabalhos de auditoria; Apoiar no atendimento a outros auditores de empresas clientes e de órgãos reguladores para revisão de papéis de trabalho; Prestar informações sobre consultas realizadas pelas empresas auditadas; Executar processos investigativos em empresas, realizando os procedimentos adequados de conciliação de atos e fatos contábeis; Elaborar recomendações e emitir pareceres de forma correta.

Requisitos / Qualificações

Cursando superior de Ciências Contábeis ou já graduado; Excel Intermediário; Conhecimento técnico e prático nas atividades contábeis;

Benefícios

Serviço de telemedicina; Gympass; Canal de apoio psicológico; Convênio com o SESC; Vale Refeição/Alimentação (Cartão Flash) – flexibilidade para o seu dia a dia; Vale Transporte; Assistência Médica (Amil); Assistência Odontológica (Amil); Seguro de vida (SulAmérica) Descontos e, incentivos educacionais em diversas instituições.

Se você se identificou com o nosso jeito de ser, venha fazer parte do nosso time! Aqui teremos diversas oportunidades e desafios para que você possa contribuir e se desenvolver em conjunto conosco.

title: Android Developer
description:
Project Description: Luxoft is one of the major software services companies worldwide. In particular, we develop high-quality software in automotive industry for most famous car makers.

The software inside a vehicle was traditionally expected to be a very controlled and self-contained environment. Equipping cars with perception and machine intelligence changes a lot in the overall picture of the vehicle manufacturer. Luxoft's goal is to empower our customers, with deep domain knowledge and smart solutions, to develop cars of the future.

Responsibilities: Software Engineer for development of Android Automotive platform services and applications

Mandatory Skills Description: Android Framework experience. Android Auto expertise. RUI development for Android Auto stack and Android Auto stack development. Proficiency in Java, JNI, Embedded C/C++ programming. Code debugging skills. Knowledge of configuration management tools and defect tracking tools.

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: Development experience on Android Auto/Linux/QNX OS. Familiarity with JIRA, Bitbucket, Confluence, etc. Experience working on Qualcomm Android Platform with QNX Hypervisor (desirable). Proficiency in Android and QNX/Linux development projects. Deep expertise in developing Android Auto supported stacks. Integration experience with RemoteUI/Projection - Android Auto business logic application on Android platforms. Experience with Android 12 or later (desirable). Knowledge of Opensource Android frameworks, Android Auto plugin implementation, and porting. Competencies in software development, architecture, configuration management, integration, and validation for Realtime, embedded, concurrent applications in the automotive field.

title: Lead Software Developer - React Native, Remote Brazil
description:
✨✨Important: Please apply with your CV in English.✨✨ Luxoft only operates under CLT contracts.

On-calls support will be required > frequency is yet to be discussed.

Project description Our Client is one of the largest TV providers in North America and we are searching for a Lead Software Developer (Team Lead) to lead our Delivery Team. The project focuses on developing a mobile application for a video streaming platform.

Responsibilities You will be implementing new features and enhancing existing functionalities on client applications to support streaming video products. This includes estimation, design, development, testing, and documentation. Lead the Software Engineering Team and collaborate with product managers, and architects in a cross-functional environment to ensure functions and performance meet customer requirements in a cost-effective and maintainable way. Provide on-call support including monitoring, triaging and resolving production issues

Skills Must have At least 3 years of Team Leadership experience Strong teamwork focus and the ability to foster collaboration within and across teams Proficient in React Native mobile app development (5+ years) as well as at least one of the following: Java/Kotlin or Obj-C/Swift Streaming mobile app development experience with iOS/Android and TV Platforms Experience with agile development Good verbal/written communication skills

Nice to have Experience with a CICD development environment

LANGUAGES English: C1 Advanced

description:

title: Gerente de loja | JK Shopping Taguatinga | Brasília/DF
description:
A Natura tem por essência a

paixão pela cosmética e pelas relações.

E é esse cuidado, o nosso

jeito de ser e fazer

que Só Podia ser a Natura. Fazemos com que os mais de 200 milhões de consumidores que entram nas nossas lojas, se sintam especiais e desfrutem da nossa

consultoria de beleza.

Se você quer ser Gerente de Loja Natura e fazer parte do dia a dia, da autoestima e dos momentos das pessoas e ainda desenvolver talentos

na melhor empresa de beleza PARA o mundo , essa é a sua chance! Confira nossas vagas e venha, do seu jeito, prosperar com a gente!

Gerente de loja | JK Shopping Taguatinga | Brasília/DF Localidade:

St. M Norte QNM 34 Área especial 01 - Taguatinga, Brasília - DF, 72145-450

O que estamos buscando? Estamos em busca de um profissional para liderar nossa equipe e operações de loja com cuidado e atenção. Seu papel será fundamental para fidelizar nossos clientes e atrair novos consumidores para a nossa marca. Conectando-se com nossos valores, você garantirá uma experiência diferenciada tanto para os clientes quanto para sua equipe.

Procuramos alguém com vívida experiência em gestão de pessoas e resultados, que valorize o desenvolvimento profissional e reconheça o poder da diversidade para gerar valor.

Principais Responsabilidades: Responsável pelo processo de recrutamento e seleção dos nossos talentos; Responsável pelos processos de gestão de pessoas do seu time de vendedores(as) (controle de ponto, escala de trabalho e etc.); Desenvolver a equipe através de reuniões e treinamentos, mantendo-a motivada e alinhada com a empresa; Aplicar avaliação de desempenho da equipe; Realizar a gestão de indicadores e melhoria de performance dos resultados; Responsável pelo fluxo de caixa da loja; Implementar e manter o Visual Merchandising de acordo com as diretrizes do Marketing da Natura; Responsável pela receita da loja e gestão do inventário; Realizar reuniões mensais de resultado; Conhecer e disseminar a Visão e a Missão da Empresa; Responsável por cumprir com as políticas, regras e normas de Segurança do Trabalho e Saúde ocupacional de seu local ou processo de trabalho; Obedecer todos os regulamentos e procedimentos de trabalho da empresa; Identificar oportunidades de melhoria.

Quais os requisitos? Ensino superior cursando ou concluído; Experiência com gestão de indicadores e melhoria contínua; Excel ou ferramentas semelhantes; Vivência com gestão de pessoas e experiência como líder de equipe; Desejável conhecimento em atendimento consultivo; Disponibilidade para trabalhar domingos alternados (1x1); Experiência em vendas e com entrega de resultados; Conhecimento de marketing e VM; Experiência com facilitação de conteúdos; Experiência em operação de loja.

Nossos Benefícios Vale Refeição Vale Transporte Assistência médica + seguro de vida Vale-presente Natura no seu aniversário Produtos Natura com 40% off (Calma! São só 5 por mês)

A Natura celebra e abraça a diversidade em todas as suas formas e pluralidades! Convidamos as #Mulheres, pessoas #Negras, profissionais com deficiência (#PCD), pessoas pertencentes às comunidades #LGBTQIA+ #Gestantes e profissionais de #QualquerIdade a se candidatarem a esta vaga!

title: Supply Chain - Administrative
description:
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented

Supply Chain Administrator

to support warehousing, logistics, fleet management, and data auditing operations. This role will serve as the primary point of contact for third-party logistics (3PL) providers, manage invoice tracking, and ensure data accuracy across multiple platforms. The ideal candidate must be able to work in

Central Time

and have access to

VoIP, Slack, and Gmail

for communication. This position reports directly to the

Supply Chain Manager . Key Responsibilities: Serve as the primary point of contact for third-party logistics (3PL) providers. Respond to emails regarding system support, shipment tracking, and general inquiries. Schedule and coordinate dock appointments for warehouses. Audit receipts, incomplete shipments, and warehouse records to ensure accuracy. Track and categorize invoices (e.g., handling, storage) for proper cost allocation. Review and audit

Warehouse Glove (WG) invoices

for accuracy. Manage freight quotes and coordinate shipments to optimize costs and efficiency. Audit fleet management platforms ( WEX, Geotab, Samba ) to ensure records are up to date and driver information is synchronized. Process and file fleet-related invoices, ensuring correct breakdown of umbrella invoices. Assist in accident claim processing and related administrative tasks. Analyze unit

exit inspection data

to identify high cost items requiring attention. Recommend maintenance strategies and cost-effective solutions to the

Operations Associate

based on

maintenance guideline decks

to minimize unnecessary replacements. Requirements: Experience in supply chain administration, logistics, or related fields. Strong organizational skills with high attention to detail. Fluent English Proficiency in data auditing, invoice tracking, and logistics coordination. Ability to work in 8- 5pm

BRT Time zone Proficiency in

VoIP (3cx), Slack, and Gmail

for communication. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

title: Analista de Infraestrutura Cloud
description:
O(a) Analista de Infraestrutura Cloud terá o papel de apoiar o time de infraestrutura e operações de TI na manutenção de soluções em nuvem, garantindo alta disponibilidade, segurança e escalabilidade para as aplicações e serviços da empresa.

Topa o desafio? #wewantyou

Aqui na Sankhya buscamos novas formas de solução, que sejam menos complexas, autênticas e únicas. E com isso

queremos pessoas que desejem crescer

a cada dia junto com a empresa, ajudando a gente a construir cada vez mais um ambiente diverso e de

crescimento acelerado .

Responsabilidades e atribuições

Suporte ao usuário; Apoiar na implantação de soluções em nuvem; Auxiliar na configuração e manutenção de infraestrutura como serviço (IaaS), plataforma como serviço (PaaS) e software como serviço (SaaS); Ajudar na implementação de políticas de segurança e conformidade para a infraestrutura em nuvem; Realizar o monitoramento e a análise de desempenho da infraestrutura em nuvem; Apoiar na resolução de problemas e incidentes relacionados à infraestrutura em nuvem; Realizar a configuração e a manutenção de sistemas operacionais e servidores em nuvem; Apoiar na implementação de soluções de automação e orquestração de infraestrutura em nuvem. Monitorar e manter a disponibilidade da infraestrutura; Implementação e manutenção de infraestrutura de nuvem.

Requisitos e qualificações

Graduação completa ou cursando em Sistemas de Informação, Redes de Computadores ou cursos correlatos. Experiência em suporte, instalação e troubleshooting. Experiência em Sistemas Operacionais (SO): Windows e Linux. Experiência em Banco de Dados (DB): Oracle e SQL Server. Experiência em instalação e troubleshooting em Servidor de Aplicação (WildFly). Experiência com ferramentas de troubleshooting de aplicações: Flight Recorder, AWR, Dump de Threads, Monitor de Consultas, Tracert de Rede/SO/DB, etc.

O que seria legal se você tivesse

Conhecimentos de rede e segurança. Experiência em suporte, instalação e troubleshooting do

Sankhya W (SkW). Experiência em instalação e troubleshooting em Servidor de Aplicação (WildFly do

Sankhya W ).

Informações adicionais

Sankhya: Liberdade para você ser, viver e evoluir

Benefícios que vão além da Jornada Sankher Na Sankhya, valorizamos a individualidade e acreditamos em proporcionar benefícios que vão além do básico, promovendo a liberdade e o equilíbrio entre vida pessoal e profissional. Nosso objetivo é oferecer todo o apoio necessário para que você se sinta bem e satisfeito em todas as áreas da sua vida.

Adapte sua rotina de trabalho para equilibrar melhor suas responsabilidades pessoais e profissionais. Licença Maternidade e Paternidade Estendida:

title: Senior Operations Product Analyst - New Games
description:
About Garena: Established in 2009 and headquartered in Singapore , Garena is a leading online games developer and publisher with a global footprint across more than 130 markets.

Garena provides global users access to popular and engaging mobile and PC online games that it develops, curates, and localizes. It champions games as a social and entertainment platform on which its communities can engage and interact.

In addition, Garena is a leading esports organizer. It hosts esports events around the world that range from grassroots local tournaments to some of the most viewed professional esports competitions globally. The Free Fire World Series 2021 Singapore, which was watched by 5.4 million concurrent viewers at its peak, holds the record for the highest concurrent viewership of any esports match in history.

About the position: We are looking for a

Operations Product Analyst

who will be responsible for ensuring that in-game live configurations are executed correctly to enhance the player experience.

If you are a driven person who wants to contribute to the gaming industry, we’d love to work with you!

Make sure to share your CV in English.

Responsibilities: Manage and execute all in-game live configurations for the New Games in progress for Brazil Region including events, promotions, revenue events, and more. Ensure that all configurations are executed correctly to enhance the player experience. Perform thorough checks and testing to ensure all game updates and features meet quality standards. Validate the accuracy and functionality of in-game configurations and content. Identify and document any issues or bugs encountered during testing and collaborate with the broader product team to ensure timely resolution of issues and implementation of fixes. Implement best practices and processes to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of live operations.

Main job requirements: Completed superior degree; Highly passionate about games Strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills. Previous experience in live operations, quality assurance, or a related role in the gaming industry. Excellent MS Office skills (MS Excel, MS PowerPoint); Full professional competency in both written and spoken Portuguese and English; Available to work in person at our office in São Paulo, SP.

title: Técnico de serviços
description: A Alimak Group é um provedor global de soluções sustentáveis de acesso vertical e trabalho em altura, listado na Nasdaq Stockholm (Suécia). Com presença em mais de 120 países, o Grupo desenvolve, fabrica, vende e presta serviços em soluções de acesso vertical e trabalho em altura, com foco em agregar valor ao cliente por meio de maior segurança, produtividade elevada e eficiência de custos aprimorada. Os produtos e soluções do Grupo são comercializados sob as marcas Alimak, Scanclimber, Tractel, CoxGomyl, Manntech e Avanti, marcas reconhecidas pelo mercado e conhecidas por seu sólido histórico de segurança, alta qualidade e durabilidade.Estamos com a seguinte oportunidade para nossa divisão industrial Brasil. Elaborar relatórios de visita, execução e medições.REQUISITOS COMPLEMENTARESEnsino técnico completo em áreas correlatas, PREFERENCIALMENTE EM ELÉTRICA;Disposição para trabalhar viajando por longos períodos;Flexibilidade de horários e de agenda;Conhecimento básico em Microsoft Office necessários para operar dispositivos móveis;CNH Ativa;Leitura e interpretação de desenhos e demais documentos técnicos;Experiência anterior comprovada em funções similares em indústrias e/ou plataformas offshore.BENEFÍCIOSPlano de saúde e seguro dental 100% cobertos pela empresa, extensivo a familiares/dependentes;Seguro de vida;Ticket alimentação;Se você gostou da oportunidade e acredita que tem os requisitos para trabalhar como técnico de serviços Alimak, envie seu currículo indicando no assunto o título da vaga para o email do recrutamento:

title: Site Readiness Engineer
description:
Pathlock is a leader in application security, access governance, and compliance automation. Our cloud-based solutions help organizations secure critical applications, mitigate risk, and enforce policies across a diverse IT landscape.

We are looking for a skilled

Site Readiness Engineer (SRE)

with experGse in CI/CD automaGon and Azure cloud technologies. In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring deployment readiness across our infrastructure, automaGng deployment processes, and maintaining opGmal site performance within our cloud environment.

Key Responsibilities Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines to support application deployment and infrastructure provisioning. Develop and enhance automation scripts to streamline deployment processes and minimize manual tasks. Configure, manage, and optimize cloud resources in alignment with security standards and best practices. Collaborate with development teams to troubleshoot and resolve deployment and site readiness issues. Monitor site performance, identify bottlenecks, and implement improvements to enhance system reliability and efficiency. Participate in on-call rotations to provide production deployment support and incident resolution. Create and maintain technical documentation for deployment processes, system configurations, and troubleshooting procedures. Conduct site readiness assessments and validation tests to ensure infrastructure and applications are production ready. Implement and enforce Infrastructure as Code (IaC) practices using tools such as Terraform and ARM templates. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to deployment failures, infrastructure provisioning, and application performance. Qualifications 3-5 years of experience in site reliability engineering, DevOps, or similar roles Strong proficiency in CI/CD tools such as GitHub Actions, or similar Solid experience with Azure cloud services, including Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), Database services and networking controls Hands-on experience automating deployment workflows and infrastructure provisioning Working knowledge of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform, ARM templates, or similar tools Proficiency in scripting languages such as PowerShell, Bash, Python, or similar Experience with GitOps tools like ArgoCD or Flux Familiarity with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) Strong understanding of networking principles and Azure networking services Knowledge of security best practices for cloud environments Must be able to read and speak fluently in English Must be able to work at least some time in the US or EU time zone Preferred Qualifications Azure certifications (Azure Developer Associate, Azure DevOps Engineer Expert, or Azure Administrator) Experience with monitoring tools such as , Application Insights, ELK or Grafana Experience with log aggregation and analysis tools in particular Elastic and Prometheus Understanding of high availability and disaster recovery concepts Experience with containerized applications with a Windows OS Why Join Pathlock? Opportunity to lead a cutting-edge cloud security platform. Work in a fast-paced, high-growth environment. Competitive compensation, benefits, and equity options. Collaborative and inclusive company culture.

title: Especialista de Desenvolvimento II - Devops
description:
Descrição da vaga Buscamos um especialista de desenvolvimento DevOps um profissional híbrido que atue na ponte entre o desenvolvimento de software e as operações de infraestrutura. Sua principal missão será a criação de novas arquiteturas digitais, principalmente na cloud Azure, baseada nas conversas com o cliente. Automatizar e otimizar os processos de desenvolvimento, entrega e operação de aplicações, garantindo agilidade, qualidade, estabilidade e escalabilidade. Responsabilidades e atribuições - DevOps, CI/CD, automação, infraestrutura, cloud Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform. - Ferramentas: Experiência com ferramentas como Git, Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, e sistemas de configuração como Puppet ou Chef. - Linguagens de Programação: Conhecimento em linguagens como Python, Bash, PowerShell, e outras utilizadas para automação. - Cloud Computing: Experiência comprovada em uma das principais plataformas de cloud computing: Azure - Sistemas Operacionais: Conhecimento em Linux e Windows. - DevOps: Conhecimento dos princípios e práticas do DevOps. - Automação: Criar e manter scripts e ferramentas para automatizar tarefas repetitivas, como provisionamento de servidores, configuração de ambientes, deployment de aplicações e testes. - Infraestrutura: Gerenciar e configurar ambientes de desenvolvimento, testes e produção, utilizando tecnologias como cloud computing (Azure), containers (Docker, Kubernetes), e sistemas de virtualização. - Integração Contínua (CI): Implementar e manter pipelines de CI/CD para automatizar a construção, teste e deploy de software. - Entrega Contínua (CD): Garantir a entrega rápida e confiável de software para produção. Requisitos e qualificações - Mentalidade de resolução de problemas: Capacidade de identificar e resolver problemas de forma rápida e eficiente. - Foco em resultados: Comprometimento em entregar resultados de alta qualidade e superar expectativas. - Proatividade: Busca contínua por melhorias e otimização dos processos. - Colaboração: Habilidade para trabalhar em equipe, boa comunicação e construir relacionamentos fortes. - Aprendizado contínuo: Disposição para aprender novas tecnologias e ferramentas.

Certificação Obrigatória:

Microsoft Certified: Azure Developer Associate Certificação desejável: Microsoft Certified: DevOps Engineer Expert Informações adicionais O que oferecemos para você? ✔Vale Refeição ou Alimentação; ✔Assistência médica e Odontológica; ✔Convênio Farmácia (descontos na compra de medicamentos); ✔Seguro de Vida; ✔Convênio Academia; ✔TIVIT Club (descontos e parcerias com as melhores lojas); ✔PAC - Programa de aceleração de carreira; ✔Reembolso para certificações; ✔MOBIFLIX – Nossa academia corporativa tem cursos presenciais e online, alinhados as novas tendências do mercado de tecnologia; ✔Plataforma online de crédito consignado, a TIVIT te ajuda a realizar os seus objetivos pessoais como reforma no seu apê/casa, financiar estudos e quitar dívidas, de acordo com as regras e políticas da cia; ✔Programa de Apoio Pessoal com orientação psicológica, financeira e jurídica em parceria com a Alelo.

Acreditamos que o presente é plural e a inclusão transforma, por isso, todas as pessoas são bem-vindas em nossas vagas, para promovermos um ambiente de trabalho inclusivo, de respeito, justiça e equidade.

Topa embarcar nesse desafio com a gente? #vemserTIVIT

title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description:
A

Jusfy

está em busca de um

Senior FullStack Developer

para compor o time! Somos uma startup jurídica que busca constantemente soluções para facilitar a vida dos advogados e advogadas brasileiros. Atuamos na área de tecnologia, desenvolvendo produtos e ferramentas que auxiliam na produtividade diária dos nossos clientes. Somos uma empresa jovem e muito promissora. Alcançamos resultados expressivos de crescimento nos últimos anos e sabemos que temos ainda muito mais para conquistar. Buscamos profissionais que queiram fazer parte dessa trajetória junto conosco!

Responsabilidades: Desenvolver novas funcionalidades utilizando ReactJS e APIs RESTful, utilizando Node.js, Express e NestJs; Escrever códigos limpos, de alta qualidade e fácil manutenção seguindo as boas práticas de desenvolvimento; Trabalhar em estreita colaboração com equipes de produto, design e operações para definir requisitos e entregar soluções eficazes; Participar ativamente em discussões de arquitetura e tecnologias; Realizar code reviews, ajudando outros desenvolvedores a melhorar a qualidade do código; Garantir que a documentação do código e arquitetura esteja sempre atualizada.

Requisitos técnicos: Vivência com desenvolvimento de Backend e Frontend; Experiência em Typescript e API REST; Experiência com desenvolvimento de CI/CD utilizando github actions; Conhecimento em bancos de dados relacionais e não-relacionais; Orquestração de containers (Docker e docker-compose); Conhecimento em Styled Components e Context API; Experiência com controle de versão utilizando Git; Prática em Domain-Driven Design (DDD) e aplicação de padrões como CQRS e Clean Architecture; Conhecimento de cloud AWS.

Desejável: Experiência com metodologias ágeis; Experiência em times de desenvolvimento de software ou empresas de tecnologia; Conhecimento em testes automatizados e ferramentas de integração contínua; Conhecimento de Design Patterns; Experiência com micro frontends. Habilidade para trabalhar em equipe e boa comunicação; Boa habilidade de resolução de problemas e pensamento crítico.

Modelo de Contratação: PJ

Oferecemos: Cartão flexível de benefícios. Rotina remota de trabalho; Ambiente de trabalho descontraído e inovador; Oportunidade de trabalhar em projetos desafiadores e com grande impacto.

Como se candidatar Valorizamos perspectivas diversas e incentivamos a candidatura de pessoas com diferentes experiências. Se você é uma pessoa desenvolvedora sênior e está buscando uma oportunidade desafiadora em uma empresa inovadora, preencha o formulário:

title: Analista de Web Analytics Sênior - Exclusivo PCD

title: Arquiteto(a) SAP Basis (Hana DB)
description:
Arquiteto SAP Basis Somos a HCLTech, uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia e DSA que mais crescem no mundo, com mais de 224.000 profissionais espalhados em 60 países, impulsionando o progresso através de recursos líderes do segmento e centrados nas áreas de Digital, Engenharia e Nuvem.

A força motriz por trás desse trabalho, nosso pessoal, é um público diversificado, criativo e apaixonado, o que nos possibilita estar sempre elevando o padrão de excelência de nossos serviços. De nosso lado, trabalhamos para que cada um de nossos profissionais possa atingir seu melhor, ao mesmo tempo em que nos esforçamos para ajudá-los a encontrar sua inspiração diária e, assim, se tornar a melhor versão de si mesmos.

Estamos à procura de um

Arquiteto SAP Basis

altamente talentoso e automotivado para se juntar a nós em nossa jornada para avançar no mundo tecnológico por meio da inovação e criatividade.

Seu Papel & Responsabilidades

Requisitos Inglês avançado (Obrigatório) Experiência com HANA Database (Obrigatório) Experiência com S/4Hana Experiência com Upgrades, Migrações, Implementação (S/4Hana)

Por que nos escolher?

Somos uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia que mais crescem no mundo, com escritórios em mais de 60 países e 224.000 colaboradores. Nossa empresa é extremamente diversificada com 165 nacionalidades representadas.

• Oferecemos a oportunidade de trabalhar com colegas espalhados ao redor do mundo. • Oferecemos um ambiente de trabalho virtual em primeiro lugar, promovendo uma boa integração entre seu trabalho e vida pessoal, em uma flexibilidade real. • Estamos comprometidos com seu crescimento, oferecendo oportunidades de aprendizado e desenvolvimento de carreira em todos os níveis para ajudá-lo a encontrar seu brilho único. • Oferecemos benefícios abrangentes para todos os funcionários. • Somos certificados como "Great Place to Work" e "Top Employer" em 17 países, e reconhecidos como “Top Employer” no Brasil especificamente, oferecendo um ambiente de trabalho positivo que valoriza o reconhecimento e o respeito dos funcionários.

Igualdade & Oportunidade para Todos

Representando 165 nacionalidades em todo o mundo, nos orgulhamos de ser um empregador que oferece igualdade de oportunidades, comprometido em fornecer oportunidades iguais de emprego a todos os candidatos e funcionários, independentemente de raça, religião, sexo, cor, idade, nacionalidade, gravidez, orientação sexual, deficiência física ou informações genéticas, ou qualquer outra classificação protegida, de acordo com as leis federais, estaduais e/ou locais.

title: Full-Stack Developer
description:
Job Title: FULL STACK DEVELOPER (REMOTE)

About: Flatiron is a global remote software development company with engineers located around the world. We unite experts from diverse backgrounds and experiences in a collaborative culture to deliver exceptional products and services for our clients. As a forward-thinking software engineering company, we provide industry-leading solutions to complex problems in both the US and the UK. Operating in a fast-paced, agile environment, we specialize in software consulting for our clients. We offer a stimulating and rewarding environment for our team members. We value innovation, continuous learning, and professional growth, and we strive to create a workplace where everyone can thrive. Join us at Flatiron and be a part of a team that is shaping the future of software development.

Job Summary This is a full-time, fully remote working opportunity where you will be working as part of a Scrum team, collaborating closely with other software engineers, stakeholders, and contributors on the project. The role requires working within the US timezone. Actively participating in meetings, engaging in decision-making processes, and working cross-functionally with internal and external teams are essential responsibilities.

Responsibilities Develop high-quality software design and architecture using JavaScript. Implement and manage tracking solutions using

Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and Google Pixel

to optimize data collection and reporting. Identify, prioritize, and execute tasks in the software development life cycle. Review and debug JavaScript code to ensure optimal performance. Integrate and configure event tracking, conversion tracking, and custom analytics solutions. Collaborate with internal teams and vendors to fix and improve products. Document development phases, maintain tracking configurations, and monitor system performance. Attend Scrum meetings and actively contribute to project decisions.

Minimum Qualifications Advanced level of written and oral English proficiency. 4+ years of software development experience with a strong focus on

JavaScript . Hands-on experience with

Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and Google Pixel . Proficiency with other server-side languages such as

Python, Ruby, Java, or PHP . Familiarity with database technologies such as

MySQL, Oracle, or MongoDB . Strong understanding of

Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles . Experience working in

Agile development environments .

Benefits Yearly Office Allowance Budget Macbook Purchase Support Wellbeing Support

If you are a good fit for the position, please apply through . We only accept CVs that are in English.

Flatiron has a zero tolerance to discrimination policy. In this regard, during the course of the evaluation of your job application and all your employment relation, if any, all discriminatory factors such as race, sex, sexual orientation, social gender definitions/roles, color, national or social background, ethnicity, religion, age, disablement, political opinion or any status that is protected under law shall be disregarded.
