description:
Buscamos um

Desenvolvedor Backend Sênior

para fortalecer nosso time de tecnologia e garantir escalabilidade, segurança e performance em nossos sistemas.

Responsabilidades Desenvolver e otimizar APIs robustas e escaláveis. Projetar e implementar arquiteturas eficientes para alto volume de dados. Garantir segurança e performance das aplicações backend. title: SAP MDG Senior Consultant
description:
About Us Syniti

is

the

enterprise data partner, empowering anyone who relies on data to make business-critical decisions by delivering data they can trust through a unique combination of intelligent software and experts who deeply understand the role of data in enterprise growth. Trusted by the Fortune 2000, Syniti helps leading businesses reconfigure the role of enterprise data from afterthought to foundational first step; enabling them to unlock valuable insights that ignite growth, reduce risk, and expand their competitive advantage.

Syniti’s

Data First

philosophy and enterprise data management platform supports data migration, data quality, data replication, data matching, master data management, analytics, data governance, and data strategy in a single, unified solution.

As an innovative, global leader in Enterprise Data Management, the combination of our award-winning software platform and premier consultants creates a unique advantage for leading enterprises. Syniti is also a preferred data solution used by the

world’s top system integrators . Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with offices in 25 countries around the world, Syniti operates in all global regions and industry verticals, and maintains a 100% client success rate across thousands of complex data projects and initiatives.

THE ROLE Master Data Governance consultant, responsible for functional and technical support/maintenance of master data objects in SAP MDG, ECC, S4H, FIORI.

What You Will Do Planning and execution of activities related to the implementation of the SAP-MDG solution. Key Responsibilities : Evaluation of the current information management of Architecture-Data (AS IS) and future model profiling (TO BE). SAP MDG Implementation: management of design and implementation phases( technical and functional ). Design and execution master data configurations for main catalogs governed by MDG: clients – vendors (BP figure), products, materials and finances, including data harmonization that involves de-duplication and massive changes. Generation of technical requirements to ensure that the technological environment allows the replication of data in different instances-related modules. Generate SAP product and solution roadmaps around the defined data strategy. Communicate effectively with clients and stakeholders to understand specific business data needs and to translate those requirements into a comprehensive solution. Workplan follow-up and progress reports.

What It Takes +3 years’ experience MDG implementation projects: initial, roll out and upgrades +5 year experience in SAP technologies related Understanding the SAP MDG technical framework: BADI, BAPI / RFC / FM, workflows, BRF +, business services, IDOC, Floorplan Manager, WebDynPro, Fiori y API de MDG. Conducted previous SAP MDG Implementations, technical and functional phases. Knowledge of SAP data dictionary tables, views, relationships and correspondence of data architecture for ECC and S4HANA for various SAP master and transactional data entities, including a great depth of functional and knowledge of central master data objects such as customers, vendors, materials and finance specific data. Ability to transform business and operational needs into technical solutions. Extensive knowledge of SAP best practices and ASAP methodology (SAP certifications a plus Effective communication and development of work teams, as well as relationship with client teams related to the project. Goal Oriented Fluent English (Advance-Native Level, oral-written)

Be fully aligned to the our core values: Think Big - Be courageous and bold. Aspire to greatness. Relentlessly pursue market innovation. Set the standard by which others follow. Create solutions that have a meaningful impact. Solve the challenges our customers don’t know they have. Be Curious - Be a lifelong learner. Seek out new ideas to serve customers. Understand our competition and the world. Be permanently dissatisfied with the status quo. Challenge preconceptions. Focus on the future rather than yesterday. Take Action - Be the first. Don’t wait. Take accountability. Inspire others by doing. Fail fast and learn from mistakes. Make a difference every day. Stronger Together - Respect, trust and look out for each other. Celebrate diverse perspectives. Listen. Build connections and belonging. Act with integrity. Give back. One Syniti family.

What We Offer Trust that you are good at what you’re doing. At Syniti you will find a supportive environment and access to learning tools, but micromanagement is not our thing. Growth. We are growing rapidly and steadily solving the biggest challenges enterprise companies are faced with today. There was never a better time to join and grow with us. Most importantly you will have the chance to shape our journey and share in our success story. Support. We all rely on each other and enable each other to be successful. You won’t stand alone. Curiosity and genuine interest in you. We all have our different stories, all equally fascinating with each depicting a different journey and we want to hear them all. Recognition. We are the sum of individual achievements and we always take the time to celebrate them. An open organisation. Hierarchies are not our thing and access is something we make sure of across the board. We are a family where everyone is just as important, everyone’s work is seen and ideas valued.

title: Compensation Advisor (North America)
description:
We are seeking an experienced Total Rewards professional to deliver compensation solutions to our North America geography. Sitting within the global Total Rewards function in HR, this role will work with multiple groups within and outside of HR, including Talent Advisors, Executive Compensation, HR Services, and Finance, and encompasses a mix of project work and “business as usual” activities. The Role Support the aligned Compensation Lead in the design and implementation of broad-based compensation initiatives and project work streams, ensuring effective solutions. Develop compensation solutions, including retention proposals, senior offer proposals, incentive plan designs Advise client groups on broad-based compensation issues and processes, in line with WTW’s compensation philosophy. Support the delivery of the annual compensation review process end-to-end process, including partnering with the assigned client group and/or delivering on compensation operations workstreams. Manage processes related to compensation changes throughout the year (mid-year, off-cycle), working with assigned client groups, providing advice to ensure an effective process. Manage benchmarking requests with the support of the analyst team. Execute compensation analysis and outline key findings in compelling proposals to facilitate decision-making Lead or contribute to compensation projects, from planning/design to successful execution. Work with stakeholders and client groups to understand specific local compensation-related issues and develop effective solutions. Provide compensation expertise and training to assigned clients group to ensure all compensation related activities are understood and delivered effectively.

The Requirements Experience in a Compensation Advisor/Manager role, including delivering annual compensation review, benchmarking, and development of compensation proposals and analysis Continuous improvement mindset and ability to identify opportunities for improvement Experience leading or contributing effectively to projects within Total Rewards environments Advanced Excel and Powerpoint skills Exceptional client relationship skills; ability to develop strong relationships quickly and maximize resources effectively to achieve goals Strong organizational abilities and flexibility to work in a performance-driven environment managing multiple deliverables Understanding of the compensation market, trends, regulations, and economic environment impacting it Advanced English

Desirable: Experience working remotely in a global organisation PowerBI skills or advanced reporting/analytics skills Degree or equivalent in human resources, business or related field preferred

Remote work

Equal Opportunity Employer

title: Machine Learning Engineer | Sponsor US H1B
description:
Project Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled and versatile Machine Learning and Data Engineer to join our team. This role involves developing sophisticated image-based solutions for plant phenotyping and pulling, stitching, and wrangling data from various sources for advanced analytics. The successful candidate will work on a cross-functional team, collaborating closely with crop scientists, plant pathologists, cloud engineers, and data scientists to enable access to relevant data and deploy machine-learning models and solutions.

Responsibilities: Develop and implement image-based solutions for quantifying various traits and features of plants. Pull data from first and third-party sources, prepare it for analysis by filtering, tagging, joining, parsing, and normalizing datasets. Collaborate with team members to research data sources, design and deploy data loaders, and ensure the availability of data for analytical activities. Provide technical expertise in the design and implementation of data management and architecture solutions. Develop, evolve, and implement concepts of data ops in partnership with cloud and ML engineers. Architect, develop, deliver, and support ML products and solutions, ensuring successful deployment into production. Automate model training, testing, and deployment processes. Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines and ETL processes.

Requirements: Master’s degree or higher in Data Science, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Robotics, Physics, Mathematics, or related fields. Deep understanding and experience with Image Theory, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Python Programming, TensorFlow, or PyTorch. Strong experience in designing and implementing large-scale data processing, analysis, and exploration solutions. Proficiency in R, Python, advanced SQL skills, and a good understanding of data management principles. Experience with cloud technologies (Azure or GCP preferred) and deploying CI/CD pipelines. Knowledge of Git, PySpark, Data Bricks, and database management (SQL/PLSQL/Snowflake preferred). Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently and collaborate across teams. 2+ years of industry or academia experience in image processing, computer vision, or related fields.

Work Details: Location: Remote, candidates must work in the PST time zone. Work Hours: 40 hours per week. We sponsor US work visa after 1 year of service

title: Renewable Energy / Energy Efficiency Experts - EIB Framework Contract EIBAS LOT 2
description:
NTU International A/S, leading a strong international consortium, is proud to have been awarded the next 4 years of EIBAS FWC LOT 2!

We are building up a pool of experts who will be interested in short term assignments on the various EIB priorities under this framework contract.

Keep updated and follow us at

for more information on our projects.

Position : Energy Specialist Location : Inside and outside EU-27 Assignment duration : 48 months Project budge t: 20M EUR

Qualifications and skills: At least 10 years professional experience in the field of: energy supply, renewable energy, energy infrastructure, energy efficiency, energy innovation, etc. Experience working with EU, EIB, WB etc. financed projects. A Master’s Degree or Bachelor's Degree relevant to the topic

Specific professional experience within at least one of the following sectors: Energy Supply: · Power generation and cogeneration: low-carbon power and CHP plants, carbon capture use and storage, renewable energy (hydro, wind energy, ocean, solar, geothermal, biomass, biogas, and waste to energy). · Heat production from renewable sources; · Efficient gas-fired small boilers applicable for buildings or SMEs; · Production and storage of gaseous, liquid and solid energy carriers from low-carbon energy sources; · Supply and processing of Critical Raw Material needed for key low-carbon technologies and/or energy transition in the EU.

Enabling Infrastructure: · Electricity transmission and distribution infrastructure, including storage. · Gas infrastructure: 1. connection to new sources of low carbon gases, 2. gas network projects that are planned to transport low carbon gases, including the rehabilitation and adaptation of existing gas infrastructures when it is part of this goal, 3. smart meters intended to reduce gas consumption. · District heating and cooling infrastructure, including storage. · Smart energy grids and smart meters

Energy Efficiency: · Energy efficiency in buildings (residential and non-residential sectors); · Energy efficiency in public lighting. · Energy efficiency and low-carbon technologies and processes in industrial facilities and SMEs;

Energy intensive industries and corresponding processes: · Carbon emission reduction technologies for iron and steel, refining, chemicals, cement, glass, paper refining and other industries

I nnovation: energy intensive industries and new types of energy infrastructure: · Corporate or national RDI programmes; · Commercial demonstration of innovative technologies, including demonstration projects, innovative manufacturing processes, and innovative low-carbon technologies in energy-intensive industries; · Technologies and business models that contribute to the implementation of the EU Strategic Energy Technology plan or decarbonisation of EII, including renewables, carbon capture use and storage, cross sectoral projects, sector coupling, circular economy pathways, electrification, biomass as feedstock, innovative energy carriers, nuclear fission and fusion; · New types of energy infrastructure including batteries and innovative energy storage technologies, demand response, market participants engaged in aggregation, electrification of transport, heating, digitalisation projects in energy sector; all projects that contribute towards sector coupling and increased flexibility of energy systems.

Language skills: · Excellent command of English (CEFR C1) (Minimum requirement)

If you are interested in this position, please apply and upload your CV. Please also make sure that you include one or more telephone numbers.

The work location is Remote.

Please note that only selected candidates will be contacted.

title: UX/UI DESIGNER SÊNIOR - JOVEM NERD
description:
Como UX/UI Designer Senior você vai liderar, junto ao time de projetos e tecnologia, o planejamento, concepção e implementação de produtos digitais com o objetivo de elevar as experiências dos usuários em nossos canais, em diferentes projetos e frentes de atuação.

Será responsável por acompanhar o comportamento dos usuários nos diferentes canais da marca, identificar melhorias, desenvolver interfaces de usuário complexas e coordenar suas entregas para assegurar que todos os aspectos do design e experiência sejam consistentes e de alta qualidade.

Você é um designer experiente que compreende seu papel estratégico no desenvolvimento de produtos e terá um papel crucial na orientação e interação com desenvolvedores, áreas de negócio e nos diferentes processos do nosso time.

Requisitos Experiência em design de produtos digitais; Ampla experiência trabalhando com produtos para web e mobile nativo (desejável repertório em produtos B2C, de entretenimento ou de conteúdo); Comprovada habilidade em manutenção e iteração de produtos digitais; Habilidade de vestir o chapéu de Product Owner e pensar produtos através da ótica do impacto nos negócios e experiência dos usuários; Habilidade em trabalhar dentro de metodologias ágeis; Conhecimento avançado em ferramentas como Figma, Photoshop e processos de pesquisa com usuários; Diferencial: conhecimento em Google Analytics e outras ferramentas para análise de dados de comportamento do usuário; Experiência mínima de 4 anos atuando como UX/UI Designer; Comprovação da experiência por portfólio de projetos (enviar o link no cadastro da vaga).

title: Data Analyst
description:
Onebridge is a Consulting firm with an HQ in Indianapolis, and clients dispersed throughout the United States and beyond. We have an exciting opportunity for a highly skilled Data Analyst to join an innovative and dynamic group of professionals at a company rated among the top “Best Places to Work” in Indianapolis since 2015.

Employment Type:

Full Time Location:

Remote - Brazil Industry:

IT & Services, Data & Analytics, Healthcare.

Data Analyst | About You As a Data Analyst, you focus on analyzing and interpreting data to provide insights that drive business decisions and improve system performance. You gather requirements from both internal teams and clients, identify data trends, and offer actionable recommendations. You are passionate about using data to solve business challenges, whether it’s identifying trends, troubleshooting data issues, or supporting decision-making processes. You bring strong analytical skills and attention to detail, ensuring data integrity and clarity in your reports.

Data Analyst | Day-to-Day Analyze and interpret data to identify trends, anomalies, and insights that impact business processes and system performance. Troubleshoot and resolve data-related issues, working closely with clients and internal teams to ensure data accuracy. Manage and resolve ServiceNow tickets related to data issues, ensuring timely resolution. Gather data requirements from stakeholders, documenting them to ensure accurate reporting and analysis. Provide actionable recommendations based on data analysis, supporting better business decisions.

Data Analyst | Skills & Experience 5+ years of experience as a Data Analyst, with expertise in data analysis and problem-solving. Advanced proficiency in SQL for data extraction, manipulation, and analysis. Familiarity with ERP systems, ensuring smooth data flows between systems and business processes. Fluent in English, with excellent communication skills to work with international clients and technical teams. Experience with Tableau for creating reports and visualizations is a bonus.

A Best Place to Work in Indiana since 2015

title: Senior Software Engineer - Android
description:
Design, develop, and prototype Android native customer applications for internal and external use. Participate in full app life cycle: concept, design, build, deploy, test and release to app store. Work with product teams on new product ideas, designs, prototypes and estimates. Keep up-to-date on current and upcoming features in relevant products and platforms. Drive a best practices approach to the continuous improvement of our products, processes, and tools. Assist in the creation and maintenance of documentation for all features in development

What You’ll Do: Work cross-functionally with product, design, and other engineering counterparts to execute on product and business strategy and build novel products and features that our users will love. Contribute to the full development cycle: technical design, development, test, experimentation, analysis, and launch. You’ll be reviewing code and design docs, giving feedback on product specs and mocks. Set and define standards that improve developer workflows, recommend best practices, and help coach and mentor engineers on the team to further their professional development. Continuously learn and improve your technical and non-technical abilities.

Who You Might Be: Expertise in Java or Kotlin, with 5+ years of experience in Android development. Sound software engineering fundamentals. Able to embrace the challenges of building data intensive, highly responsive, and fault tolerant apps in the constrained environment of a smartphone. Passion for developing scalable, well-designed software that improves people’s lives globally. Experience building at least one amazing Android app with a team from start to shipment. Strong organizational skills, the ability to prioritize tasks and keep projects on schedule. BS degree in Computer Science, a similar technical field of study, or equivalent practical experience. Entrepreneurial spirit. You are self-directed, innovative, and biased towards action in fast-paced environments. You love to build new things and thrive in ambiguity and even failure. Excellent communication skills. You collaborate effectively with teams in a fully remote environment and discuss complex topics with technical and non-technical audiences.

title: Product Manager (Fiscal)
description:
O(a)

Product Manager

terá o papel de liderar a criação e implementação de

soluções fiscais

inovadoras e de alta qualidade, que estejam em conformidade com as exigências legais e de compliance, além de atender às mudanças da reforma tributária. O objetivo é impulsionar o sucesso do negócio com soluções que agreguem valor ao usuário final e mantenham a competitividade no mercado fiscal.

Topa o desafio? #wewantyou

Aqui na Sankhya buscamos novas formas de solução, que sejam menos complexas, autênticas e únicas. E com isso queremos pessoas que desejem crescer a cada dia junto com a empresa, ajudando a gente a construir cada vez mais um ambiente diverso e de crescimento acelerado.

Responsabilidades e atribuições

• Definir e implementar a visão, estratégia e roadmap dos produtos fiscais, garantindo o alinhamento com as mudanças regulatórias e as necessidades do mercado. • Priorizar e especificar funcionalidades complexas, garantindo clareza e detalhes adequados para a execução pelas equipes de desenvolvimento. • Colaborar com equipes multifuncionais (engenharia, produtos, design e compliance) para garantir a entrega das funcionalidades no prazo e em conformidade com as legislações. • Analisar o mercado e a concorrência para identificar oportunidades de crescimento, diferenciação e inovação. • Gerenciar o ciclo de vida dos produtos fiscais, assegurando que estejam em conformidade contínua com as exigências fiscais e de compliance. • Identificar e resolver problemas críticos que possam comprometer a qualidade e a eficiência dos lançamentos. • Coletar feedback dos usuários e realizar revisões pós lançamento para implementar melhorias contínuas nos produtos. • Comunicar-se de forma eficaz com diferentes níveis da organização, desde equipes técnicas até executivos de alto escalão (C-Level), alinhando expectativas e integrando feedback no desenvolvimento dos produtos. • Influenciar stakeholders internos e externos para garantir a entrega de valor contínuo e alinhamento com as necessidades do mercado e da empresa.

Requisitos e qualificações

• Experiência comprovada em gestão de produtos, com foco em produtos fiscais ou de compliance tributário. • Conhecimento sólido da legislação fiscal vigente (além de acompanhamento para conhecimento sobre a reforma tributária que entrará em vigor nos próximos anos). • Experiência em metodologias ágeis e integração de sistemas fiscais (ERP). • Conhecimento em plataformas de aplicações distribuídas, escaláveis e com grande volumetria será um grande diferencial. • Forte habilidade analítica para criar especificações detalhadas (user stories, casos de uso) e definir critérios de aceitação. • Experiência em análise de dados e uso de ferramentas para gerar insights que orientem decisões de produto. • Conhecimento em UX Design para garantir que as soluções atendam às necessidades dos usuários finais. • Habilidade de comunicação eficaz para gerenciar interações com diferentes públicos da organização, desde equipes técnicas até executivos de alto nível (C-Level).

Localidade | Atuação

Uberlândia/MG: Presencial São Paulo/SP: Híbrido (3vz na semana no escritório) Demais localidades: Remoto

Informações adicionais

Benefícios que vão além da Jornada Sankher

Na Sankhya, valorizamos a individualidade e acreditamos em proporcionar benefícios que vão além do básico, promovendo a liberdade e o equilíbrio entre vida pessoal e profissional. Nosso objetivo é oferecer todo o apoio necessário para que você se sinta bem e satisfeito em todas as áreas da sua vida.

Horário Flexível: Adapte sua rotina de trabalho para equilibrar melhor suas responsabilidades pessoais e profissionais. Licença Maternidade e Paternidade Estendida: Mais tempo para estar presente nos primeiros momentos da vida do seu bebê. Kit Baby Sankher: Um kit especial para dar as boas-vindas ao novo membro da família. ⚖️ Assistência Jurídica: Apoio jurídico para questões pessoais e profissionais. Auxílio Creche: Contribuição para despesas com creche. Cuidados com a Saúde: Plano de saúde com ampla cobertura, telemedicina gratuita e acesso a apps especialistas para cuidar do que mais importa – você. Plano Odontológico: Cobertura odontológica para você e sua família. Day OFF no Aniversário: Um dia de folga para celebrar seu aniversário. Empréstimo Consignado: Empréstimos com condições especiais. ️ Auxílio vida saudável: Parceria com apps de saúde com acesso a academias e bem estar. Indicação de Talentos e Clientes Premiadas: Recompensas por indicações bem-sucedidas. Massoterapia no Escritório: Sessões de massagem para relaxar e aliviar o estresse. Participação nos Lucros e Resultados (PLR): Participação nos resultados financeiros da empresa. Seguro de Vida: Proteção financeira para você e sua família. Vale Alimentação/Refeição iFood: Opções de alimentação flexíveis. Vale Transporte: Auxílio para deslocamento. Equipamentos Fornecidos pela Empresa: Ferramentas de trabalho de qualidade.

Desenvolvimento e Evolução

Um dos nossos valores fundamentais é o desenvolvimento contínuo. Queremos que todos os nossos colaboradores estejam sempre aprendendo, crescendo e se desenvolvendo, pois nossa empresa está em constante evolução.

Universidade Corporativa Sankhya: Acesso a uma vasta gama de cursos e treinamentos. Plano de Performance e Desenvolvimento Individual: Plano personalizado para seu crescimento profissional. Touchpoints de Evolução com a Liderança: Encontros regulares com líderes para discutir seu progresso e desenvolvimento. Cursos Online 100% Custeados pela Empresa: Aprendizado contínuo sem custo para você. Auxílio Idiomas: Suporte para aprendizado de novas línguas. title: UX/Product Design Lead
description:
Capgemini is seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented UX/Product Design Lead for a top 10 US Insurance Carrier.

This role is responsible for designing engaging, intuitive, and effective digital experience. Provides a leadership role on projects to ensure project and user success by taking a broad view of the problem space that identifies root causes and actively works with business groups to resolve them. Collaborates with product owners, user research, and developers to problem solve through design exploration, ideation, and user validation

Our Client is one of the United States’ largest insurers, providing a wide range of insurance and financial services products with gross written premium well over US$25 Billion (P&C). They proudly serve more than 10 million U.S. households with more than 19 million individual policies across all 50 states through the efforts of over 48,000 exclusive and independent agents and nearly 18,500 employees. Finally, our Client is part of one the largest Insurance Groups in the world.

Responsibilities Understand desires of client and create attractive product Work closely with product managers and other teams (sales and marketing) to establish plan for product release Acknowledge budget and make plans in order to follow financial guidelines Create product prototypes prior to creating final product Adjust approach towards designs based on feedback provided

Requirements Work Experience in This Field: 7-9 years Experience with complex digital product design required Online portfolio showcasing recent work demonstrating a strong sense of design clarity is required in order to be considered English Proficiency: Fluent Required Education: Bachelor's degree preferred Online portfolio showcasing recent work required in order to be considered Required Branches of Study Design Human-Computer Interaction, or related Additional Preferred Branches of Study Cognitive Psychology Computer Science Other Critical Skills Product Design - Advanced User Research - Advanced Product Management - Advanced Software / Tool Skills Figma - Advanced UI/UX - Advanced Skills: Human Centered Design Problem-solving Proactive in seeking out problems Curiosity Collaboration Humility Encouraging team participation and contribution Focus on user outcomes Super communication Attention to detail

Benefits:

This position comes with competitive compensation and benefits package: Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses Comprehensive benefits package Career development and training opportunities Flexible work arrangements (remote and/or office-based) Dynamic and inclusive work culture within a globally reknowned group Private Health Insurance Pension Plan Paid Time Off Training & Development

About Capgemini Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group €22.5 billion in revenues in 2023.

title: API PRD Writer || 2Months Project
description:
We are looking candidates with engineering and product teams to enhance API usability and efficiency. Job Responsibilities: Write clear, structured, and detailed API specifications, ensuring comprehensive endpoint documentation. Define data schemas, business rules, and validation logic, incorporating cross-resource dependencies. Establish error handling standards and validation rules to improve API reliability and consistency. Collaborate with engineering and product teams to refine API specifications and ensure seamless integration. Develop API documentation using Markdown, OpenAPI/Swagger, JSON Schema, and tools such as Postman or Stoplight. Job Requirements: API Design Expertise

– Experience in designing RESTful APIs for complex systems, handling at least 5+ related API resources (e.g., database tables, microservices). Data Modeling & Schema Design

– Strong understanding of relational and non-relational data structures, constraints, and validation rules. API Documentation Standards

– Proficiency with Markdown, OpenAPI/Swagger, JSON Schema, and documentation tools like Postman, Stoplight, or ReadMe.io. Technical Writing

– Ability to write clear, structured, and unambiguous API specifications, covering business rules and edge cases. HTTP & REST Protocol Knowledge

– Deep understanding of HTTP methods, response codes, headers, authentication, and error handling. API Lifecycle Management

– Familiarity with API versioning strategies, deprecation policies, and backward compatibility. Testing & Validation

– Experience with API contract testing, automated validation, and error response consistency. Domain Knowledge: Business Logic Translation

– Ability to convert complex business requirements into well-structured API specifications. Cross-Resource Rules

– Expertise in defining relationships, dependencies, and constraints across multiple API resources. Edge Case Handling

– Ability to anticipate and document exceptional scenarios and fallback mechanisms. Validation Logic

– Strong understanding of input validation, error messages, and business rule enforcement. Soft Skills: Exceptional Technical Writing

– Ability to produce detailed, precise, and easy-to-understand documentation in professional English. Attention to Detail

– Ensures that schemas, business rules, and validation logic are meticulously defined. Systems Thinking

– Understands how API components interact within larger system architectures. Problem Solving & Conflict Resolution

– Can navigate technical trade-offs, edge cases, and changing requirements effectively. Collaboration & Adaptability

– Works effectively with engineering, product teams, and stakeholders to refine API specs. Deliverable Expectations: Candidates must demonstrate the ability to create API PRDs that include: Complete Data Schemas

– All fields, types, constraints, and relationships. Comprehensive Endpoint Documentation

– Including request/response examples, parameters, and authentication details. Business Logic & Validation Rules

– Both resource-specific and cross-resource rules. Detailed API Endpoints & Error Handling

– Covering status codes, failure scenarios, and best practices for API consumers. Implementation Guidance

– Ensuring development teams can execute API designs without ambiguity.

title: AI Platform Engineer
description:
We are looking for an

AI Platform Engineer

to lead the adoption, integration, and operationalization of AI tooling across our organization. This role will focus on enabling teams to work more efficiently by implementing AI-powered solutions, best practices, and MLOps strategies. The ideal candidate has

proven experience working with engineering and technology companies to drive AI adoption across engineering, sales, and marketing , ensuring AI initiatives deliver measurable impact and efficiency gains.

This role requires a combination of

technical expertise

in AI/ML infrastructure,

strategic thinking

to identify high-value AI opportunities, and

cross-functional collaboration

to help teams seamlessly integrate AI into their workflows. The AI Platform Engineer will play a key role in

automating processes, optimizing team operations, and ensuring AI solutions align with business goals .

Key Responsibilities:

AI Tooling & Infrastructure:

Design, implement, and scale AI/ML tooling that improves team efficiency, streamlines workflows, and enhances automation. MLOps Best Practices:

Help engineering teams implement effective MLOps processes, including model deployment, monitoring, and lifecycle management. Cross-Team Collaboration:

Work closely with software engineering, data science, and operations teams to integrate AI capabilities into their workflows. AI Adoption & Enablement:

Drive organization-wide adoption of AI by identifying key pain points, providing education, and ensuring seamless integration of AI solutions. Automation & Efficiency:

Develop AI-powered automation solutions to reduce manual work, improve productivity, and optimize team operations. Scalability & Performance:

Ensure AI infrastructure and workflows are scalable, resilient, and efficient to support company-wide initiatives. Security & Compliance:

Implement AI governance, security best practices, and compliance measures to align with organizational and regulatory standards. Monitoring & Evaluation:

Establish metrics and feedback loops to measure the impact of AI tooling on team efficiencies and continuously improve processes.

Qualifications:

Technical Expertise:

5+ years of experience in software engineering, MLOps, or AI infrastructure roles. Strong programming skills in Python, Go, or another relevant language. Experience with AI/ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face. Proficiency in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and AI/ML services. Hands-on experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and orchestration tools. Familiarity with AI observability, monitoring, and governance tools. Strong understanding of CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code (Terraform, Pulumi), and automation best practices.

MLOps & AI Operations:

Experience implementing MLOps pipelines for model training, deployment, and monitoring. Familiarity with vector databases, feature stores, and AI-powered search. Knowledge of distributed computing and optimizing AI workloads for efficiency. Soft Skills & Adoption Focus: Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills to identify high-impact AI solutions. Ability to work cross-functionally and communicate effectively with non-technical stakeholders. Strong ability to drive change, facilitate AI adoption, and enable teams to succeed with AI-driven processes. Passion for AI automation, operational efficiency, and developer experience.

Success Metrics for This Role:

Adoption Rate:

Increase in AI tooling adoption across engineering, sales, and marketing teams. Efficiency Gains:

Measurable reductions in manual effort and time spent on repetitive tasks. MLOps Maturity:

Improved model deployment velocity and reliability through MLOps best practices. Developer Productivity:

Reduction in friction for AI-enabled engineering teams. Feedback & Iteration:

Continuous improvement based on team feedback and usage metrics.

Please answer the questions in detail in the given link to move forward with the screening process.

Answer the questions

title: Desenvolvedor (a) BackEnd Java/Node Pleno
description:
Buscamos um (a) desenvolvedor (a) de software pleno, para fazer parte da Tribo Serviços de Logística.

Este profissional atuará em projetos responsáveis por gerar ferramentas para que os parceiros do Magalu, que vendem dentro do nosso Marketplace, possam gerir e operar sua logística. Esta atuação se dá desde apoiar as definições de arquitetura, até o desenvolvimento e acompanhamento das entregas de funcionalidades dos projetos.

Esperamos que o profissional seja capaz de:

Criar aplicações do zero, considerando arquitetura, dependências e testes, seguindo boas práticas de desenvolvimento. Priorizar qualidade de software e manutenibilidade. Refatorar e dar manutenção em projetos maduros. Identificar e priorizar dívidas técnicas, visando redução de custos e melhoria de performance. Testar e validar entregas em ambiente de homologação. Auxiliar na documentação dos produtos. Suportar o Product Manager, alinhando desenvolvimento e negócios. Contribuir nas cerimônias ágeis, como Kanban e Scrum. Compartilhar conhecimento com a equipe.

Esperamos que este profissional, tenha experiência como pleno com:

Desenho e aplicação de arquitetura de software; Lógica de programação; Padrões de projeto - Design Patterns; Desenvolvimento de API (RESTful); Sistemas distribuídos com baixa latência, resiliência e escalabilidade; Monitoramento de aplicações; Validação de qualidade de código - Code Quality; Estruturas de dados (banco relacional, não relacional); Mensagerias (RabbitMQ, Kafka); Documentação para gestão de mudanças - GMUD; Integração e entrega contínua - CI/CD ; Ferramentas DevOps (GitLab, Docker, Kubernetes, Grafana, etc); Testes de software (TDD, BDD, etc); Linguagens de programação: Java e Typescript (Node); Implementação de front end e micro front end utilizando React, HTML e CSS.

Benefícios que oferecemos:

VR/VA, Vale Transporte, Assistência Médica e Odontológica e Auxílio Creche. Gympass para bem-estar e saúde. Bolsa de estudo com até 50% de desconto. Descontos especiais nas empresas do Grupo Magalu (Magalu, Netshoes, Época Cosméticos, Estante Virtual, Kabum entre outras). Auxílio Creche

Modelo de Trabalho

Adotamos o modelo 100% remoto, proporcionando flexibilidade, enquanto mantém a interação virtual com a equipe para garantir uma colaboração eficaz e um ambiente de crescimento contínuo. ‘’Se você busca um ambiente de crescimento e desafios,

Vem ser feliz’’! Nossos valores nos unem e nossas diferenças nos potencializam como um grupo. Mais do que igualdade, buscamos equidade: Aqui, temos espaço para sermos autênticos, independentemente de gênero, etnia, raça, orientação sexual, clero ou deficiência.

Como é o ambiente de trabalho? No Luizalabs, temos grande autonomia e responsabilidade, somos multidisciplinares, auto gerenciáveis e com pouca burocracia no nosso cotidiano. Buscamos romper as barreiras que diminuem nossa capacidade de agregar valor ao negócio. Fazemos entregas frequentes e agimos rapidamente ao encontrar problemas; nosso ritmo é acelerado, mas temos tranquilidade e equilíbrio para planejar e executar nossas tarefas com qualidade.

title: SAP MDG Senior Consultant
description:
About Us Syniti

is

the

enterprise data partner, empowering anyone who relies on data to make business-critical decisions by delivering data they can trust through a unique combination of intelligent software and experts who deeply understand the role of data in enterprise growth. Trusted by the Fortune 2000, Syniti helps leading businesses reconfigure the role of enterprise data from afterthought to foundational first step; enabling them to unlock valuable insights that ignite growth, reduce risk, and expand their competitive advantage.

Syniti’s

Data First

philosophy and enterprise data management platform supports data migration, data quality, data replication, data matching, master data management, analytics, data governance, and data strategy in a single, unified solution.

As an innovative, global leader in Enterprise Data Management, the combination of our award-winning software platform and premier consultants creates a unique advantage for leading enterprises. Syniti is also a preferred data solution used by the

world’s top system integrators . Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with offices in 25 countries around the world, Syniti operates in all global regions and industry verticals, and maintains a 100% client success rate across thousands of complex data projects and initiatives.

THE ROLE Master Data Governance consultant, responsible for functional and technical support/maintenance of master data objects in SAP MDG, ECC, S4H, FIORI.

What You Will Do Planning and execution of activities related to the implementation of the SAP-MDG solution. Key Responsibilities : Evaluation of the current information management of Architecture-Data (AS IS) and future model profiling (TO BE). SAP MDG Implementation: management of design and implementation phases( technical and functional ). Design and execution master data configurations for main catalogs governed by MDG: clients – vendors (BP figure), products, materials and finances, including data harmonization that involves de-duplication and massive changes. Generation of technical requirements to ensure that the technological environment allows the replication of data in different instances-related modules. Generate SAP product and solution roadmaps around the defined data strategy. Communicate effectively with clients and stakeholders to understand specific business data needs and to translate those requirements into a comprehensive solution. Workplan follow-up and progress reports.

What It Takes +3 years’ experience MDG implementation projects: initial, roll out and upgrades +5 year experience in SAP technologies related Understanding the SAP MDG technical framework: BADI, BAPI / RFC / FM, workflows, BRF +, business services, IDOC, Floorplan Manager, WebDynPro, Fiori y API de MDG. Conducted previous SAP MDG Implementations, technical and functional phases. Knowledge of SAP data dictionary tables, views, relationships and correspondence of data architecture for ECC and S4HANA for various SAP master and transactional data entities, including a great depth of functional and knowledge of central master data objects such as customers, vendors, materials and finance specific data. Ability to transform business and operational needs into technical solutions. Extensive knowledge of SAP best practices and ASAP methodology (SAP certifications a plus Effective communication and development of work teams, as well as relationship with client teams related to the project. Goal Oriented Fluent English (Advance-Native Level, oral-written)

Be fully aligned to the our core values: Think Big - Be courageous and bold. Aspire to greatness. Relentlessly pursue market innovation. Set the standard by which others follow. Create solutions that have a meaningful impact. Solve the challenges our customers don’t know they have. Be Curious - Be a lifelong learner. Seek out new ideas to serve customers. Understand our competition and the world. Be permanently dissatisfied with the status quo. Challenge preconceptions. Focus on the future rather than yesterday. Take Action - Be the first. Don’t wait. Take accountability. Inspire others by doing. Fail fast and learn from mistakes. Make a difference every day. Stronger Together - Respect, trust and look out for each other. Celebrate diverse perspectives. Listen. Build connections and belonging. Act with integrity. Give back. One Syniti family.

What We Offer Trust that you are good at what you’re doing. At Syniti you will find a supportive environment and access to learning tools, but micromanagement is not our thing. Growth. We are growing rapidly and steadily solving the biggest challenges enterprise companies are faced with today. There was never a better time to join and grow with us. Most importantly you will have the chance to shape our journey and share in our success story. Support. We all rely on each other and enable each other to be successful. You won’t stand alone. Curiosity and genuine interest in you. We all have our different stories, all equally fascinating with each depicting a different journey and we want to hear them all. Recognition. We are the sum of individual achievements and we always take the time to celebrate them. An open organisation. Hierarchies are not our thing and access is something we make sure of across the board. We are a family where everyone is just as important, everyone’s work is seen and ideas valued.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Who WE are Bearaby is an award-winning Direct to Consumer (DTC) company on a mission to bring comfort and relief to people of all ages who are searching for calm in a complex world. We create beautiful and functional products, including our flagship weighted blankets, that are sustainably manufactured from organic materials and innovative upcycled fabrics - loom to lap. We believe that restorative rest should be simple, natural, and drug-free - and that it's time to ditch the negative stigmas around healthy habits like napping and sleeping-in for a calmer, more collected world.

Role Summary Bearaby is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Graphic Designer to support our creative and digital teams with stunning digital visuals for a range of digital mediums, such as website, email, paid ads, and social media. In this role, you will play a pivotal role in designing user-centric interfaces and creating engaging visual experiences that are optimized for conversions, in a way that adheres to our brand identity. An ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio showcasing a deep understanding of both graphic design principles and paid marketing strategies, with a proven track record of designing successful marketing campaigns for ecommerce.

Duties and Responsibilities Ads creation: support our paid media team by creating marketing campaigns that includes images, videos and stitching user-generated content with overlay text and other compelling visuals. UI/UX Design: develop and implement visually appealing user interfaces for our website that are optimized independently for mobile and desktop, ensuring designs are user-friendly, responsive and aligned with best practices for UX/UI. Email design: use Figma, Canva or other design platforms to create marketing emails that are visually compelling, effectively communicated and follow the brand guidelines. Wireframing & Prototyping: Create detailed wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes to communicate design concepts and user flows effectively. Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, marketers, and product development, to ensure designs are executed accurately and meet project objectives and timelines. Innovation: Stay up-to-date with industry trends, design tools, and best practices. Bring fresh ideas and innovative solutions to enhance our eCommerce platform. Brand Partnerships: Support brand partnerships by creating product mock-ups for a range of different products, in a manner that is both innovative and true to the brand.

Who You Are Strong creative with an eye for great design that suits the brand style and addresses functional concerns. Knowledgeable and skilled in building ads, landing pages, adapting typography and design to the brand’s UI/UX guidelines, photography, and retouching images. A flexible thinker who is comfortable taking on feedback and can work with strategic direction A team player with the ability to work closely across teams in a fast-paced startup environment A proactive self-starter with top notch written and verbal communication skills A strong communicator with excellent interpersonal skills at all levels, which include both written and verbal communication skills. Exceptionally detailed, with the ability to create pixel-perfect designs and ensure high-quality outcomes. Comfortable with working in G Suite, monday.com, and Slack Adaptable, flexible and resilient, with excellent interpersonal, communication and negotiation skills.

Qualifications Bachelor's degree in a related field, preferably a BFA with 2-3 years of graphic design experience, with a strong focus on digital marketing ads and email design. title: Business Development and Account Manager
description:
We are looking for an Business Development and Account Manager (Brazil)

Description of work: We are looking for a Sales and Account Manager, responsible for Brazil, to create long-term, trusting relationships with our customers. The role is to oversee a portfolio of assigned customers, develop new business from existing clients and actively seek new sales opportunities. This position may require travel up to 30%.

Position Responsibilities · Serve as the lead point of contact for all customer account management matters, · Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships, · Develop new business opportunities with present and new customers in dedicated region and create new opportunities based on an in-depth understanding of market potential, specific customer requirements and company capabilities, · Generate sales revenue with existing customers in line with the organization objectives and goals, · Negotiate contracts and close agreements to maximize profits, · Develop trusted advisor relationships with key accounts, customer stakeholders and partners, · Clearly communicate the progress of monthly/quarterly initiatives to internal and external stakeholders, · Present the business case for pursuing specific opportunities including profit potential, strategic advantage, competitive analysis and win probability, · Meet commitments within cost, schedule and performance parameters, · Adapt to changing business environment and priorities by complex problem solving and conflict resolution, · Undertake other duties/projects assigned.

Desired Skills and Experience · Relevant Work Experience: 5+ years either in Technical or Account/Sales related position where constant communication with external customers has been required · Business Understanding: Knowledge of the Airport/Ground Handler/Airline Industry · Ability to grasp the technology and product concepts to refer their value to customers · Demonstrable ability to communicate, present and influence key stakeholders at all levels of an organization, including executive and C-level

title: DevOps - SRE (Site Reliability Engineering)
description:
Description

Important Information Location:

Brazil Job Mode:

Full-time Work Mode:

Work from home

Job Summary Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) is a discipline that incorporates aspects of software engineering and applies them to infrastructure and operations problems. The main goals are to create scalable and highly reliable software systems.

Responsibilities and Duties Utilize software tools and automated tasks for continuous monitoring and reliability of applications; Act swiftly in response to emergency situations impacting system reliability in production environments, performing root cause analysis for on-going incidents; Oversee and streamline change management processes to enhance system performance and reliability. Ownership of releases to production environments; Work closely with development teams throughout the software lifecycle, with a focus on contributing to solving system-related issues and eliminating toil - automating routine tasks for enhanced productivity; Focus on the reliability and scalability of systems, ensuring high performance and efficiency standards.

Essential Skills Proficiency in monitoring tools like Azure Monitoring, App Insights, Prometheus, Grafana. Project tracking and version management with tools like JIRA, SVN, GitHub; Expertise with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, ARM/Bicep, Pulumi, etc.) and release management tooling (ArgoCD, Harness, Octopus, etc.); Experience in incident alert tools (PageDuty, Opsgenie), and container orchestration tools like Kubernetes, AKS and similar.

About Encora

Encora is the preferred digital engineering and modernization partner of some of the world’s leading enterprises and digital native companies. With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora’s technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.

At Encora, we hire professionals based solely on their skills and qualifications, and do not discriminate based on age, disability, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or nationality.

title: Manager - Accounting Advisory & Financial Reporting
description:
About the Role We are seeking a

Manager in Accounting Advisory & Financial Reporting

to join our growing team. This role is ideal for an experienced accounting professional with expertise in IFRS, US GAAP, and technical accounting matters, particularly in advising businesses through reporting and compliance challenges.

The ideal candidate will have experience in

Big Four accounting firms, audit, and accounting advisory services , as well as exposure to multiple industries such as manufacturing, infrastructure, SaaS, retail, and professional services. This role offers an excellent opportunity to gain high-level advisory experience while working with senior leadership and supporting clients through complex accounting matters.

Key Responsibilities Provide

technical accounting advisory services , including IFRS and US GAAP conversions, financial statement preparation, and complex transaction analysis. Assist in advisory engagements related to financial reporting, internal controls, and accounting policy implementations. Support CFOs, Controllers, and Finance teams with regulatory compliance, GAAP conversions, and implementation of new accounting standards. Conduct research on technical accounting issues and provide recommendations for best practices. Assist in M&A transactions by supporting purchase accounting, due diligence, and post-merger financial reporting. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to improve financial reporting and accounting processes. Mentor and guide junior professionals, ensuring quality service delivery and knowledge sharing.

Qualifications & Experience 7+ years

of experience in accounting advisory, financial reporting, or external audit. Big Four or global advisory firm experience

is preferred. Strong knowledge of

IFRS, US GAAP, and other international accounting frameworks . CPA, Chartered Accountant, or equivalent certification is required (or in progress). Exposure to multiple industries (e.g., SaaS, manufacturing, retail, infrastructure) is a plus. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects. Excellent communication and client management skills. Bilingual proficiency in

Portuguese, Spanish, or English

is a plus.

title: Analista DevSecOps Sênior
description:
SIS Innov & Tech

Há mais de 20 anos no mercado, somos uma consultoria estratégica de Inovação e Transformação Digital. Nossa especialidade é impulsionar as demandas de nossos clientes, integrando processos, pessoas e tecnologia de alta performance. Estamos com uma oportunidade para o nosso time corporativo para atuar como:

Analista DevSecOps Sênior

Responsabilidades:

- Implementar práticas de segurança no desenvolvimento de software (DevSecOps); - Automatizar verificações de segurança nos pipelines de CI/CD; - Monitorar e mitigar vulnerabilidades em aplicações e infraestrutura; - Realizar análise de código estática e dinâmica para identificação de falhas de segurança; - Implementar e configurar ferramentas de segurança para aplicações e infraestrutura; - Trabalhar em colaboração com times de desenvolvimento, infraestrutura e segurança; - Definir e manter políticas de segurança e compliance; - Promover treinamentos e conscientização sobre segurança para as equipes de tecnologia; - Responder a incidentes de segurança e propor medidas corretivas; - Participar das cerimônias ágeis (daily meetings, planning, review e retrospective).

Requisitos:

- Experiência sólida com práticas de DevSecOps; - Conhecimento em ferramentas de segurança como SonarQube, Checkmarx, Snyk, OWASP ZAP, etc.; - Experiência com pipelines de CI/CD (Jenkins, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps, etc.); - Conhecimento em containers e orquestração (Docker, Kubernetes); - Experiência em segurança de APIs e aplicações Web; - Conhecimento em infraestrutura como código (Terraform, Ansible); - Familiaridade com metodologias ágeis (Scrum, Kanban); - Experiência com monitoramento e resposta a incidentes de segurança; - Boa comunicação e trabalho em equipe.

Diferencial: A vaga é com atuação home office, mas se a pessoa tiver disponibilidade de ir 1x presencial por semana em Alphaville seria um diferencial.

Todas as nossas oportunidades de trabalho estão abertas para pessoas com deficiência. #VemPraSIS #SomosSIS

title: Analista de Suporte PL - Especialista Dynatrace
description:
Descrição da vaga Na Stefanini, acreditamos no poder da colaboração. Co-criamos soluções inovadoras em parceria com nossos clientes, combinando tecnologia de ponta, inteligência artificial e a criatividade humana. Estamos na vanguarda da resolução de problemas de negócios, proporcionando impacto real em escala global.

Ao se juntar à Stefanini, você se torna parte de uma jornada global de transformação. Estamos empenhados em criar impacto positivo não apenas nos negócios, mas também na vida de nossos colaboradores. Se você procura uma oportunidade de crescimento profissional em uma empresa que valoriza inovação, respeito, autonomia e parceria, você encontra aqui!

Junte-se a nós e seja parte da mudança!

Responsabilidades e atribuições O que esperamos que você realize: Acompanhamento de ocorrência de alarmes de TI; Filtragem de alarmes para determinar eventos críticos; Execução de respostas pré-configuradas de tratamento; Correlação e encerramento de alarmes; Registro e acompanhamento (follow-up) de incidentes de TI.

Requisitos e qualificações O que precisamos que você tenha de conhecimento:

Requisitos essenciais: Atividades de sustentação de ferramentas Dynatrace; Desenvolvimento de integrações entre ferramentas; Desenvolvimento de relatórios; Desenvolvimento de scripts de automação de ações; Troubleshooting de aplicações de negócio; Troubleshooting de problemas de rede; Desenvolvimento de monitores customizados; Interface com fornecedores de ferramentas apara abertura e acompanhamento de chamados Desenvolvimento de dashboards de monitoramento

Conhecimentos necessários: Conhecimentos sólidos em tecnologias de servidores, storage e protocolos de rede (LAN, WAN, roteadores, switches, TCP/IP); Conhecimento de segurança de redes e sistemas; Conhecimento das práticas ITIL (IT Information Library; Sólidos conhecimentos em linguagens para criação de scripts (principalmente Perl e Bash Shell Script); Experiência de administração de ambiente críticos.

Conhecimentos em ferramentas: Dynatrace Server (Cluster) Active Gateways Certificação Dynatrace Associate (DESEJÁVEL); Certificação Dynatrace Professional (DESEJÁVEL).

title: Digital Designer
description:

The goal of the role is to design high-quality digital assets in a fast-paced environment to improve client ROAS goals.

The ideal candidate for this position will have a portfolio featuring multiple examples of social ads, web design, and will be able to demonstrate a strong understanding of the latest digital trends and emerging technologies.

Required Skills A dynamic portfolio showcasing strengths in typography, design, visual storytelling, campaign concept creation, and art direction across all mediums Strong understanding of Figma and Adobe CS Exceptional art direction and typography skills Work collaboratively on teams to develop creative solutions Incredibly detail-oriented Open and receptive to creative direction and design feedback Someone who works backward on a problem before moving forward towards a solution Understanding of leading social platforms and the responsive web Experience working with eCommerce and DTC brands

Responsibilities Work with creative briefs to design social ads for performance advertising Manage the art direction for multiple clients by building out digital assets, templates, and inspiration boards Work on multiple clients' ad creatives each week to build out extensive libraries for each funnel stage Lead the design of responsive landing pages Driven by details. You’re meticulous, thorough and enjoy being precise

Company Overview Lilo Social is a growth marketing agency focused on full-funnel marketing delivering best-in-class paid media and creative services for a wide range of eCommerce brands focused on scaling. We work across the entire life-cycle of the customer journey covering content creation, ad production, paid media, conversion rate optimization, and email/sms marketing. title: Pessoa Arquiteta de Soluções IA
description:
Somos inspired by tech powered by people. Por isso, precisamos de pessoas apaixonados por desafios e com sede de aprendizado contínuo. Buscamos por novos makers para sonharem com a gente, que enxerguem além do óbvio e que estejam prontos para se juntar a nós nessa jornada de transformação e crescimento. Estamos expandindo nossos horizontes e buscamos pessoas que compartilhem dessa mesma paixão pela tecnologia e pelo aprendizado contínuo. Se você se encaixa nesse perfil, venha fazer parte do nosso time!

RESPONSABILIDADES E ATRIBUIÇÕES Definir e projetar arquiteturas de dados escaláveis que suportem múltiplos projetos de Inteligência Artificial, garantindo alta disponibilidade, performance e segurança. Selecionar e implementar infraestruturas de dados em nuvem (AWS, Azure, GCP) garantindo a melhor relação custo-benefício para diferentes cargas de trabalho. Projetar pipelines de dados robustos e automatizados para ingestão, transformação e disponibilização de grandes volumes de dados para treinamento e inferência de modelos de IA. Definir e implementar estratégias de armazenamento eficientes para diferentes tipos de dados (estruturados, semiestruturados, não estruturados), utilizando Data Lakes, Data Warehouses e bancos de dados distribuídos. Garantir a governança de dados , incluindo versionamento, controle de acesso, auditoria e conformidade com normas regulatórias. Criar e gerenciar ambientes escaláveis para execução de modelos de IA , considerando desde treinamento distribuído até inferência em tempo real. Definir padrões e frameworks de MLOps e DataOps , garantindo a automação, monitoramento e escalabilidade de pipelines de Machine Learning e Deep Learning. Garantir alta disponibilidade e tolerância a falhas nas soluções de dados, aplicando estratégias de replicação, balanceamento de carga e recuperação . Projetar soluções para processamento distribuído e otimização de workloads intensivos, utilizando tecnologias como Apache Spark. Definir estratégias de caching e otimização de consultas para acelerar acesso a dados. Monitorar e otimizar o desempenho da infraestrutura de dados e IA, ajustando recursos de computação, armazenamento e rede conforme a demanda. Documentar a arquitetura de dados e infraestrutura de IA , garantindo que o conhecimento seja compartilhado e replicável em outros projetos.

REQUISITOS E QUALIFICAÇÕES Formação acadêmica em Ciência da Computação, Engenharia, Sistemas de Informação ou áreas correlatas. Experiência comprovada no desenho e implementação de arquiteturas de dados e infraestrutura para projetos de IA em larga escala. Conhecimento profundo em computação em nuvem (AWS, Azure, GCP) e em como provisionar recursos para projetos de IA (GPU instances, Auto-scaling, Lambda Functions, etc.). Experiência com contêineres e orquestração usando Docker, Kubernetes para escalabilidade de pipelines de IA. Familiaridade com arquiteturas de armazenamento distribuído , como HDFS, Amazon S3, Google Cloud Storage e Azure Data Lake. Experiência com processamento distribuído e otimização de cargas de trabalho. Conhecimento em bancos de dados de alto desempenho. Experiência na definição de estratégias de segurança e compliance , incluindo criptografia de dados, autenticação e autorização via IAM, e auditoria de acessos. Capacidade de balancear custos e desempenho da infraestrutura , otimizando o uso de recursos de computação e armazenamento. Conhecimento em redes e arquiteturas de comunicação entre sistemas distribuídos. Experiência com MLOps e CI/CD para IA para automação da infraestrutura. Habilidade para definir estratégias de versionamento e monitoramento de modelos de IA em produção. Capacidade de liderança técnica e colaboração com equipes multidisciplinares , incluindo engenheiros de software, cientistas de dados e arquitetos de soluções.

Diferenciais : Certificações em cloud computing e arquitetura de dados (AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Google Professional Data Engineer, Azure Data Engineer). Experiência na implementação de arquiteturas híbridas e multi-cloud , garantindo interoperabilidade entre diferentes provedores de nuvem. Conhecimento avançado em inferência acelerada para IA , utilizando GPUs, TPUs e frameworks Experiência com arquiteturas serverless para otimização de custos e escalabilidade. Experiência em liderança de projetos e mentoring de equipes técnicas.

title: Customer Success Client (100% Home Office)
description:
Customer Success Client (100% Home Office)

Customer Success Client

para integrar nosso time e ser a ponte entre nossa empresa, os leads captados e os clientes da empresa. Ambiente colaborativo e inovador, com oportunidades de crescimento. Impacto direto nos resultados dos clientes e no sucesso da empresa. Como se candidatar: Candidata-se pelo .

for more information on our projects.

48 months Project budget:

10M EUR

Qualifications and skills: · At least 10 years professional experience in the field of research and development (R&D) and innovation, information, and communication technologies (ICT), health, education, and training. · Experience working with EU, EIB, WB etc. financed projects. · A Master’s Degree or Bachelor's Degree relevant to the topic

Specific professional experience within at least one of the following sectors: R&D / Innovation: · research management, research infrastructure · digitalisation programmes assessment · corporate or national RDI programmes · the development of university R&D-centres and Science Parks · smart specialisation and the creation of innovation and incubation support services.

ICT: · fixed and wireless telecommunications infrastructures · satellite systems/terrestrial broadcasting systems · submarine cable systems · hardware/software development · e-services · ICT-related research · and Innovation, Smart Development etc.

Health: · primary care, secondary care, tertiary care · public health · (re-)construction and equipment of general and specialized care and university hospitals · e-Health/digital health, etc.

Education: · pre-primary education/kindergartens, · primary education/comprehensive schools, secondary education, tertiary education, · vocational education & technical training, · education & research facilities, · construction, · equipment and the running of education infrastructures, · development of specialist educational facilities, · education program planning and resourcing, · distant learning and e-learning. As relevant, this area will also cover related educational activities linked to cultural heritage and other social infrastructure.

SMEs: · financial intermediaries (counterparty banks, national/regional development agencies, · microfinance institutions and other intermediaries), · SMEs and Mid-caps, policy makers responsible for SME finance and development.

Digital, low carbon and/or environmentally sustainable technologies innovation and infrastructures: · research, development and innovation in key enabling technologies (KETs), · advanced manufacturing and digital technologies · low carbon technologies and low environmental footprint (materials, processes, products, services and systems) · commercial demonstration of innovative technologies, including industrial infrastructures for innovative and smart manufacturing processes, and innovative low-carbon technologies in industrial manufacturing.

Language skills: · Excellent command of English (CEFR C1) (Minimum requirement

description:

A Diretoria Financeira, é um dos times chave dentro da empresa que atua diretamente no crescimento da Sankhya, cuidando de toda operação financeira, para que nosso crescimento aconteça sempre de maneira saudável!

Elaborar, acompanhar e consolidar o Orçamento da companhia (Matriz, Filiais e Investidas); Elaboração e consolidação dos Forecasts da companhia e suas unidades de negócios; Identificar desvios entre Real vs Orçado e Real vs Forecast com todas as áreas da companhia; Desenvolvimento e otimização de ferramentas de planejamento financeiro com intuito de gerar e analisar criticamente informações estratégicas para tomada de decisões; Analisar a performance do negócio e propor planos de ação para melhorar a lucratividade e geração de caixa, assim como ações corretivas, se necessárias; Desenvolvimento, atualização e melhorias na modelagem financeira de longo prazo; Proporcionar visibilidade dos resultados para tomada de decisão com direcionamento a toda companhia; Criar os KPIs a serem seguidos/controlados; Responsável por garantir compliance e disponibilização das informações financeiras; Realizar análises de sensibilidade e simulação de cenários.
