title: Data Analyst
description:
Onebridge is a Consulting firm with an HQ in Indianapolis, and clients dispersed throughout the United States and beyond. We have an exciting opportunity for a highly skilled Data Analyst to join an innovative and dynamic group of professionals at a company rated among the top “Best Places to Work” in Indianapolis since 2015.

Employment Type:

Full Time Location:

Remote - Brazil Industry:

IT & Services, Data & Analytics, Healthcare.

Data Analyst | About You As a Data Analyst, you focus on analyzing and interpreting data to provide insights that drive business decisions and improve system performance. You gather requirements from both internal teams and clients, identify data trends, and offer actionable recommendations. You are passionate about using data to solve business challenges, whether it’s identifying trends, troubleshooting data issues, or supporting decision-making processes. You bring strong analytical skills and attention to detail, ensuring data integrity and clarity in your reports.

Data Analyst | Day-to-Day Analyze and interpret data to identify trends, anomalies, and insights that impact business processes and system performance. Troubleshoot and resolve data-related issues, working closely with clients and internal teams to ensure data accuracy. Manage and resolve ServiceNow tickets related to data issues, ensuring timely resolution. Gather data requirements from stakeholders, documenting them to ensure accurate reporting and analysis. Provide actionable recommendations based on data analysis, supporting better business decisions.

Data Analyst | Skills & Experience 5+ years of experience as a Data Analyst, with expertise in data analysis and problem-solving. Advanced proficiency in SQL for data extraction, manipulation, and analysis. Familiarity with ERP systems, ensuring smooth data flows between systems and business processes. Fluent in English, with excellent communication skills to work with international clients and technical teams. Experience with Tableau for creating reports and visualizations is a bonus.

A Best Place to Work in Indiana since 2015

title: Profissional Frontend React - Sênior
description:
Código da vaga: 43980

Sobre a BRQ Digital Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior. Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.

BRQ WAY No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia! É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.

Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.

Ei #fera FrontEnd, chegou o momento de encarar um novo desafio em sua carreira! Venha ser um #ferabrq

- O que procuramos? Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!

- O que você deve ter?

Ensino superior completo em Tecnologia da Informação ou áreas afins. Experiência em desenvolvimento front-end com ReactJS . Conhecimento sólido em HTML5, CSS3 e JavaScript (ES6+). Experiência com ferramentas de versionamento de código como Git. Familiaridade com metodologias ágeis. Boa comunicação e capacidade de trabalho em equipe. Proatividade para exportar ideias e sugestões de melhorias.

- Diferenciais:

Experiência com outras bibliotecas e frameworks JavaScript . Conhecimento em práticas de UX/UI . Experiência com integração de APIs RESTful . Familiaridade com ferramentas de automação de teste .

- O que temos pra te oferecer? Mais do que um plano de carreira ! A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:

Carreira técnica:

Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos! Carreira de Liderança:

Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos. Experiência internacional:

Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede. Empreendedorismo:

De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.

- E os benefícios? Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!

- Como é trabalhar na BRQ? Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions

Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

title: iOS Developer
description:
We are looking for a iOS engineer to build discovery experiences that serve the Adoption mission within our native app on surfaces such as the feed, the community tab and the post page.

What you’ll Do ● Move fast while balancing quality. We can’t afford extensive processes, and we also can’t afford show-stopping bugs. We need people who can balance speed with quality while quickly building brand-new products. ● Contribute meaningfully to team strategy. We give everyone a seat at the table and encourage active participation in planning for the future. Don’t just come along for the ride. ● Communicate effectively, within the team and across disciplines. Work closely with product managers and designers to craft compelling user experiences. What we’re looking for ● 4+ years mobile development experience with multiple parts of the iOS stack. We develop with Swift. Experience with Combine or RxSwift is strongly preferred. Experience with Storekit framework, Texture, UIKit, or SwiftUI are nice to have, but not required. ● Ability to design and implement complex distributed systems operating under high load. ● Experience developing customer-facing public applications is preferred. ● Entrepreneurial spirit. On our team, everyone needs to act like a startup CEO. You must be self-directed, innovative, and biased towards action in fast-paced environments. You live to build new things and thrive in ambiguity and even failure.

● Excellent communication skills. You must be able to collaborate effectively with teams in a fully-remote environment, and discuss complex topics with technical and non-technical audiences.

title: Analista de Relacionamento Junior - Inside Sales
description:
Analista de Relacionamento (inside sales) – Júnior

Será responsável por prospectar novos clientes por meio de ligações, disparos de e-mails, social media (), WhatsApp e outras ferramentas. Seu objetivo é o de qualificar as possíveis demandas da sua carteira de prospects e de novos leads e conectá-los com um ISR para dar sequência às etapas comerciais. Em outras palavras, você será responsável por alimentar o funil de vendas da Iron Mountain com novas oportunidades de negócios diariamente.

RESPONSABILIDADES PRINCIPAIS

1. Responsável por se relacionar com o cliente, prospectar, e direcionar para possíveis negócios. 2. Responsável por atender prontamente o cliente, manter estreita colaboração com os clientes para determinar suas necessidades, responder às perguntas sobre nossos produtos e recomendar as soluções certas; 3. Conduzir o processo de qualificação dos leads e de enriquecimento dos mesmos desde o primeiro contato até o a negociação possuir informações para seguir com o vendedor. 4. Através de sua atividade, atingir as metas do departamento mensalmente, trimestralmente e anualmente; 5. Atender clientes e realizar apresentações via os canais de comunicação da empresa (chat, WhatsApp, e-mail, telefone etc.) sanando dúvidas e convertendo o atendimento em leads de vendas;

REQUISITOS

*Experiência com atendimento ao cliente (na área de vendas, de preferência B2B) *Ensino Superior em andamento ou completo *Experiência com vendas consultivas B2B por telefone; *Pacote Office e Google Workspace

title: Administrador de Banco de Dados DBA (Database Administrator)
description:
Responsabilidades do Trabalho: Liderar a arquitetura, engenharia, implementação e operações de todos os sistemas de dados para suportar escalabilidade, disponibilidade e desempenho. Colaborar com equipes de engenharia durante todo o ciclo de vida do desenvolvimento de software para resolver problemas complexos, mantendo padrões e melhores práticas de banco de dados. Responsável por garantir a estabilidade e funcionalidade de aplicativos/bancos de dados, incluindo todos os ambientes: desenvolvimento, teste e produção. Monitorar, investigar e solucionar problemas de banco de dados de produção, coordena a recuperação de incidentes e comunica-se com as respectivas equipes de suporte e líderes de engenharia. Ajuda a manter todos os armazenamentos de dados na infraestrutura de nuvem AWS. Trabalhar com equipes estratégicas de relatórios e análise de dados para ajudar a construir/atualizar data warehouses. Suporte fora do horário de expediente conforme necessário (A posição requer que o candidato trabalhe no Horário Padrão do Leste (EST), que está 2 horas atrás do Horário de Brasília (BRT))

Requisitos: Mais de 5 anos de experiência como Administrador/Engenheiro de Dados Experiência no gerenciamento de bancos de dados na plataforma de nuvem Amazon Web Services (AWS) (EC2 e RDS) Experiência em Microsoft SQL Server 2016 ou mais recente Experiência com Microsoft SQL AlwaysOn HA e ambientes SAN Experiência com Redshift e PostgreSQL Projeto e implementação de soluções de recuperação de desastres, incluindo cenários de geo-replicação Fortes habilidades em TSQL, Powershell e Python Experiência sólida com melhorias de desempenho de consultas Conhecimento sólido das melhores práticas de design relacional Conhecimento sólido de design de data warehouse (esquema em estrela, floco de neve, etc.) Inglês avançado e boas habilidades de comunicação escrita e verbal para interagir com engenheiros e gerentes Experiência com implantação contínua

Habilidades Preferenciais: Abordagem agnóstica de banco de dados. Disposto a trabalhar com tecnologias novas e emergentes Conhecimento prático de alta disponibilidade e recuperação de desastres (HA/DR) da AWS Experiência em nível superior em Ciência de Dados e ferramentas de ciência de dados Experiência no desenvolvimento e administração de MongoDB Experiência no desenvolvimento e administração de Redis Experiência no desenvolvimento e administração de Solr Experiência com sistemas operacionais como UNIX, LINUX, CentOS Exposição ao trabalho dentro de uma organização de desenvolvimento ágil

Atuação 100% remota.

title: Associate Manager
description:
Introduction of Clearstate Clearstate specializes in healthcare-focused market intelligence and strategic advisory services, assisting MedTech companies, biotechnology firms and healthcare service providers in identifying and leveraging market growth opportunities. We are committed to delivering actionable strategies rooted in robust data analytics, built on the basis of market realities, empowering our clients to make informed decisions. Our mission is to provide credible, actionable and granular market insights globally, and provide value-adding advisory tailored to the needs of the MedTech sector. We are seeking highly motivated Associate Manager/ Manager to lead the development and delivery of market data solutions and custom research projects aligned with our business objectives.

Responsibilities

Project Management Lead a team of analysts in developing global market tracker solutions and custom research projects focused on healthcare market insights Define project requirements, including analytical models, research methodologies, timeline and budgets Ensure project setup, design, and delivery are aligned with client needs, providing actionable, customer-centric insights Innovate and enhance data solutions by conceptualizing new product ideas, additional analyses, and improvements Apply advanced analytical and quantitative tools to extract meaningful business insights

Content Development and Project Delivery Deliver high quality data insights with deep domain knowledge expertise in assigned sectors and regions Develop clear, actionable recommendations based on research and analysis Confidently lead client presentations, ensuring clarity and impact Serve as the client engagement lead, communicating project updates and presenting key milestones

Client and Stakeholder Engagement Collaborate with client to align on deliverables, ensuring insights meet their needs Engage effectively with various client stakeholders during project delivery and presentations Support business development and marketing initiatives by contributing content and domain expertise For Managers:

Lead, appraise and develop team members, fostering skill development and ensuring team success

Experience 5+ years in market analysis, market intelligence, or business consulting, with proven project and client management experience (preferably in healthcare or consulting)

Qualifications Bachelor’s or Masters’ degree in Science, Business or related fields MBA preferred

title: Salesforce Enterprise Architect
description:
As a Salesforce Solutions/Enterprise Architect, you will work closely with the Portfolio Leader in the US healthcare industry, focusing on presales efforts, enterprise architecture, and technology selection for a large-scale Patient Support Program project. Your expertise in Salesforce, enterprise architecture principles, and industry-specific challenges will be pivotal in driving successful outcomes.

Responsibilities : Collaborate with the Portfolio Leader on presales activities, including developing enterprise-level architectural strategies, defining solution blueprints, and guiding technology selection. Define and maintain enterprise architecture standards, ensuring alignment with client business goals, scalability, and integration requirements. Conduct comprehensive business analysis to identify needs, evaluate vendor capabilities, and design end-to-end Salesforce-based solutions tailored to enterprise-scale operations. Serve as a trusted advisor on Salesforce architecture and its integration within broader IT ecosystems, ensuring alignment with enterprise-wide technology strategies. Lead the development of architectural artifacts such as solution blueprints, data flow diagrams, integration strategies, and implementation roadmaps. Provide guidance on governance, security, and compliance within the Salesforce ecosystem, addressing enterprise-specific challenges. Conduct high-level evaluations of technology stacks, ensuring solutions adhere to enterprise principles such as scalability, performance, and maintainability. Facilitate stakeholder workshops and present architectural designs, balancing technical depth with business priorities to ensure alignment. Engage directly with clients to understand their strategic goals, translating them into actionable enterprise architecture strategies.

Requirements: Proven experience in enterprise architecture roles, with expertise in designing and implementing scalable solutions for large organizations. Extensive knowledge of Salesforce products (e.g., Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud). Strong understanding of enterprise architecture frameworks (e.g., TOGAF, Zachman) and principles, including governance, scalability, and security. Demonstrated experience in leading large-scale Salesforce implementation projects, including system integration and multi-cloud deployments. Ability to design and manage architectural artifacts, such as solution roadmaps, integration patterns, and data architecture. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to translate complex technical concepts into business language for diverse audiences. Experience working in cross-functional enterprise teams, collaborating with technical, business, and executive stakeholders. Strong knowledge of IT governance, compliance, and best practices in large-scale enterprise environments. Familiarity with Salesforce, Mulesoft, data realization, Databricks integration, Five9 Call Center, and SF Service Cloud Voice - telephony. Willingness to travel 15-20% of the time for client engagements.

Preferred Qualifications Salesforce certifications (e.g., Application Architect, System Architect, Technical Architect) or equivalent experience. Familiarity with API-driven architectures, microservices, and middleware platforms for seamless integrations. Experience in enterprise-scale data migration, master data management (MDM), and business intelligence integration within Salesforce projects. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to manage ambiguity in fast-paced, complex projects.

What We Offer: Paid Time Off:

20 days of vacation, 15 paid sick days with a doctor’s note, and 5 paid sick days without a doctor’s note. Health Coverage:

Medical insurance for employees, with options for family coverage at corporate rates (location-dependent). Professional Development:

Support for attending webinars, conferences, and training sessions. Team Engagement:

Regular team-building activities and bi-annual company-wide events. Flexible Work Options:

Choose between in-office, remote, or hybrid arrangements, based on your preference and manager approval.

title: Analista de dados
description:
A PSM Company é especializada na identificação de Talentos para as áreas de TI / Telecom como também para as áreas operacionais e administrativas. Nossa história de sucesso, está baseada em nosso modelo de negócios que proporcionam assertividade e qualidade no processo seletivo, baixo Turn Over e isenção de riscos e passivos trabalhistas.

O que Buscamos? Analista de Dados – Power BI/Databricks

Experiência em análise de dados e modelagem em bancos relacionais; Proficiência em SQL para manipulação e extração de dados; Experiência em ferramentas de visualização como Power BI, Looker e AI/BI Databricks; Conhecimento em Python para análise e automação de dados; Experiência com plataformas em nuvem (Azure, AWS ou Google Cloud); Noções de ETL/ELT para integração de dados; Experiência na criação e manutenção de catálogos de dados e metadados; Conhecimento sobre Segurança da Informação e regulamentações como LGPD;

Diferenciais: Certificações em análise de dados ou ferramentas de BI; Experiência com análise estatística e machine learning básico; Conhecimento em Databricks e PySpark; Experiência com versionamento de código e práticas de CI/CD para automação de processos analíticos.

Contratação CLT; Vale Transporte; Vale Refeição; Assistência Médica e Assistência Odontológica; Auxílio creche; Convênio com Farmácia; Parcerias com Universidades e Escolas de Idiomas; Gympass; Seguro de Vida.

100% - HOME OFFICE

title: Manager - Accounting Advisory & Financial Reporting
description:
About the Role We are seeking a

Manager in Accounting Advisory & Financial Reporting

to join our growing team. This role is ideal for an experienced accounting professional with expertise in IFRS, US GAAP, and technical accounting matters, particularly in advising businesses through reporting and compliance challenges.

The ideal candidate will have experience in

Big Four accounting firms, audit, and accounting advisory services , as well as exposure to multiple industries such as manufacturing, infrastructure, SaaS, retail, and professional services. This role offers an excellent opportunity to gain high-level advisory experience while working with senior leadership and supporting clients through complex accounting matters.

Key Responsibilities Provide

technical accounting advisory services , including IFRS and US GAAP conversions, financial statement preparation, and complex transaction analysis. Assist in advisory engagements related to financial reporting, internal controls, and accounting policy implementations. Support CFOs, Controllers, and Finance teams with regulatory compliance, GAAP conversions, and implementation of new accounting standards. Conduct research on technical accounting issues and provide recommendations for best practices. Assist in M&A transactions by supporting purchase accounting, due diligence, and post-merger financial reporting. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to improve financial reporting and accounting processes. Mentor and guide junior professionals, ensuring quality service delivery and knowledge sharing.

Qualifications & Experience 7+ years

of experience in accounting advisory, financial reporting, or external audit. Big Four or global advisory firm experience

is preferred. Strong knowledge of

IFRS, US GAAP, and other international accounting frameworks . CPA, Chartered Accountant, or equivalent certification is required (or in progress). Exposure to multiple industries (e.g., SaaS, manufacturing, retail, infrastructure) is a plus. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects. Excellent communication and client management skills. Bilingual proficiency in

Portuguese, Spanish, or English

is a plus.

title: Pessoa Analista de Metodologias Ágeis Pleno
description:
#Nosso jeito de fazer história: Entre para a história de construção do maior Hub de Dados e Analytics do Brasil. Além de você contribuir diretamente neste objetivo, você estará se desenvolvendo constantemente, por meio de grandes desafios de negócio, junto a um time de alto impacto. Na Neoway, acreditamos em fazer as coisas de forma inovadora, colaborativa, responsável e com foco no cliente.

#Missão do Cargo: Como Analista de Agilidade, você fará parte da Unidade de Negócios de Capital Markets, atuando junto ao time de Tecnologia e será responsável por potencializar o trabalho da equipe, dar consistência no campo operacional e garantir que todos entendam e apliquem os princípios da agilidade, empoderando as pessoas e a empresa, visando primariamente o trabalho harmônico em equipe.

#Responsabilidades e principais atribuições em sua jornada: Promover a utilização de Metodologias Ágeis, garantindo que seja entendida e aplicada pelo time; Gerenciar o fluxo de trabalho e a organização do time; Conduzir as cerimônias ágeis adotadas pelo time; Ser guardião do quadro Kanban utilizado pelo time, garantindo a organização do backlog e sprints; Analisar regularmente as métricas do time, acompanhando os indicadores operacionais de eficiência do fluxo de trabalho, promovendo uma visão 360 da operação. Gerir as interferências externas de modo a assegurar foco no planejamento de trabalho; Remover impedimentos (técnicos, operacionais, contratuais, organizacionais, etc) que atrapalhem o andamento das atividades diárias do time; Estar sempre atualizado sobre metodologias ágeis e buscar formas alternativas de promover a melhoria contínua do time; Organização de documentações, políticas e acordos do time e promover a otimização de processos;

#Requisitos e qualificações: Apresentar boa comunicação, pois somos um time bastante pró ativo e com necessidade de articulação de ideias; Encarar as mudanças como oportunidades e aprender com seus erros; Facilidade em compartilhar conhecimento com seus pares; Habilidade em organização e planejamento; Apoiar no desenvolvimento da cultura de alta performance em equilíbrio com um clima leve; Saber como construir com outras pessoas e desfrutar do trabalho em equipe; Experiência atuando como Pessoa Agile Master ; Experiência em processos de desenvolvimento de software; Conhecimento em técnicas de facilitação; Conhecimento em métricas de times ágeis;

Alguns diferenciais que estamos de olho. Mas não se preocupe caso não tenha, ajudamos você nessa parte: Certificações Scrum (CSPO, CSM) ou Kanban (KMP I, KMP II) (desejável); Experiência com ferramentas de workflow como Jira, Trello, Pipefy, etc; Conhecimento em implementação e uso de OKRs.

#NeoJourney l Cardápio de Benefícios: Vale Alimentação/Refeição; Auxílio transporte; Plano de Assistência médica e odontológica; ‍‍ Licença Maternidade e paternidade estendida; PPR (Programa de participação de resultados); ️‍♀️Gympass - plataforma que te dá acesso a mais de 18 mil academias no Brasil. Nas academias conveniadas são oferecidas mais de 700 modalidades esportivas; Wellz - plataforma de saúde mental e bem estar, com terapia gratuita e muito mais; Ginástica Laboral (presencial) 1x na semana; Quick Massagem (presencial) 2x mês; Auxílio Creche; Day off no aniversário; Seguro de Vida; Parcerias Educacionais com Faculdades e Escolas de Ensino.

Mais sobre o Universo Neoway: Unimos forças com a B3, a maior potência de dados do país. Nossa meta é entrar para a história, e o capítulo deste ano é sobre acelerar. Todos e todas do time são essenciais para escrevermos este capítulo! Entendemos que as jornadas na Neoway são únicas, feitas pela soma do DNA Neoway + o potencial de cada colaborador(a).

#Somos Mudança: Acreditamos na potência da diversidade. Sabemos que temos um longo caminho pela frente, por isso estamos constantemente aprendendo e criando iniciativas para fortalecer a diversidade e inclusão. E essa jornada conta com o apoio dos nossos grupos de afinidade: #NeoLadies #NeoOba e #NeoPride, todos com o propósito de traduzir nossas mudanças internas em responsabilidade como cidadãos.

title: Production Engineer
description:
Production Engineer - High-Tech Industry (English Speakers)

Location: The Netherlands (on-site), 2 year contract with potential of permanent employment, NOT project/freelance

About the Company: We are at the forefront of high-tech manufacturing, specializing in cutting-edge production systems. We work on pioneering technologies that have a global impact. Join our team to make a significant contribution to the future of manufacturing. We’re looking for

Production Engineers

who are excited to solve complex, technical challenges and be part of an innovative team pushing the limits of what’s possible.

Role and Responsibilities:

As a

First Line Support Competence Engineer , you’ll take a lead role in solving technical challenges within pilot and volume production. You will work closely with engineering teams to minimize downtime and ensure the highest quality of production for our customers. This is not just a troubleshooting role — you’ll be a key problem-solver and leader in driving solutions. Your daily responsibilities will include: Leading troubleshooting of complex technical issues in production systems at our Veldhoven site. You’ll be the go-to expert for resolving difficult problems, with a target solving power of 95%. Providing technical support for rapid resolution of issues, ensuring minimal impact on cycle time. Preventing recurring problems by collaborating with Manufacturing Engineering and Design Engineering teams to feed back issue resolutions. Empowering the 1st line engineers by sharing knowledge and contributing to a culture of self-sufficiency. Taking the lead in continuous improvement initiatives to optimize production processes.

What We’re Looking For:

We seek

recent graduates

or engineers with

1-3 years of experience

who are eager to develop their skills in a high-tech manufacturing environment. If you have a passion for complex systems, problem-solving, and continuous learning, this is the perfect opportunity to kickstart your career.

Essential Requirements:

A

Bachelor’s or Master’s

in a technical field such as Mechanical Engineering, Electronics, Mechatronics, or Applied Physics. Previous experience in a

production environment

with complex high-tech products, preferably in troubleshooting and solving technical issues. Strong

analytical and problem-solving

skills with a solid foundation in engineering. Fluency in English

is essential. A

curious, proactive mindset

with a desire to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment

Skills & Qualities You’ll Need to Succeed:

Strong

team player

mentality with flexibility to adapt to new challenges. Excellent

communication skills

— you can explain complex technical concepts to diverse teams. A

pragmatic attitude

and plenty of initiative, always looking for ways to improve processes. High sense of responsibility

and ability to stay calm and focused under pressure. Organizational skills

and ability to balance multiple tasks effectively.

What You’ll Love About This Job:

Innovative Work Environment:

You’ll be part of a team working at the cutting edge of technology, solving unique challenges every day. Collaborative Culture:

You won’t be working in isolation. You’ll collaborate with a diverse team of experts and have the space to contribute your unique perspective. Career Growth:

With plenty of opportunities for continuous learning and career progression, you’ll have the chance to grow in the high-tech industry. Flexible Working Conditions:

Enjoy a modern, flexible work environment with activity-based working, allowing you to thrive in a dynamic office space.

Context of the position:

· The EUV factory is responsible for both production and installation of NXE and EXE systems. Most technical issues (80%) are solved by the work-centers (self-reliance). 20% is too difficult to solve by generalists and is escalated to specialists: the first line support engineers. First line support has 10 competences and a solving power of ~95%. First line support consists of engineering groups with a group lead each. · The first line support engineer reports to the first line support group lead, which reports to the first line support manager. · Works in shifts: mild shift schedule containing 10 dayshifts, 5 evening, 1 weekend in 4 weeks (no night). Call-out support during public holidays. · Willing to travel in case of urgent escalation at customer site (not frequent). · Mobile phone, laptop; we are working in an Activity Based Working office (flex-desks).

If any of the below competencies match your experience, then you are who we are looking for!

. Programming Languages:

Python ,

C++ , and

MATLAB

for developing, testing, and optimizing systems. . Automation & Control Systems:

Experience with

LabVIEW

or other automation and control system programming tools. . Technical Problem Solving:

Strong ability to troubleshoot complex mechanical, electrical, and software-related issues in high-tech production environments. . Project Management:

Proven experience managing engineering projects, from planning to execution, including coordinating teams and resources. . Data Analysis & Optimization:

Solid skills in data analysis and process optimization using software tools like

Excel ,

Simulink , or

Tableau . . Embedded Systems:

Experience with embedded systems programming or hardware/software integration. . Mechanical/Electrical Design Tools:

Proficiency with

CAD tools

(e.g., SolidWorks, AutoCAD) or electrical circuit design software (e.g., Altium, Eagle). . Testing & Calibration:

Hands-on experience with testing, calibration, and validation of complex systems and machinery. . System Integration:

Knowledge of integrating various high-tech systems for seamless performance in production.

Who is Xelvin? Xelvin is a Dutch consultancy company specializing in Engineering and Technical Trades. We hire Artisans, National Degree, Bachelor, Masters and PHD candidates with a background in Mechatronics, Electronics, Electrical, Mechanical, Automotive and Physics. Our focus is within the High-Tech and Manufacturing industry in Eindhoven region. Xelvin is specialized in International Recruitment, within Europe and beyond. In the past years we have helped over a thousand candidates from more than 50 different nationalities with finding their perfect job here in the Netherlands and are striving to help so many more! As Xelvin we hire candidates for a specific position for a set amount of time, after which a permanent contract with our client is granted and the candidates automatically transfers.

What do we offer? Contract wise: · 1-year contract of 40 hours per week (with potential of long-term employment). · 25 paid holidays a year (+ potential ADV days) · Public holidays, with a maximum of 7 per year, which are paid by Xelvin. · Holiday allowance of 8.33% (instead of 8,0%) over your total gross annual income. Paid each year in May. · Overtime and shift allowance will be paid by Xelvin accordingly. · Travel allowance of €0,23 per km, for the use of travelling to work and back home. · The salary will range from €3600 to €4600 gross (plus shift allowance if applicable)

Onboarding & benefits: · Finding your 1st accommodation in the Netherlands will be supported by Xelvin, with the help of our Housing Consultant (we help you find accommodation). In case of having to pay the 1st months rent or potential deposit, Xelvin is willing to pay it for you upfront, after which we’ll set up a loan agreement, for you to pay us back in terms. · Xelvin is certified to do VISA applications for you and your family and get your work permit in order so you can travel and start working (if required). · A relocation assistance allowance of €1000 - €1500 NET will be paid to you, to assist with the cost of relocating to the Netherlands. · You (and your family/partner) will be picked up at the airport or train station by your consultant/ recruiter after your arrival and will be taken to your new house. · Onboarding: we’ll advise you on how to set up a Dutch bank account, apply for health insurance, getting a Dutch BSN number, writing in with a dentist and general practitioner and other useful or necessary cases to arrange. · New Hire Dinner organized for all newly recruited engineers to make them aware of our Dutch tax system and explaining the Dutch payslip. · A few social gatherings with all Xelvin employees and recruited engineers; New Years drink at the local PSV stadium, where you’ll get a tour of the building and beverages and bites are served. Summer BBQ at the Evoluon, where you can grow your social circle and dance to some nice music while enjoying the food.

title: API PRD Writer || 2Months Project
description:
We are looking candidates with engineering and product teams to enhance API usability and efficiency. Job Responsibilities: Write clear, structured, and detailed API specifications, ensuring comprehensive endpoint documentation. Define data schemas, business rules, and validation logic, incorporating cross-resource dependencies. Establish error handling standards and validation rules to improve API reliability and consistency. Collaborate with engineering and product teams to refine API specifications and ensure seamless integration. Develop API documentation using Markdown, OpenAPI/Swagger, JSON Schema, and tools such as Postman or Stoplight. Job Requirements: API Design Expertise

– Experience in designing RESTful APIs for complex systems, handling at least 5+ related API resources (e.g., database tables, microservices). Data Modeling & Schema Design

– Strong understanding of relational and non-relational data structures, constraints, and validation rules. API Documentation Standards

– Proficiency with Markdown, OpenAPI/Swagger, JSON Schema, and documentation tools like Postman, Stoplight, or ReadMe.io. Technical Writing

– Ability to write clear, structured, and unambiguous API specifications, covering business rules and edge cases. HTTP & REST Protocol Knowledge

– Deep understanding of HTTP methods, response codes, headers, authentication, and error handling. API Lifecycle Management

– Familiarity with API versioning strategies, deprecation policies, and backward compatibility. Testing & Validation

– Experience with API contract testing, automated validation, and error response consistency. Domain Knowledge: Business Logic Translation

– Ability to convert complex business requirements into well-structured API specifications. Cross-Resource Rules

– Expertise in defining relationships, dependencies, and constraints across multiple API resources. Edge Case Handling

– Ability to anticipate and document exceptional scenarios and fallback mechanisms. Validation Logic

– Strong understanding of input validation, error messages, and business rule enforcement. Soft Skills: Exceptional Technical Writing

– Ability to produce detailed, precise, and easy-to-understand documentation in professional English. Attention to Detail

– Ensures that schemas, business rules, and validation logic are meticulously defined. Systems Thinking

– Understands how API components interact within larger system architectures. Problem Solving & Conflict Resolution

– Can navigate technical trade-offs, edge cases, and changing requirements effectively. Collaboration & Adaptability

– Works effectively with engineering, product teams, and stakeholders to refine API specs. Deliverable Expectations: Candidates must demonstrate the ability to create API PRDs that include: Complete Data Schemas

– All fields, types, constraints, and relationships. Comprehensive Endpoint Documentation

– Including request/response examples, parameters, and authentication details. Business Logic & Validation Rules

– Both resource-specific and cross-resource rules. Detailed API Endpoints & Error Handling

– Covering status codes, failure scenarios, and best practices for API consumers. Implementation Guidance

– Ensuring development teams can execute API designs without ambiguity.

title: Senior Devops Engineer (South America)
description:
Fully Remote Contract Position for Devops Engineers in Europe or South America.

Saturn Cloud is building an AI engineering platform for the next 100 million developers and data scientists. We enable everyone from hobbyists to Fortune 1000 to launch easily-configurable cloud notebooks with GPUs, jobs, deployments and a lot more. We are an early startup with significant funding from top venture capital firms and corporate partners like AWS, Microsoft, NVIDIA, and AMD.

This position is for a Senior Devops Engineer. This role spends a significant amount of time working with Kubernetes.

Devops engineers at Saturn Cloud do a variety of tasks. Here are some projects we have worked on: Created an authentication server for our Traefik forward-auth middleware. Building support for GCP, Azure, and Oracle Cloud.

For this position candidates should have: Experience working with Python and Go

. Experience working with Kubernetes. Experience working with Terraform and Helm Experience with Engineering best practices.

title: Technical Solutions Engineer - Databricks
description:
Revolutionize Data Solutions: Join Our Team as a DatabricksTechnical Solutions Engineer! Are you passionate about cutting-edge data technologies and thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment? We're seeking a highly skilled Technical Solutions Engineer to empower our customers to unlock the full potential of the Databricks unified analytics platform. In this role, you'll be a technical expert, providing solutions and guidance to address complex challenges related to Spark, Machine Learning, AI, Delta Lake, Streaming, and Lakehouse architectures. You'll play a crucial role in ensuring our customers achieve their strategic goals and maximize the value of our products. Make a Real Impact: Dive Deep into Spark:

Analyze and troubleshoot complex Spark issues using performance metrics, DAGs, and event logs, identifying root causes of job slowness and performance bottlenecks. Expert Problem Solver:

Provide deep code-level analysis and solutions for customer challenges related to Spark core internals, Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, Delta Lake, Lakehouse, and other Databricks runtime features. Empower Our Customers:

Assist customers in reproducing and resolving Spark problems, offering expert guidance in areas like Spark SQL, Delta Lake, memory management, performance tuning, streaming, data science, and data integration. Lead the Way:

Participate in our Designated Solutions Engineer program, mentoring and guiding strategic customers on their daily Spark and cloud-related challenges. Collaborate and Communicate:

Work closely with Account Executives, Customer Success Engineers, and Resident Solution Architects to coordinate customer issues and share best practices. Actively participate in screen sharing sessions, Slack discussions, and other communication channels. Knowledge Sharer:

Develop and maintain internal wikis, knowledge bases, and technical documentation to empower both support teams and customers. Contribute to company documentation and knowledge base articles. Continuous Improvement:

Collaborate with Engineering and Backline Support teams to report product defects and drive improvements. Be Part of the Team:

Participate in weekend and weekday on-call rotations, managing escalations during runtime outages and critical incidents, ensuring seamless customer operations. What You'll Bring: Hands-on Expertise:

3+ years of experience developing production-scale applications using two or more of the following technologies: Big Data, Hadoop, Spark (mandatory), Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Streaming, Kafka, Data Science, or Elasticsearch. Spark Mastery:

Proven experience in performance tuning and troubleshooting Hive and Spark-based applications in a production environment. JVM and Memory Management:

Real-world experience with JVM and memory management techniques, including garbage collection and heap/thread dump analysis. Database Proficiency:

Experience with SQL-based databases, data warehousing/ETL technologies (e.g., Informatica, DataStage, Oracle, Teradata, SQL Server, MySQL), and SCD-type use cases. Cloud Experience:

Familiarity with AWS, Azure, or GCP cloud platforms. Excellent Communication:

Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly and concisely. Problem-Solving Prowess:

A passion for solving challenging technical problems and a commitment to customer success. Join us and be at the forefront of data innovation!

title: Analista de Suporte PL - Especialista Dynatrace
description:

Além de estarmos cercados de restaurantes com variedade culinária, e próximo das principais vias da região (Nações Unidas/Faria Lima).Atuação Híbrida (3x na semana no escritório e 2x em casa)

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Graphic Designer or Creative Lead, Creative Designer, Senior Designer, and Digital Designer are all alternative job titles that match our client's requirements. This flexible role can be offered either part-time or full-time with the opportunity to work for a 100% and permanently remote Digital Marketing Agency. You can be based anywhere with strong/reliable internet connectivity. A full job description with company info will be provided upon application . The role manages 12-15 social media content calendars for clients across B2B sectors per month. Collaborating with the Lead Strategist (former graphic designer) to develop brand identities by executing new concepts, designs of various content types, graphics, social media, email campaigns, website design, and more. It's

100% digital design

for social media posts, website design, posters, etc. Requirements:

Must have video skills, motion graphics, and basic knowledge of UX/web design. Experience working with AI tools to create graphic design and design output. Excellent verbal and written communication skills and the ability to present well to clients and internally. Extremely high level of written and oral English communication.

Knowledge of what it means to design within the B2B sector and be creative even within conservative design limits. Resourcefulness is essential—you aren't afraid when you don't know how to do something because you usually figure it out on your own.

CV/Resume and online portfolio applications are welcomed. A complete job description with the agency name (website) will be shared before the first interview.

title: Salesforce Developer - Advanced English - Remote
description:
About HCLTech

HCLTech is a global technology company, spread across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering, cloud and AI, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. To learn more about how we can supercharge progress for you, visit

Developer

will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing standard configuration with design in mind. The developer will also be responsible for maintaining and enhancing existing Salesforce applications and ensuring their seamless integration with other systems. Implement best practices for scalability, supportability, ease of maintenance, and system performance Define solution limitations and requirements and work with Architects to ensure all systems integrate into the solution’s technology stack Communicate the solution context and intent and align development stakeholders on the technical direction Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements and translate them into technical specifications. Develop and maintain integrations between Salesforce and other systems using APIs and middleware Perform data migrations and ensure data integrity within the Salesforce platform Work with business stakeholders and IT to transition from WordPress and other CMSs to Salesforce Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Salesforce applications and integrations Create and maintain technical documentation, including design specifications, processes, user guides, and release notes Stay up-to-date with Salesforce best practices, new features, and industry trends Develop and implement maintenance procedures, monitor systems health, gather system statistics, and troubleshoot reported errors and alarms

Qualifications: Fluent in English to cover global needs Associates degree required, Bachelor's degree preferred in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field Salesforce implementation for a large organization with specific focus on the Manufacturing, Sales, Experience, Marketing and Service cloud Experience working with information technologies and systems analysis WordPress Experience to adapt similar functionality to Salesforce sites Salesforce Developer certification (e.g., Platform Developer I, Platform Developer II) is preferred Proven experience in Salesforce development, including Apex, Visualforce, Lightning components, and Salesforce APIs Strong understanding of Salesforce architecture, data model, and security model Strong knowledge of business processes, and how data and software applications support those processes Experience with integration tools and middleware as it relates to Salesforce with other systems Proficiency in web development technologies (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON) and frameworks (e.g., Angular, React) is a plus Strong understanding and knowledge of the principles and practices associated with packaged and/or SaaS applications Knowledge of agile methodologies and frameworks such as Kanban preferred Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail Strong proficiency in estimation and planning Strong communication and collaboration skills

Preferred Salesforce Developer certification (e.g., Platform Developer I, Platform Developer II) is preferred Bachelor's degree preferred in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field

Share resume in English

title: ZEISS MED | Banco de Talentos para Técnicos e Engenheiros de Campo | Belo Horizonte / Minas Gerais!
description:
Estamos sempre analisando os currículos cadastrados e, havendo uma oportunidade alinhada ao seu perfil, entraremos em contato para que você participe de nosso processo seletivo!

Sobre a ZEISS: - Fundada como uma fábrica para mecânica de precisão e óptica na cidade de Jena, Alemanha, em 1846, a Carl Zeiss é hoje um líder mundial nas indústrias óptica e optoeletrônica. Temos escritórios em mais de 30 países e somos representados em mais de 100 países, com centros de produção na Europa, América do Norte, América Central e na Ásia. - Nossa tarefa mais importante é levar os usuários da tecnologia ZEISS a áreas que permaneceram escondidas no passado. Nós somos líderes de mercado na maioria dos campos onde atuamos. Oferecemos um espectro extraordinário de soluções inteligentes e produtos nas áreas de tecnologia Médica, Tecnologia em Metrologia Industrial e Tecnologia em Microscopia.

Sobre a nossa Divisão Médica : - Oferecemos soluções completas para diagnósticos e tratamentos oftalmológicos, além da avançada tecnologia de radioterapia intraoperatória e soluções de visualização inovadoras para neurocirurgia, odontologia, entre outros. Nosso portfólio possui promissoras tecnologias do futuro que garante aos seus parceiros e clientes confiança e excelência.

Sobre o nosso Banco de Talentos para Técnicos e Engenheiro de Campo: Base de Trabalho - Belo Horizonte e região.

Atividades: - Instalação, treinamento aos usuários e manutenção (preventiva e corretiva) de equipamentos médicos. - Manter registros dos serviços executados e enviar relatórios dos atendimentos realizados. - Garantir a satisfação do cliente de acordo com métricas de atendimento, prazo, performance e qualidade.

Requisitos: - Experiência anterior com instalação e manutenção de equipamentos médicos. - Conhecimentos em TI (Hardware / Software / Redes - instalação / formatação / configuração). - Graduação em Engenharia e/ ou formação técnica (Eletrotécnica, Eletromecânica, Mecatrônica, Eletrônica, Elétrica). - CNH em dia e disponibilidade para viagens. - Bom nível de Inglês é imprescindível.

Nosso compromisso com a Diversidade e Inclusão: - A ZEISS acredita na igualdade de oportunidades. Independentemente de gênero, idade, raça, cor, credo, orientação sexual e deficiência, todas as pessoas qualificadas serão consideradas em nossos processos seletivos. Trabalhamos para construir um ambiente diverso e com equidade de oportunidades. Valorizamos e respeitamos todas as diferenças.

title: Technical Solutions Engineer - Databricks
description:
Revolutionize Data Solutions: Join Our Team as a DatabricksTechnical Solutions Engineer! Are you passionate about cutting-edge data technologies and thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment? We're seeking a highly skilled Technical Solutions Engineer to empower our customers to unlock the full potential of the Databricks unified analytics platform. In this role, you'll be a technical expert, providing solutions and guidance to address complex challenges related to Spark, Machine Learning, AI, Delta Lake, Streaming, and Lakehouse architectures. You'll play a crucial role in ensuring our customers achieve their strategic goals and maximize the value of our products. Make a Real Impact: Dive Deep into Spark:

Analyze and troubleshoot complex Spark issues using performance metrics, DAGs, and event logs, identifying root causes of job slowness and performance bottlenecks. Expert Problem Solver:

Provide deep code-level analysis and solutions for customer challenges related to Spark core internals, Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, Delta Lake, Lakehouse, and other Databricks runtime features. Empower Our Customers:

Assist customers in reproducing and resolving Spark problems, offering expert guidance in areas like Spark SQL, Delta Lake, memory management, performance tuning, streaming, data science, and data integration. Lead the Way:

Participate in our Designated Solutions Engineer program, mentoring and guiding strategic customers on their daily Spark and cloud-related challenges. Collaborate and Communicate:

Work closely with Account Executives, Customer Success Engineers, and Resident Solution Architects to coordinate customer issues and share best practices. Actively participate in screen sharing sessions, Slack discussions, and other communication channels. Knowledge Sharer:

Develop and maintain internal wikis, knowledge bases, and technical documentation to empower both support teams and customers. Contribute to company documentation and knowledge base articles. Continuous Improvement:

Collaborate with Engineering and Backline Support teams to report product defects and drive improvements. Be Part of the Team:

Participate in weekend and weekday on-call rotations, managing escalations during runtime outages and critical incidents, ensuring seamless customer operations. What You'll Bring: Hands-on Expertise:

3+ years of experience developing production-scale applications using two or more of the following technologies: Big Data, Hadoop, Spark (mandatory), Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Streaming, Kafka, Data Science, or Elasticsearch. Spark Mastery:

Proven experience in performance tuning and troubleshooting Hive and Spark-based applications in a production environment. JVM and Memory Management:

Real-world experience with JVM and memory management techniques, including garbage collection and heap/thread dump analysis. Database Proficiency:

Experience with SQL-based databases, data warehousing/ETL technologies (e.g., Informatica, DataStage, Oracle, Teradata, SQL Server, MySQL), and SCD-type use cases. Cloud Experience:

Familiarity with AWS, Azure, or GCP cloud platforms. Excellent Communication:

Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly and concisely. Problem-Solving Prowess:

A passion for solving challenging technical problems and a commitment to customer success. Join us and be at the forefront of data innovation!

title: Associate Manager
description:

Clearstate specializes in healthcare-focused market intelligence and strategic advisory services, assisting MedTech companies, biotechnology firms and healthcare service providers in identifying and leveraging market growth opportunities.We are committed to delivering actionable strategies rooted in robust data analytics, built on the basis of market realities, empowering our clients to make informed decisions. Our mission is to provide credible, actionable and granular market insights globally, and provide value-adding advisory tailored to the needs of the MedTech sector.We are seeking highly motivated Associate Manager/ Manager to lead the development and delivery of market data solutions and custom research projects aligned with our business objectives.ResponsibilitiesProject ManagementLead a team of analysts in developing global market tracker solutions and custom research projects focused on healthcare market insightsDefine project requirements, including analytical models, research methodologies, timeline and budgetsEnsure project setup, design, and delivery are aligned with client needs, providing actionable, customer-centric insightsInnovate and enhance data solutions by conceptualizing new product ideas, additional analyses, and improvementsApply advanced analytical and quantitative tools to extract meaningful business insightsContent Development and Project DeliveryDeliver high quality data insights with deep domain knowledge expertise in assigned sectors and regionsDevelop clear, actionable recommendations based on research and analysisConfidently lead client presentations, ensuring clarity and impactServe as the client engagement lead, communicating project updates and presenting key milestonesClient and Stakeholder EngagementCollaborate with client to align on deliverables, ensuring insights meet their needsEngage effectively with various client stakeholders during project delivery and presentationsSupport business development and marketing initiatives by contributing content and domain expertiseFor Managers:

Lead, appraise and develop team members, fostering skill development and ensuring team successExperience5+ years in market analysis, market intelligence, or business consulting, with proven project and client management experience (preferably in healthcare or consulting)QualificationsBachelor’s or Masters’ degree in Science, Business or related fieldsMBA preferred

title: AI Project Manager
description:
We are seeking a Project Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in project management, specifically in the AI domain.

This role involves overseeing ongoing AI projects, managing client relationships, coordinating with internal teams, and ensuring the successful delivery of projects. We are looking for individuals who are not only skilled in project management but also enthusiastic about AI and eager to drive new solutions.

While technical expertise is valuable, the primary focus is on project management and client satisfaction. This role sits in the Digital Transformation Center and will be close to delivery and research teams.

Role duration: long-term. Contract type: contractor / “PJ”. Availability to work according to European time-zone.

Job Mission :

To manage AI projects, ensuring successful delivery. To encourage a culture of excellence within the team. To advance AI initiatives through cross-functional collaboration. To engage across functions (SMEs, technical teams, leaderships) to guarantee delivery quality.

Key Responsibilities :

Project Management: Lead end-to-end project management for AI initiatives, from initiation to successful delivery. Develop project plans, allocate resources, track progress, and ensure timely completion of milestones and deliverables. Client Engagement: Serve as the primary point of contact for clients, maintaining strong relationships and ensuring clear communication. Understand client needs, manage expectations, and address concerns promptly to achieve customer satisfaction. Risk Management: Identify potential project risks and develop mitigation strategies. Proactively address issues that may impact project timelines, scope, or quality, ensuring smooth project execution. Reporting and Documentation: Maintain accurate project documentation, including project plans, progress reports, and stakeholder communications. Ensure that project status and updates are communicated effectively to both internal teams and clients. Team Leadership: Provide leadership and direction to project teams, fostering a collaborative and results-driven environment. Mentor team members, promote knowledge sharing, and support professional growth. Global Approach: Interact with other regions, partners and ventures following a global approach to ensure consistency and alignment in AI project management across the organization.

Required experience : Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, Project Management, or a related field. Around 5 years of experience as a project manager for IT. Experience in managing projects AI projects from conception to delivery. Familiarity with AI technologies and their applications. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to engage with technical and non-technical stakeholders. Proficiency in project management methodologies and tools. Problem-solving mindset with the ability to navigate challenges and adapt to changing project requirements. Critical thinking and problem solving to assess client situation and provide actionable outcome-based business/technical advice PMP, PMI-ACP, or other relevant project management certifications (preferred). Advanced proficiency in English is required. Proficiency in Portuguese is desirable.

Technical Knowledge: Familiarity with AI concepts, terminology, and industry trends. Understanding of project management methodologies specific to AI projects. Ability to evaluate technical feasibility and make informed project decisions based on technical considerations. Proficiency in using project management software and tools for AI project tracking and management. Knowledge and experience on conducting projects for IT and Service Desk solutions. A background in IT environments, including an understanding of how various IT components and systems operate, is highly beneficial. This knowledge helps in navigating technical aspects, ensuring seamless integration of AI solutions within existing IT infrastructures. Excellent communication skills Strong project management skills

What's next: It's best to apply today, because job postings can be taken down and we wouldn't want you to miss this opportunity. To apply, please submit your updated CV.

The preceding job description had been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed by employees within this classification. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties and responsibilities required of employees assigned to this job.

We have a direct presence in 41 countries, through our 70 offices located throughout the world. We have managed to become the preferred partner of many small-to-midsize local and regional companies as well. Most of our clients come from industries such as financial services, manufacturing, telecommunications, chemical, services, technology, public sector and utilities. Stefanini has career opportunities locally and around the world for professionals interested in a vibrant, passionate, team-oriented workplace. title: Desenvolvedor Python Sênior
description:
A

Juntos Somos Mais

é uma startup de tecnologia atuando no mercado da construção civil desde 2018 que tem como acionistas três gigantes do mercado: Votorantim Cimentos, Gerdau e Tigre.

Fazemos isso por meio de tecnologia, com produtos próprios, parcerias, aquisições e com um time empreendedor, de alta performance, que é movido pela nossa paixão em transformar vidas! Hoje contamos com mais de 40 marcas participantes, mais de 1.2 milhões de membros entre lojistas, vendedores e profissionais de obra, 100 mil lojas e movimentamos mais de 10 bilhões de reais em nossa Loja Virtual em 2024, e crescemos mais a cada dia.

O nosso time é empreendedor e apaixonado por propor as melhores soluções para os nossos usuários, fortalecendo o varejo de materiais de construção e impactando a vida de milhares de pessoas. Através disso, construímos relações sólidas para sermos o maior ecossistema da construção civil. O seu desafio será criar e implementar as melhores soluções para suportar o negócio, privilegiando sempre a qualidade, a experiência dos membros e a partilha das melhores práticas. A nossa equipe é empreendedora e apaixonada pelo propósito de fortalecer o comércio de materiais de construção e transformar a vida dos profissionais que constroem sonhos. O nosso sonho é grande e a vontade de fazer mais é o que nos move!

Responsabilidades: Desenvolver e suportar aplicações para atender às necessidades do negócio; Construir um código com qualidade e testável; Estudar e implementar novas tecnologias aderentes à plataforma; Apoiar na manutenção e evolução da arquitetura dos sistemas; Atuar em time ágil.

Requisitos: Domínio de Python e atuação em projetos com Django; Modelagem de APIs: desenvolvimento e consumo (REST); Domínio de Testes Automatizados (unitário e integrado); Experiência com NoSQL databases; Experiência com Docker e Kubernetes; Experiência atuando com meios de pagamento; Ter atuado em times ágeis (Kanban, Scrum) e gostar de atuar com time multi-funcional.

INFORMAÇÕES ADICIONAIS

Nosso processo seletivo Aqui no processo seletivo da #Juntos, valorizamos o aprendizado e o desenvolvimento conjunto. Acreditamos que temos muito a aprender e a ensinar, então levamos isto para todas as fases dessa jornada!

Remuneração variável

para reconhecer seu esforço e desempenho; Plano odontológico e de saúde : Amil, com co-participação de 30% paga no momento da utilização. O plano é extensível para cônjuge e filhos. Vale-refeição/alimentação

com o cartão Flash – você decide como utilizar! Wellhub

– Academia e saúde do corpo onde você preferir! Zenklub

– Cuide da sua saúde mental com o nosso apoio; Auxílio creche

– Para cuidar do desenvolvimento de quem você ama; Auxílio Home Office

– Para transformar seu ambiente de trabalho em casa; Kit Ergonomia

– Monte sua estação de trabalho do jeito que você quiser; Licença maternidade de 180 dias e licença parental de 30 dias

– Apoio completo para quem se torna pai ou mãe, incluindo casais homoafetivos e famílias que adotam ou obtêm a guarda judicial de crianças; InvestPass

– Para cuidar da sua saúde financeira; Massagem no escritório : Toda quarta-feira temos massagem disponível no escritório. Desconto em escolas de idiomas : Firmamos parcerias com a Cultura Inglesa e com a Elleve, oferecendo descontos para os colaboradores. Desconto em cursos de universidades

para você e seus dependentes; SESC

– Para você dedicar tempo àqueles que mais ama; Day off de aniversário

– Cuidando da sua saúde no inverno; Medicina do trabalho

– Para garantir que você esteja sempre bem.

Diversidade e Inclusão Acreditamos que a diversidade é enriquecedora. Por isso, incentivamos que as pessoas que trabalham aqui tenham a liberdade para ser quem são de verdade. Somos feitos de gente, e valorizamos a importância do toque mais pessoal de cada um para a construção de um time forte, empático e divertido!

title: Analista de Gestão de Portfólio Sênior
description:
Vem ser Ituber & vem fazer Itaú

O Itaú é a marca mais valiosa do Brasil, a melhor empresa para trabalhar segundo o Great Place to Work e o maior banco da América Latina. Nós impactamos diariamente mais de 60 milhões de clientes em 18 países. Somos feitos de pessoas e acreditamos que ter um quadro com pluralidade de origens, culturas, crenças, experiências, raças, deficiências, gêneros, orientações afetivo-sexuais e gerações ampliam as perspectivas e contribuem para um clima de respeito e valorização das diferenças. Não queremos você apenas por achar que tem a nossa cara. Queremos ter um pouco da sua também!

As nossas vagas são para atuar no modelo híbrido, por isso, é importante ter disponibilidade para atuar em São Paulo (8x mínimas no mês)

O que você precisa para ser um Ituber?

Estamos buscando pessoas que queiram se desenvolver e aprender constantemente, compartilhando, colaborando, inovando e entregando valor para todos os nossos clientes. Aqui a gente não sabe tudo, a gente vai de turma.

Como é o dia a dia de um Ituber nessa área?

Desenvolver e otimizar roteiros contábeis automatizados para produtos e serviços financeiros, garantindo a aderência a normas contábeis (CPC, IFRS, BACEN). Atuar na conciliação contábil e fechamento financeiro, utilizando ferramentas tecnológicas para aumentar a precisão e eficiência dos processos. Trabalhar em conjunto com equipes de tecnologia e contabilidade para definir regras de negocio contábeis e garantir a correta implementação nos sistemas. Acompanhar projetos de transformação digital na contabilidade, incluindo automação de processos e integração de dados. Participar da gestão de portifólio de projetos contábeis e financeiros, priorizando iniciativas e garantindo governança sobre processos e entregas. Habilidades Técnicas Necessárias: Contabilidade & Gestão Financeira: Formação e experiência em Contabilidade Financeira e Normativa (CPC, IFRS, BACEN). Experiência em roteiros contábeis, fechamento contábil e reconciliação de contas. Conhecimento em gestão financeira e regulatória aplicável ao setor bancário e financeiro. Tecnologia & Análise de Dados: Conhecimento em Excel Avançado e ferramentas de análise de dados e noções de linguagens de programação ou automação de processos (Python, SQL, Spark ou similares) serão um diferencial. Familiaridade com metodologias ágeis e gestão de portifólio de projetos dentro de TI.

Estamos em busca de um Analista de Gestão de Portifólio com especialização em Contabilidade e forte interação com tecnologia para se juntar à nossa equipe no Itaú Unibanco. Este profissional atuará na interface entre Contabilidade e Tecnologia, sendo responsável pelo desenvolvimento e implementação de roteiros contábeis para produtos e serviços financeiros, garantindo aderência às normas contábeis e otimizando processos através de soluções tecnológicas.

Esta posição combina habilidades analíticas, conhecimento contábil e entendimento de sistemas financeiros e de dados, sendo ideal para profissionais que desejam atuar em um ambiente dinâmico e com possibilidades de evolução de carreira dentro da estrutura de TI.

No que você precisa mandar bem?

Graduação em Ciências Contábeis, Economia, Administração ou áreas afins (CRC ativo será um diferencial). Experiência prévia em instituições financeiras, auditoria contábil, consultoria financeira ou funções similares. Capacidade de trabalhar em ambiente dinâmico, com foco em processos escaláveis e digitalização. Diferenciais para Evolução de Carreira: Oportunidade de atuação na interseção entre Contabilidade, Tecnologia e Dados, abrindo caminhos para evolução em funções estratégicas dentro de TI. Possibilidade de transição para carreiras em Data Analytics, Engenharia de Dados, Gestão de Projetos ou Produtos Digitais. Ambiente inovador com integração de novas tecnologias aplicadas à contabilidade e gestão financeira.

Ao se tornar um Ituber você tem

• Vale Transporte • Vale Refeição (Restaurantes) / Vale Alimentação (Supermercados) • Convênio médico e odontológico • Seguro de Vida • PLR – Participação nos Lucros e Resultados (Mediante resultados do banco) • Previdência privada • Descontos exclusivos em nossos produtos financeiros • Licença maternidade estendida & paternidade • Auxílio Creche / Babá (para papais e mamães) • Incentivo a estudos • GymPass ou TotalPass • Acesso aos Clubes Itaú (Guarapiranga / Itanhaém e São Sebastião) • + Algumas vantagens que você pode conhecer durante o processo

#VemProItaú #VemSerItuber

*Estimulamos candidaturas de pessoas com deficiência em todas as nossas posições, sendo assim, sinta-se à vontade para se candidatar em vagas sinalizadas como exclusivas ou não para pessoas com deficiência. Somos comprometidos com a inclusão e valorizamos a diversidade. Se você se identificou, então seu lugar é aqui
