title: Analista de QA Pleno
description:
Sua próxima oportunidade está a caminho! A

VILT

é uma empresa de TI, onde valorizamos nosso pessoal, promovemos o trabalho em equipe e, é claro, o bom humor. Dê uma olhada nesta oportunidade de emprego e veja se você é o próximo VILTian! (se você conhece alguém, não se esqueça de recomendá-lo)

Se você tem paixão por garantir a qualidade de software e possui sólida experiência em testes de API, automação e testes manuais, essa oportunidade de

Analista de QA Pleno

é para você! Buscamos alguém que tenha um olhar crítico, seja proativo(a) e goste de trabalhar em equipe para elevar a qualidade dos nossos produtos.

O que você irá fazer: Planejar, projetar e executar testes manuais e automatizados, com foco em APIs e integrações; Criar e manter planos de testes, casos de teste e roteiros de automação; Desenvolver e manter scripts de testes automatizados para APIs (RestAssured, Postman, Karate, etc.); Identificar, documentar e reportar bugs e falhas no sistema, garantindo a rastreabilidade dos defeitos; Colaborar com times de desenvolvimento, produto e UX para garantir a entrega de software de alta qualidade; Monitorar métricas de qualidade e sugerir melhorias contínuas nos processos de QA; Participar de revisões de código e especificações funcionais para antecipar possíveis falhas; Trabalhar com ferramentas e frameworks de automação de testes (Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, etc.); Executar testes funcionais, regressivos, de integração, carga e performance conforme necessário.

O que esperamos de você: Experiência mínima de 5 anos na área de QA, com foco em testes de API e automação; Experiência com testes manuais e automatizados para serviços web e APIs (Postman, RestAssured, Karate, etc.); Conhecimento sólido em metodologias ágeis (Scrum, Kanban); Experiência com ferramentas de automação de testes (Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, etc.); Experiência com ferramentas de gerenciamento de testes (JIRA, TestRail, etc.); Conhecimento em bancos de dados SQL e NoSQL para validação de dados; Experiência com CI/CD e pipelines de automação de testes; Noções de programação (Java, JavaScript, Python ou outras linguagens para automação).

Informações adicionais: Modelo de contrato CLT; Híbrido – São Paulo, SP.

Se você estiver pronto para levar sua carreira de controle de qualidade para o próximo nível, adoraríamos conhecê-lo! Inscreva-se agora!

title: Microsoft C# .NET Developer / Programmer
description:
Company Description DataSelf Corp simplifies and amplifies BI with its own ETL+ and data warehousing plus Tableau, Power BI, Excel, and other Microsoft BI technologies such as Fabric, Data Lake, and Synapse. We also provide business intelligence expertise and comprehensive out-of-the-box solutions with over 8,000 report, dashboard, and KPI templates for popular mid-market business applications such as ERP, CRM, POS, and Ecommerce (e.g., Acumatica, BigCommerce, HubSpot, Infor CRM/ERP, Magento, Microsoft Dynamics 365 BC / CRM / GP / F&O, NetSuite, Quickbooks, Sage 100, Sage 300, Sage 500, Sage CRM, Sage CRE, Sage Intacct, Sage X3, Salesforce, SAP Business One, SellerCloud, Shopify). DataSelf has been in business since 2005 and is headquartered in Silicon Valley / California, with a presence in over twelve US states, Brazil, and Israel. Our solutions combine technology, art, and communications to create a unique, industry-leading, business intelligence platform. We’re looking for talented individuals who care about the people behind a business, empowering them with solutions that bring success and satisfaction. DataSelf offers competitive compensation, significant professional growth, a dynamic work environment, flexible vacation time, and a growing team of motivated, collaborative, and fun data heroes.

Role Description This is a full-time remote role for a Microsoft Developer with C#, .NET, MS SQL Server. As a Microsoft Developer / Programmer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining DataSelf ETL+ software applications using C#, .NET, and MS SQL Server. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design solutions, and implement high-quality code. This is an opportunity to join a dynamic team and contribute to developing cutting-edge business intelligence solutions.

Qualifications Our ETL+ product development team is in Brazil. Located in Florianopolis, Recife, or vicinities is a plus. Fluent Portuguese is a must, and English fluency is a plus. Your available working capacity must align with BRT business hours. 10+ years’ experience with C# and the .NET framework Experience with Microsoft SQL Server and T-SQL Strong knowledge of object-oriented programming principles Preferably experience with web development technologies such as REST API and JavaScript Preferably experience with development tools such as Git, Snyk, and AI/ChatGPT Understanding of software development methodologies and best practices Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills Strong communication and collaboration abilities Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field Microsoft certifications in C#, MS SQL Server, and .NET are a plus Note: This job description is intended to provide a general overview of the position and does not represent a comprehensive list of all responsibilities and requirements.

title: Senior C/C++ Engineer with Linux
description:
Founded in 1984, our client is one of the world's leading provider of lithography systems for the semiconductor industry, manufacturing complex machines that are critical to the production of integrated circuits or chips. The client has its R&D and manufacturing operations in The Netherlands. Luxoft is currently searching to augment the Development & Engineering Department with a talented software engineer to design and implement embedded software for systems among the highest precision ever produced in the world. The collaboration with our client has reached the 10 years threshold and we have more than 300 talented colleagues working alongside the client.

Responsibilities: As a software engineer, you will be working on Linux server applications for metrology components and on complex algorithms application software. You will be working with electrical engineers, mechatronic engineers and system engineers to define the software requirements. After your SW design is approved you are responsible for implementing the design in Python & C for new modules. Auto and unit testers are written in Python. During the testing phase, you will collect the necessary data so you can write a test report. This test report is then reviewed and when it is approved your software will be released. The development environment is Red Hat Linux, execution environment is Wind River Linux. The software release driving a client machine is 40 million lines of code. Client SW teams work in various modes such as Agile and SAFE.

Mandatory Skills Description: C/C++: application coding (C language 70%) Linux (one of more of the following): familiar with command line tools, makefile, git, shell and python scripting Embedded C and C++: understanding and maintaining legacy code. Adding new features while keeping compliance with established architecture. Version control using command line is also required - Git, Clear Case and SVN, in this order of priority. • Bachelor or Master with an education in Computer Science, Informatics or equivalent

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: Willing to learn/improve Python skills Agile mindset

Languages: English: B2 Upper Intermediate

title: AV/ADAS Software Application Engineer
description:
***Please send your CV in English

Role Description: Be part of the Application Engineering Team responsible for adapting and deploying Foretellix verification & validation (V&V) solutions to our customers and making them successful at their mission to provide next-gen ADAS/AV products. Our Application Engineers have a unique mix of ADAS/AV domain knowledge, software expertise, creativity, and the ability to work closely with customers to maximize the impact our solution can have on their ability to deliver high quality, safe products.

What will you do: Deploy the Foretellix solution at customer accounts. From tools installation and integration, customer training and ramp-up, to defining the V&V strategy, including both remote and on-site support. Shape our products by being the primary point of contact between the customer and R&D. Understand the customer’s V&V challenges and translate them into product requirements to help improve the products. Work with the sales team as the technical product expert to develop and deliver demos and presentations to customers, as well as guide and support customer product evaluations. When required, create application notes, methodology documents, and technical presentations.

Requirements: Knowledge in Software Engineering, including OO programming, testing, and debugging. BSc or above in the areas of Computer Science, Automotive Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Robotics, or other related fields. Have excellent human relationship skills. Be communicative and fluent in English, both verbal and in writing. Be a team-player, resourceful, and professional.

Advantages: Experience in ADAS/AV V&V, testing, and simulation. At least 3 years of industry working experience, ideally in the ADAS/AV domain. Previous experience in customer facing engineering such as Field Application Engineering, Sales Engineering, Professional Services, or related positions. Running and working with ADAS/AV Simulators, e.g. Carla, Sumo, Carmaker, Vires, etc... Employee in one of the ADAS/AV companies, or one of the companies serving them. Previous experience as a Product Manager / Methodology Engineer. Knowledge & experience with ADAS/AV verification. Knowledge & experience with advanced verification, and specifically with Specman and the ‘e’ language, and/or SystemVerilog UVM, Perspec PSS, and Coverage Driven Verification. MSc or above in the areas of Computer Science, Automotive Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Robotics, or other related fields. Substantial experience in Software Engineering, including OO programming.

title: Quality Assurance Analyst
description:
Company Description Metrobi is a delivery fulfillment platform designed specifically to support local businesses. We help these businesses manage their deliveries efficiently by connecting them with skilled drivers tailored to meet their delivery needs. Additionally, we provide essential tools for logistical, financial, and marketing support, empowering local food and beverage makers to expand their businesses

Role of the QA Team: Our QA team is crucial in ensuring the quality of our platform. There are two main tasks you will focus on: Bug Analysis:

Understand and diagnose bugs that make it into production. This requires a solid understanding of our product and excellent problem-solving skills. Feature Verification:

Manually check whether new features work as intended. This involves strong analytical skills to assess user experience and interface design.

While specific technical skills like SQL, Git, reading Python code, and creating automated tests are beneficial, they are not required.

﻿We're looking for candidates with strong English, product analysis skills, and excellent communication. This is a full-time position offering $600+/month.

title: Flutter Developer
description:
Job Title: Senior Frontend Developer (Flutter) Location:

Remote (open to candidates worldwide) Type:

Full-Time Compensation:

Competitive Salary Company:

Confidential Client (AI Talent Development Software Company)

How to Apply: If you are a passionate Senior Flutter Developer looking to join an innovative AI startup and make a difference, we want to hear from you! Please send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter to



with "Senior Flutter Developer Application" in the subject line.

What if your Flutter development skills could help create cutting-edge applications that shape the future of AI-driven talent development? If you're ready to take on a leadership role in an innovative team dedicated to redefining personal growth and professional coaching, this is your opportunity!

About Us: Our confidential client is an innovative Artificial Intelligence (AI) company, focused on revolutionizing personal and professional development through advanced AI-driven coaching, simulation, and habit development technology. Utilizing their proprietary Generative Coaching Transformer (“GCT”), Generative Simulation Trainer (“GST”), and Generative Habit Developer (“GHD”) they empower individuals, teams, and organizations of any size, worldwide, to enhance leadership, optimize performance, and foster a culture of continuous learning. Join a pioneering team dedicated to transforming how people learn, grow, and thrive.

Founder / CEO: Fueled by a relentless passion for service, the company's founder aims to revolutionize professional coaching, making it accessible and inclusive for every team member, regardless of role or position. A seasoned entrepreneur with decades of experience in launching and revitalizing businesses, the founder has created a transformative AI-driven platform. This cutting-edge solution seamlessly integrates organizational fitness with AI, delivering tailored coaching at scale.

As a multifaceted leader, our founder excels as an entrepreneur, investor, and C-level executive, with a proven record of accomplishment of transforming visionary ideas into high-growth, value-driven organizations. A respected thought leader in the social sciences, the founder's academic publications showcase a deep understanding of human behavior in complex systems. With a talent for building and revitalizing teams, the founder has transformed dozens of businesses across 21 U.S. states, consistently turning underperforming teams into high-achievers and generating over $4.2 billion in shareholder equity through two successful healthcare startups.

Role Overview: As a Senior Flutter Developer, you will play a critical role in designing and implementing mobile applications that leverage AI-driven capabilities. You will lead the development team, ensuring best practices in coding, architecture, and performance optimization while collaborating across various teams to drive innovation and quality in our applications.

About PHHSX: Our Core Values Our organization operates under the guiding principles of PHHSX, which stands for: P assion: A commitment to our mission of empowering individuals and teams to achieve their best. H umble: A willingness to accept feedback and learn from experiences, demonstrating ongoing growth. H ungry: An eagerness to continuously improve skills and contributions, pushing past limitations. S mart (People Smart): The capacity to understand and manage our emotions and those of others. X -Factor: Commitment to executing projects with excellence and without excuses.

SCCKEPPP Framework: Ensuring Functional Fit

The SCCKEPPP framework is designed to ensure that we align the right talent with the right roles effectively and accurately. It includes the following components: Skills : Core technical and soft skills required for success in the role. Circumstances : Personal and external life circumstances that could influence work success. Conditions : Formal prerequisites and qualities necessary for the job. Knowledge : Required knowledge areas critical for performance in the role. Experience : Type and depth of experience needed for the position. Past Performance : Achievements or performance metrics indicating excellence in similar roles. Potential : Traits indicating future growth and adaptability.

The “What” Pillar: Ensure a Functional Match (“Be SCCKEPPP-tical”)

Skills (S) Flutter Development : Expert in building responsive and performant applications using Flutter and Dart. State Management : Proficient with patterns like BLoC, Provider, or Riverpod for state management. Cross-Platform Expertise : Strong experience with mobile development principles for both iOS and Android platforms. Code Optimization : Ability to write clean, maintainable, and scalable code while optimizing performance. Collaboration Tools : Familiarity with version control systems like Git and project management using tools like Jira or Trello.

User Interface Design : Experience in designing intuitive UI/UX consistent with the client’s branding.

Circumstances (C) Personal Stability : A stable home environment conducive to remote work. Career Stage : Ideal candidates are seasoned professionals ready to guide and mentor junior developers. Time Flexibility : Ability to work across different time zones, accommodating collaborative sessions.

Conditions (C) Mandatory Education : Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. Experience Requirement : 5+ years in mobile application development, specifically with Flutter and Dart. Remote Work Capability : Comfort working independently in a remote setting with effective time management.

Knowledge (K) Industry Knowledge : Understanding of the mobile app development lifecycle and best practices for Flutter development. AI Technologies : Familiarity with AI-driven applications and concepts, especially in coaching and performance-enhancing contexts. Regulatory Knowledge : Awareness of compliance standards like GDPR that influence application design and functionality.

Experience (E) Professional Background : Proven experience in developing and launching successful mobile applications using Flutter, with a robust portfolio highlighting past projects. Quantifiable Experience : Evidence of working on high-impact projects that improved user engagement and performance metrics.

Past Performance (PP) Achievements : Examples of successful application features developed that led to high user satisfaction and retention rates. Collaboration Success : Recognized contributions to agile development teams that resulted in the timely delivery of quality mobile applications.

Potential (P) Growth Mindset : Demonstrated enthusiasm for learning new technologies and frameworks, with an openness to taking on new challenges and responsibilities. Leadership Potential : Evidence of mentoring junior developers or leading project initiatives, with capacity to grow into a lead developer role.

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. 5+ years of experience in mobile application development, specifically with Flutter and Dart. Strong understanding of best practices in mobile app architecture, design patterns, and performance optimization.

Why Join Us: Innovative Impact : Be part of a team that is shaping the future of AI-driven coaching, making a meaningful impact on personal and professional growth worldwide. Career Growth : Join a fast-growing startup with plenty of opportunities for personal development and career advancement. Creative Freedom : Enjoy the autonomy to experiment, innovate, and push the boundaries of mobile app design and development. Collaborative Culture : Work in a dynamic environment that values creativity, collaboration, and continuous learning. Competitive Compensation : We offer a competitive salary, benefits, and opportunities for professional growth.

title: Analista de Inteligência Artificial
description:
Missão do Cargo

Buscamos um profissional que será responsável por contribuir na concepção, implementação e manutenção de soluções de IA, utilizando metodologias avançadas de análise de dados e aprendizado de máquina, a fim de oferecer insights valiosos e impulsionar a inovação nos produtos e processos do Grupo Pereira.Se interessou e faz sentido para você e para a sua carreira? Veja as principais atividades:• Contribuir com a inovação no Grupo, por meio da análise, desenho, desenvolvimento, teste e implantação da inteligência artificial;• Contribuir com a implementação e manutenção de IA, através da colaboração com as equipes de desenvolvimento e de negócios;• Responsável pela contribuição no desenvolvimento e implementação de algoritmos de aprendizado de máquina, bem como técnicas de IA para solucionar problemas complexos em diversas áreas, tais como, processamento de linguagem natural, visão computacional, recomendação e previsão;• Contribuir para garantia de uma entrega de qualidade, através da avaliação do desempenho e eficácia dos modelos de IA em ambientes de produção;• Promover a disseminação do conhecimento da equipe, fornecendo suporte técnico e orientação em relação a conceitos e práticas de IA;• Responsável pela identificação de soluções e oportunidades de integrações entre os sistemas;• Responsável pera verificação da viabilidade técnica e econômica para implantação da IA;• Responsável pela manutenção da IA, através do monitoramento e análises constantes do funcionamento.O que esperamos do nosso Analista de Inteligência Artificial:• Disponibilidade para atuar no modelo presencial em Campo Grande/MS;• Ensino Superior Completo em Análise de Sistemas, Ciências da Computação, Sistemas da Informação ou em áreas relacionadas à tecnologia.• Conhecimento em linguagem SQL;• Domínio em linguagem Javascript e Python;• Domínio na construção de APIs REST.O nosso propósito é ser um bom lugar para passar a vida, pensando nisso oferecemos:• Plano de Saúde;• Plano Odontológico;• Seguro de Vida;• Refeição no Local;• Vale transporte;• Suporte Social;• Descontos especiais para compras em nossas redes.

description: Principais atividades:Garantir a segurança das atividades realizadas em máquinas e equipamentos;Realizar melhorias de processos, máquinas e equipamentos através da ferramenta Kaizen;Garantir o funcionamento da proteção mecânica das máquinas após a realização de qualquer intervenção;Estar disponível para trabalhar em qualquer turno e data quando for solicitado;Realizar trabalhos de solda com a garantia de eficiência da tarefa, principalmente em meios suspensos;Preencher toda a documentação de saturação de suas horas de trabalho;Participar das campanhas de Segurança, Meio Ambiente e energia. Ao acolher diversas perspectivas, podemos impulsionar a inovação e a criatividade e atender melhor aos nossos clientes.

title: Advogado(a) Tributário Sênior
description:
Se você é uma pessoa dinâmica, resiliente, altamente comprometida com entrega de resultados e busca um ambiente de trabalho humanizado que valoriza inovação, trabalho em equipe e foco no cliente, venha fazer parte do nosso time.

Buscamos

ADVOGADO(A) SÊNIOR

para fazer parte do nosso time do

tributário contencioso .

Será responsável pelas seguintes atividades: Executar, atender e acompanhar demandas jurídicas de média e alta complexidade e adotar estratégias para mitigar riscos e evitar litígios; Analisar a necessidade de documentação fiscal, contábil e contratual para atendimento das demandas jurídicas judiciais e administrativas; Analisar e propor teses para identificação de oportunidades tributárias de recuperação de crédito ou defesa de autuação fiscal; Elaborar peças processuais (petição inicial, recursos, manifestações, requerimentos e demais petições) no âmbito judicial e administrativo; Acompanhar julgamentos judiciais e administrativos e fazer sustentação oral; Gestão do contencioso tributário - administrativo e judicial; Consultoria jurídica e tributária: atendimento às consultas internas e avaliação das alterações normativas; Planejamento tributário: avaliação das oportunidades de redução da carga tributária ou de viabilidade de recuperação de crédito por autorização normativa ou medida judicial; Análise de anistias: avaliação de viabilidade para adesão a Programas de Parcelamento e de concessão de benefício de redução de débitos; Suporte no atendimento às fiscalizações; Formação dos indicadores referentes ao cenário dos processos tributários (ativo e passivo), para monitoramento dos temas e dos valores envolvidos; Conhecimento em renovação e regularização de certidões de regularidade fiscal.

Requisitos: OAB Ativa; Pós-Graduação na área Tributária; Sólida experiência com tributos indiretos (ICMS principalmente); Preferencialmente residir em São Paulo ou Recife; Inglês avançado será considerado um diferencial.

VOCÊ SE IDENTIFICOU? Venha fazer parte da nossa equipe ou encaminhe o link da vaga a quem você acredita que possa se interessar.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
Fully Remote - Looking to Hire ASAP

Job Title:

Senior Full Stack Web Developer (Chrome Extensions & Backend)

Job Description: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Full Stack Web Developer with a strong background in building Google Chrome Extensions and backend development. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in both front-end and back-end technologies and a proven track record of developing high-quality, scalable applications. Key Responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain Google Chrome Extensions. Work on both front-end and back-end development, ensuring seamless integration and functionality. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver robust web solutions. Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability. Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve issues in both Chrome Extensions and web applications. Requirements: Strong experience in full stack web development (JavaScript, HTML, CSS, etc.). Proven experience building Google Chrome Extensions. Expertise in back-end technologies (Node.js, Express, etc.). Familiarity with databases (SQL, NoSQL). title: Analista de contabilidade

Elaborar as demonstrações financeiras e obrigações acessórias exigidas pelo Fisco. Finalizar os balancetes contábeis conforme prazos estipulados em meta. Analisar a contabilização dos registros, afim de verificar se está de acordo com o solicitado.

O que buscamos: Superior completo Ciências Contábeis. Interpretação de Legislação. Interpretação e análise de Balanço. Imprescindível conhecimentos no Sistema Mega.

ANALISTA DE SUPORTE PROTHEUS

title: Deployment Engineer
description:
***Please submit resumes in English***

We are looking for a Deployment Engineer,

a

key highly technical position within our growing company with dynamic and exciting environment.

The deployment engineer is responsible for integration and implementation of RADCOM solution within our customers’ virtual, physical, and cloud-based environments. The engineer will be actively involved with the different aspects of RADCOM solution integration and will work in partnership with multiple departments and functions within the organization.

The engineer shall be viewed by the customer as the Subject Matter Expert for instantiating, configuring, administrating, testing and maintaining the RADCOM solution. Deployment engineer will also be in involved with customer support escalation of operational issues and will work closely with the customer and partners in a dynamic versatile environment with cutting-edge technologies.

Engagements and duties: · Work in partnership with internal resources, such as Project Management, Engineering, Professional Services, Product Management and System Architects to push the integration through its phases. He/She will enable the solution in the lab, troubleshoot any issues during integration and will stay actively involved during the production phase as new features and versions are released. · Take active role in defining and executing test plans by writing test objects and detailed test plan description, followed by hands-on execution of the test cases in a lab environment while documenting all activity and results. · Interact and engage with customers’ personnel handling lab integration, field deployment and operation of RADCOM’s system, as well as end users, to assure optimal usability of the RADCOM solution and the highest level of customer satisfaction. He/she will attend daily/weekly meetings with customers and RADCOM internal resources. · Take active role in MOP planning, writing, testing and execution. · Handle service request and change requests; be involved in tracking and certifying service tickets till resolution · Be involved in user training and coach customer’s users, operations and lab personnel about aspects relating to RADCOM technology, solution components or its infrastructure. · Support escalations and issues diagnosis.

Required qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering Expert level experience with Cloud native technologies. Deep knowledge and Hands on experience on the AWS cloud infrastructure, including CICD processes. Expert level experience in Kubernetes Knowledge in Linux and shell scripting Sound knowledge, understanding and experience in networking and network troubleshooting at all layers Experience with Virtualization environment including VMWare, Open Stack, Public Cloud, HEAT Instantiation, Orchestration. Familiarity and experience with the following technologies and protocols: VoIP, SIP, RTP, Diameter, GTP, IP, DNS, HTTP, GTP Experience with 5G Wireless core and IMS core and RAN Experience with Network Function Virtualization (NFV), Software Defined Networks (SDN) Experience with database and analytics is an advantage

**The position may require occasional travels to the US

title: Sr. Full Stack Engineer-AWS & DevOps
description:
WHO WE ARE: Beyondsoft Consulting, Inc. is a leading technical solutions and consulting partner. We combine emerging technologies and proven methodologies to tailor elegant solutions that solve complex challenges and empower our customers to accelerate their business goals. For the past 25+ years we have been providing a broad range of high-quality IT services, including staff augmentation, business process outsourcing, custom software solutions, test automation, digital enablement, and other software engineering and digital transformation services.

WHAT WE’RE ABOUT: We believe that collaboration, transparency, and accountability are the values that guide our business, our delivery, and our brand. Everyone has something to bring to the table, and we believe in working together with our peers and clients to leverage the best of one another in everything we do. When we proactively collaborate, business decisions become easier, innovation is greater, and outcomes are better.

POSITION SUMMARY: We are seeking a Senior Full Stack Engineer to design, develop, and maintain scalable, cloud-native applications within a distributed computing environment. This role requires deep expertise in AWS services, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure as code, along with strong proficiency in React, Node.js, Python, and Java for building full-stack solutions. The ideal candidate will collaborate cross-functionally to deliver high-quality, resilient software while leveraging AWS CDK, Lambda, API Gateway, Fargate, and other cloud-native technologies. If you thrive in agile environments and enjoy solving complex challenges in cloud and DevOps-driven architectures, this is the perfect opportunity to make an impact.

WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING: • Design (design patterns, reliability, and scaling) and maintenance of new and existing systems • Develop scalable solutions integrated to an existing propriety platform, working within the tech stack constraints already defined • Design and build innovative products in a large distributed computing environment • Collaborate with cross-disciplinary customers and tech partners to conceive, design, and bring innovative products and services to market

MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS: 5+ years in a software development role 3+ years development experience in environments implementing CI/CD, Infrastructure as code 3+ years experience developing applications in AWS (see specific services below) Demonstrated ability to work in an agile environment to deliver high-quality software Front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript Front-end development with Material UI X components Front-end development within JavaScript frameworks such as ReactJS, NodeJS Scalable backend services and APIs using Java, NodeJS, Python Native AWS services including (but not limited to) CDK/CloudFormation, Cloudwatch, Lambda, Fargate, API-Gateway, CloudFront, Cognito, Open Search DynamoDB, RDS, S3, SQS, SNS) Apache Airflow proficiency Proficiency in Brazilian Portuguese and English B2+ or higher Valid Brazilian Work Permit

Beyondsoft is committed to maintaining a fair and secure hiring process. To prevent identity fraud, all candidates must provide

valid government-issued identification in person

and any necessary documentation to verify their identity before employment is offered. Any attempt to misrepresent personal information, qualifications, or identity will result in immediate disqualification from the hiring process. By applying for this position, you acknowledge and agree to comply with our verification procedures.

Beyondsoft provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type with regards to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, and the full employee lifecycle up through and including termination.

Responsabilidades e atribuições

Atuar no desenvolvimento de soluções robustas; Entender fluxos ponta a ponta envolvendo vários sistemas/tecnologias; Trabalhar com mindset de produto através de processos e entregas ágeis; Implementar as melhores práticas de código e design patterns, orientação a objetos e otimização de performance; Desenvolver código limpo, testável e de fácil manutenção; Contribuir com processo de desenvolvimento de software; Participar do processo de code review, garantindo qualidade e consistência do código; Criar novos recursos e funcionalidades dentro do sistema ou em ferramentas auxiliares; Realizar profiling e depuração de rotinas visando encontrar e mitigar problemas de desempenho; Executar manutenção corretiva, evolutiva e adaptativa em código e rotinas pré-existentes; Gerar documentação técnica que será usada como base para o documentador gerar manuais/helps para usuários finais do que foi criado/modificado com qualidade e assertividade.

Requisitos e qualificações

Conhecimento em tecnologias Web (HTML5, CSS, Javascript); Conhecimento em Front End (Angular ou React ou Vue.js); Conhecimento avançado em Java JEE (Servlets, Filters, EJB, JSP, JTA); Conhecimento avançado em plataforma Java; Conhecimento avançado em Banco de Dados relacionais (SQL, triggers, procedures, tunning, cache); Conhecimentos em Rest, SOAP, GraphQL, Protocolo HTTP, Rest Services; Conhecimento avançado em programação orientada a objetos; Conhecimento em UML e Engenharia de Software; Conhecimento e experiência com padrões de projeto mais utilizados; Conhecimento avançado em programação concorrente e distribuída (Multi-thread e aplicações em rede); Conhecimento avançado em ferramentas de versionamento/controle de código (GIT, SVN).

Localidade | Atuação

Uberlândia/MG: Presencial São Paulo/SP: Híbrido (3vz na semana no escritório) Demais localidades: Remoto

Informações adicionais

Benefícios que vão além da Jornada Sankher

Na Sankhya, valorizamos a individualidade e acreditamos em proporcionar benefícios que vão além do básico, promovendo a liberdade e o equilíbrio entre vida pessoal e profissional. Nosso objetivo é oferecer todo o apoio necessário para que você se sinta bem e satisfeito em todas as áreas da sua vida.

Horário Flexível: Adapte sua rotina de trabalho para equilibrar melhor suas responsabilidades pessoais e profissionais. Licença Maternidade e Paternidade Estendida: Mais tempo para estar presente nos primeiros momentos da vida do seu bebê. Kit Baby Sankher: Um kit especial para dar as boas-vindas ao novo membro da família. ⚖️ Assistência Jurídica: Apoio jurídico para questões pessoais e profissionais. Auxílio Creche: Contribuição para despesas com creche. Cuidados com a Saúde: Plano de saúde com ampla cobertura, telemedicina gratuita e acesso a apps especialistas para cuidar do que mais importa – você. Plano Odontológico: Cobertura odontológica para você e sua família. Day OFF no Aniversário: Um dia de folga para celebrar seu aniversário. Empréstimo Consignado: Empréstimos com condições especiais. ️ Auxílio vida saudável: Parceria com apps de saúde com acesso a academias e bem estar. Indicação de Talentos e Clientes Premiadas: Recompensas por indicações bem-sucedidas. Massoterapia no Escritório: Sessões de massagem para relaxar e aliviar o estresse. Participação nos Lucros e Resultados (PLR): Participação nos resultados financeiros da empresa. Seguro de Vida: Proteção financeira para você e sua família. Vale Alimentação/Refeição iFood: Opções de alimentação flexíveis. Vale Transporte: Auxílio para deslocamento. Equipamentos Fornecidos pela Empresa: Ferramentas de trabalho de qualidade.

Desenvolvimento e Evolução

Um dos nossos valores fundamentais é o desenvolvimento contínuo. Queremos que todos os nossos colaboradores estejam sempre aprendendo, crescendo e se desenvolvendo, pois nossa empresa está em constante evolução.

Universidade Corporativa Sankhya: Acesso a uma vasta gama de cursos e treinamentos. Plano de Performance e Desenvolvimento Individual: Plano personalizado para seu crescimento profissional. Touchpoints de Evolução com a Liderança: Encontros regulares com líderes para discutir seu progresso e desenvolvimento. Cursos Online 100% Custeados pela Empresa: Aprendizado contínuo sem custo para você. Auxílio Idiomas: Suporte para aprendizado de novas línguas. Auxílio Graduação e Pós-Graduação: Incentivo para avançar em sua formação acadêmica. ✅ Auxílio Certificações: Apoio para obtenção de certificações profissionais. Workshops de Evolução: Sessões de desenvolvimento intensivo. ‍♀️ Palestras Relacionadas à Qualidade de Vida: Encontros sobre saúde e bem-estar. Plataforma de Gamificação: Pontuações e recompensas para incentivar seu desenvolvimento. Squads e Tribos de Trabalho para Inovações: Equipes focadas em inovação e melhorias contínuas.

Junte-se a nós na Sankhya e seja protagonista da sua própria evolução. Aqui, seu crescimento é nossa prioridade.

E MAIS IMPORTANTE AINDA: ‍Todas as nossas vagas estão disponíveis para pessoas com deficiência!

Está esperando o que para fazer parte de nosso time? #VemserSankhya!

title: Desenvolvedor(a) Power BI SR
description:
Na Stefanini, acreditamos no poder da colaboração. Co-criamos soluções inovadoras em parceria com nossos clientes, combinando tecnologia de ponta, inteligência artificial e a criatividade humana. Estamos na vanguarda da resolução de problemas de negócios, proporcionando impacto real em escala global.

Ao se juntar à Stefanini, você se torna parte de uma jornada global de transformação. Estamos empenhados em criar impacto positivo não apenas nos negócios, mas também na vida de nossos colaboradores. Se você procura uma oportunidade de crescimento profissional em uma empresa que valoriza inovação, respeito, autonomia e parceria, você encontra aqui!

Junte-se a nós e seja parte da mudança!

Requisitos: Inglês Avançado ou Fluente; Integração de Dados: integrar dados do DataLake em ferramentas do Power BI (PBI) para criar um modelo de dados unificado; Projetar e desenvolver relatórios e dashboards interativos utilizando ferramentas do PBI para visualizar dados de forma eficaz; Conhecimento em limpar, transformar e preparar dados para análise; Analisar fórmulas do Data Analysis Expressions (DAX) para compreender o desempenho; Garantir o desempenho dos relatórios do PBI otimizando modelos de dados e consultas; Compartilhar e colaborar em dashboards do PBI com stakeholders em toda a organização; Garantir a segurança dos dados, incluindo segurança em nível de linha (row-level security) para controlar o acesso aos dados; Fornecer treinamento e suporte aos usuários sobre como interagir e interpretar os dashboards; Melhoria Contínua: manter-se atualizado com as atualizações e novos recursos do PBI.

Informações adicionais: Contratação CLT ou PJ Atuação remota

title: React Native Developer
description:
React Native Developer (Mid/Senior) – AI Company

About FullPond At FullPond, we’re all about transforming the way businesses discover and collaborate with incredible remote talent. We specialize in connecting U.S. companies with highly skilled, English-proficient professionals from Latin America and the Philippines—amazing individuals like you who bring passion and expertise to everything you do. Ready to join us? Let’s find the next superstar talent together and take our clients’ teams to the next level!

Position Summary We are seeking an experienced React Native Developer to join an AI-focused company. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality mobile applications for both iOS and Android. You will collaborate with designers, product managers, and backend engineers to create seamless user experiences.

Key Responsibilities Develop and maintain mobile applications using React Native. Work closely with designers and backend developers to ensure smooth integration. Optimize applications for performance, scalability, and responsiveness. Troubleshoot and resolve issues to ensure a seamless user experience.

Qualifications

Experience: 4+ years of professional experience in mobile development. Strong proficiency in React Native, JavaScript, and TypeScript. Experience integrating third-party APIs and libraries. Familiarity with mobile performance optimization techniques. Knowledge of state management libraries such as Redux or Context API. Experience with CI/CD processes and version control systems like Git. Previous experience working remotely with distributed teams is a plus.

Skills: Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail. Exceptional communication skills, both written and verbal, in English. Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team. Proactive mindset with a passion for building great mobile experiences.

What We Offer Fully remote Position! Work from any place in the world! Take your local Holidays: We understand how important it is to take time with your family and loved ones on important days. Paid vacation Professional Growth: Opportunities for training and development in a fast-growing company. Compensation: Competitive salary and performance-based incentives. Impact: Be part of a mission-driven organization that empowers professionals around the globe!

title: Quality Assurance Analyst
description:
Company Description Metrobi is a delivery fulfillment platform designed specifically to support local businesses. We help these businesses manage their deliveries efficiently by connecting them with skilled drivers tailored to meet their delivery needs. Additionally, we provide essential tools for logistical, financial, and marketing support, empowering local food and beverage makers to expand their businesses

Role of the QA Team: Our QA team is crucial in ensuring the quality of our platform. There are two main tasks you will focus on: Bug Analysis:

Understand and diagnose bugs that make it into production. This requires a solid understanding of our product and excellent problem-solving skills. Feature Verification:

Manually check whether new features work as intended. This involves strong analytical skills to assess user experience and interface design.

While specific technical skills like SQL, Git, reading Python code, and creating automated tests are beneficial, they are not required.

﻿We're looking for candidates with strong English, product analysis skills, and excellent communication. This is a full-time position offering $600+/month.

title: Flutter Developer
description:
Job Title: Senior Frontend Developer (Flutter)

Location:

Remote (open to candidates worldwide)Type:

Full-TimeCompensation:

Competitive SalaryCompany:

Confidential Client (AI Talent Development Software Company)How to Apply:If you are a passionate Senior Flutter Developer looking to join an innovative AI startup and make a difference, we want to hear from you! Please send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter to



with "Senior Flutter Developer Application" in the subject line.What if your Flutter development skills could help create cutting-edge applications that shape the future of AI-driven talent development? If you're ready to take on a leadership role in an innovative team dedicated to redefining personal growth and professional coaching, this is your opportunity!About Us:Our confidential client is an innovative Artificial Intelligence (AI) company, focused on revolutionizing personal and professional development through advanced AI-driven coaching, simulation, and habit development technology. Utilizing their proprietary Generative Coaching Transformer (“GCT”), Generative Simulation Trainer (“GST”), and Generative Habit Developer (“GHD”) they empower individuals, teams, and organizations of any size, worldwide, to enhance leadership, optimize performance, and foster a culture of continuous learning. Join a pioneering team dedicated to transforming how people learn, grow, and thrive.Founder / CEO:Fueled by a relentless passion for service, the company's founder aims to revolutionize professional coaching, making it accessible and inclusive for every team member, regardless of role or position. A seasoned entrepreneur with decades of experience in launching and revitalizing businesses, the founder has created a transformative AI-driven platform. This cutting-edge solution seamlessly integrates organizational fitness with AI, delivering tailored coaching at scale.As a multifaceted leader, our founder excels as an entrepreneur, investor, and C-level executive, with a proven record of accomplishment of transforming visionary ideas into high-growth, value-driven organizations. A respected thought leader in the social sciences, the founder's academic publications showcase a deep understanding of human behavior in complex systems. With a talent for building and revitalizing teams, the founder has transformed dozens of businesses across 21 U.S. states, consistently turning underperforming teams into high-achievers and generating over $4.2 billion in shareholder equity through two successful healthcare startups.Role Overview:As a Senior Flutter Developer, you will play a critical role in designing and implementing mobile applications that leverage AI-driven capabilities. You will lead the development team, ensuring best practices in coding, architecture, and performance optimization while collaborating across various teams to drive innovation and quality in our applications.About PHHSX: Our Core ValuesOur organization operates under the guiding principles of PHHSX, which stands for:P

assion: A commitment to our mission of empowering individuals and teams to achieve their best.H

umble: A willingness to accept feedback and learn from experiences, demonstrating ongoing growth.H

ungry: An eagerness to continuously improve skills and contributions, pushing past limitations.S

mart (People Smart): The capacity to understand and manage our emotions and those of others.X

-Factor: Commitment to executing projects with excellence and without excuses.SCCKEPPP Framework: Ensuring Functional FitThe SCCKEPPP framework is designed to ensure that we align the right talent with the right roles effectively and accurately. It includes the following components:Skills

: Core technical and soft skills required for success in the role.Circumstances

: Personal and external life circumstances that could influence work success.Conditions

: Formal prerequisites and qualities necessary for the job.Knowledge

: Required knowledge areas critical for performance in the role.Experience

: Type and depth of experience needed for the position.Past Performance

: Achievements or performance metrics indicating excellence in similar roles.Potential

: Traits indicating future growth and adaptability.The “What” Pillar: Ensure a Functional Match (“Be SCCKEPPP-tical”)Skills (S)Flutter Development

: Expert in building responsive and performant applications using Flutter and Dart.State Management

: Proficient with patterns like BLoC, Provider, or Riverpod for state management.Cross-Platform Expertise

: Strong experience with mobile development principles for both iOS and Android platforms.Code Optimization

: Ability to write clean, maintainable, and scalable code while optimizing performance.Collaboration Tools

: Familiarity with version control systems like Git and project management using tools like Jira or Trello.User Interface Design

: Experience in designing intuitive UI/UX consistent with the client’s branding.Circumstances (C)Personal Stability

: A stable home environment conducive to remote work.Career Stage

: Ideal candidates are seasoned professionals ready to guide and mentor junior developers.Time Flexibility

: Ability to work across different time zones, accommodating collaborative sessions.Conditions (C)Mandatory Education

: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.Experience Requirement

: 5+ years in mobile application development, specifically with Flutter and Dart.Remote Work Capability

: Comfort working independently in a remote setting with effective time management.Knowledge (K)Industry Knowledge

: Understanding of the mobile app development lifecycle and best practices for Flutter development.AI Technologies

: Familiarity with AI-driven applications and concepts, especially in coaching and performance-enhancing contexts.Regulatory Knowledge

: Awareness of compliance standards like GDPR that influence application design and functionality.Experience (E)Professional Background

: Proven experience in developing and launching successful mobile applications using Flutter, with a robust portfolio highlighting past projects.Quantifiable Experience

: Evidence of working on high-impact projects that improved user engagement and performance metrics.Past Performance (PP)Achievements

: Examples of successful application features developed that led to high user satisfaction and retention rates.Collaboration Success

: Recognized contributions to agile development teams that resulted in the timely delivery of quality mobile applications.Potential (P)Growth Mindset

: Demonstrated enthusiasm for learning new technologies and frameworks, with an openness to taking on new challenges and responsibilities.Leadership Potential

: Evidence of mentoring junior developers or leading project initiatives, with capacity to grow into a lead developer role.Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.5+ years of experience in mobile application development, specifically with Flutter and Dart.Strong understanding of best practices in mobile app architecture, design patterns, and performance optimization.Why Join Us:Innovative Impact

: Be part of a team that is shaping the future of AI-driven coaching, making a meaningful impact on personal and professional growth worldwide.Career Growth

: Join a fast-growing startup with plenty of opportunities for personal development and career advancement.Creative Freedom

: Enjoy the autonomy to experiment, innovate, and push the boundaries of mobile app design and development.Collaborative Culture

: Work in a dynamic environment that values creativity, collaboration, and continuous learning.Competitive Compensation

: We offer a competitive salary, benefits, and opportunities for professional growth.

title: Data Engineer
description:
About Flatiron is a global remote software development company with engineers located around the world. We unite experts from diverse backgrounds and experiences in a collaborative culture to deliver exceptional products and services for our clients. As a forward-thinking software engineering company, we provide industry-leading solutions to complex problems in both the US and the UK. Operating in a fast-paced, agile environment, we specialize in software consulting for our clients. We offer a stimulating and rewarding environment for our team members. We value innovation, continuous learning, and professional growth, and we strive to create a workplace where everyone can thrive. Join us at Flatiron and be a part of a team that is shaping the future of software development.

Job Summary This is a full-time fully remote working opportunity where you will be working as part of a Scrum team which requires working closely with other software engineers, stakeholders and contributors on the project. Working with respect to the US timezone is a requirement for the position. Attending meetings, being actively involved in the decision making process and collaborating with all of these stakeholders are essential parts of this position.

Responsibilities Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines using

Apache Airflow . Build and optimize data infrastructure to support machine learning and AI models. Collaborate with data scientists and AI engineers to understand data needs and provide optimized data solutions. Develop data models and perform data cleansing, validation, and transformation. Ensure data quality and consistency across various platforms and systems. Automate data ingestion, processing, and analysis workflows. Monitor and improve the performance, scalability, and reliability of data pipelines. Integrate AI-driven insights into data infrastructure to enhance business decision-making. Implement security and data governance best practices. Document data architecture and processes to support future development and troubleshooting.

Minimum Qualifications Advanced level of written and oral English proficiency 4+ years of experience as a Data Engineer or similar role. Experience working with

AI and machine learning models . Strong proficiency with

Apache Airflow

for workflow orchestration. Expertise in Python and SQL for data processing and analysis. Experience with cloud platforms such as

AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure . Familiarity with database technology such as MySQL, Oracle, or MongoDB Understanding of Object Oriented Programming principles Understanding of Agile development principles

Benefits Yearly Office Allowance Budget Macbook Purchase Support Wellbeing Support

If you are a good fit for the position, please apply through . We only accept CVs that are in English.

Flatiron has a zero tolerance to discrimination policy. In this regard, during the course of the evaluation of your job application and all your employment relation, if any, all discriminatory factors such as race, sex, sexual orientation, social gender definitions/roles, color, national or social background, ethnicity, religion, age, disablement, political opinion or any status that is protected under law shall be disregarded.

title: Técnico de Seguros Sr. (Seguro Garantia)
description:
Sobre a Lockton

Fundada há mais de 50 anos por Jack Lockton em Kansas City, a Lockton desenvolveu uma marca internacionalmente reconhecida pela qualidade e eficiência nos serviços que oferecemos. Graças a lealdade de nossos clientes, que nos permitiu crescer expressivamente nos últimos anos, a Lockton hoje está entre as maiores corretoras de seguro do mundo, conquistando a taxa de crescimento orgânico mais rápida do mercado de corretoras

Responsabilidades e Atribuições: Responsável pela colocação do risco do segmento de Garantia (tradicional, judicial e fiança locatícia) de seguros novos, renovações e endossos. Acompanhará todo o processo, desde o cadastro do cliente até a emissão da apólice. Interface com a área comercial para realizar suporte técnico, captar informações necessárias para colocação do risco e devolução da proposta. Eventualmente participará de reunião com clientes e comerciais. Imputará informações nos sistemas internos.

Requisitos e Qualificações: Conhecimento em seguro Garantia Estruturada, Tradicional, Judicial. Experiência em seguradora ou corretora. .

title: Senior C/C++ engineer with Linux
description:
Project Description:

Founded in 1984, our client is one of the world's leading provider of lithography systems for the semiconductor industry, manufacturing complex machines that are critical to the production of integrated circuits or chips.The client has its R&D and manufacturing operations in The Netherlands. Luxoft is currently searching to augment the Development & Engineering Department with a talented software engineer to design and implement embedded software for systems among the highest precision ever produced in the world.The collaboration with our client has reached the 10 years threshold and we have more than 300 talented colleagues working alongside the client.Responsibilities:As a software engineer, you will be working on Linux server applications for metrology components and on complex algorithms application software.You will be working with electrical engineers, mechatronic engineers and system engineers to define the software requirements.After your SW design is approved you are responsible for implementing the design in Python & C for new modules. Auto and unit testers are written in Python.During the testing phase, you will collect the necessary data so you can write a test report. This test report is then reviewed and when it is approved your software will be released.The development environment is Red Hat Linux, execution environment is Wind River Linux. title: Microsoft C# .NET Developer / Programmer
description:
Company Description DataSelf Corp simplifies and amplifies BI with its own ETL+ and data warehousing plus Tableau, Power BI, Excel, and other Microsoft BI technologies such as Fabric, Data Lake, and Synapse. We also provide business intelligence expertise and comprehensive out-of-the-box solutions with over 8,000 report, dashboard, and KPI templates for popular mid-market business applications such as ERP, CRM, POS, and Ecommerce (e.g., Acumatica, BigCommerce, HubSpot, Infor CRM/ERP, Magento, Microsoft Dynamics 365 BC / CRM / GP / F&O, NetSuite, Quickbooks, Sage 100, Sage 300, Sage 500, Sage CRM, Sage CRE, Sage Intacct, Sage X3, Salesforce, SAP Business One, SellerCloud, Shopify). DataSelf has been in business since 2005 and is headquartered in Silicon Valley / California, with a presence in over twelve US states, Brazil, and Israel. Our solutions combine technology, art, and communications to create a unique, industry-leading, business intelligence platform. We’re looking for talented individuals who care about the people behind a business, empowering them with solutions that bring success and satisfaction. DataSelf offers competitive compensation, significant professional growth, a dynamic work environment, flexible vacation time, and a growing team of motivated, collaborative, and fun data heroes.

Role Description This is a full-time remote role for a Microsoft Developer with C#, .NET, MS SQL Server. As a Microsoft Developer / Programmer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining DataSelf ETL+ software applications using C#, .NET, and MS SQL Server. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design solutions, and implement high-quality code. This is an opportunity to join a dynamic team and contribute to developing cutting-edge business intelligence solutions.

Qualifications Our ETL+ product development team is in Brazil. Located in Florianopolis, Recife, or vicinities is a plus. Fluent Portuguese is a must, and English fluency is a plus. Your available working capacity must align with BRT business hours. 10+ years’ experience with C# and the .NET framework Experience with Microsoft SQL Server and T-SQL Strong knowledge of object-oriented programming principles Preferably experience with web development technologies such as REST API and JavaScript Preferably experience with development tools such as Git, Snyk, and AI/ChatGPT Understanding of software development methodologies and best practices Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills Strong communication and collaboration abilities Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field Microsoft certifications in C#, MS SQL Server, and .NET are a plus Note: This job description is intended to provide a general overview of the position and does not represent a comprehensive list of all responsibilities and requirements.

description:
Estamos contratando! Vaga para Arquiteto DevOps na Softtek!

Se você é apaixonado por tecnologia, segurança e automação, essa oportunidade é para você! Estamos em busca de um

Cloud Skills: ✔ Experiência em arquitetura e design de soluções seguras na AWS, Azure ou Google Cloud (GCP). ✔ Proficiência em serviços Cloud Nativos como EC2, S3, Lambda (AWS) e equivalentes em Azure e GCP. ✔ Segurança em nuvem, incluindo IAM, criptografia, VPNs, redes seguras e firewalls de aplicação. ✔ Estratégia Multi-cloud e Hybrid Cloud. ✔ Conhecimento em bancos de dados gerenciados na nuvem (RDS, DynamoDB, CosmosDB). ✔ Experiência com redes e conectividade na nuvem (VPC, subnets, gateways, VPNs). ✔ Otimização de custos na nuvem usando estratégias como Auto Scaling e Reserved Instances. ✔ Automação na nuvem com scripts e ferramentas IaC (Python, Shell, Terraform). ✔ Implementação e gerenciamento de políticas de controle de acesso em nuvem (AWS IAM, Azure AD, GCP IAM). ✔ Planejamento de resiliência e recuperação de desastres.

title: Major Incident & Problem Manageer
description:
Executing the Major Incident Management process tasks in alignment with established processes. Managing outages, performing impact assessments, coordinating resolution, driving incident calls, raising (both technical and hierarchic), communicating (including senior management), and coordinating all incident support activities. Collection, triage (classification and prioritization), and raise incidents to technical teams as necessary. This includes actively engaging other IT support groups to drive service restoration as soon as possible, minimize business impact, and meet KPI targets that are assigned by business clients. Business Partner management. Global Business and technology contacts. Drive continual service improvement across the Incident management department and work with our partners to deliver improvements across people, processes, and technology to increase IT services' stability and availability. Works across 247 shifts on the weekend in a global operational team, whose primary function is to drive all Critical incidents until resolved. Please find below the roles and responsibilities of a MIM associate

: - To open and initiate the bridge to discuss the issue within 05 minutes, and within 15 minutes, open communication to be published. To understand the issue from a business perspective and to engage the required / concerned teams. To follow the MIM checklist and publish the communication with proper validation. To ascertain the situation and to prioritize the issue based on business impact To check if all the required information is updated on the ticketing tool and all supporting documents in the MIM SharePoint. To communicate the status update/situation to stakeholders To ensure the SLAs are met by the resolver teams To ensure the changes are being check during the HIGH & MI. To ensure RCA / Problem tickets are provided by the resolver team Ensure there is no miss in the process by using the MIM Checklist. observation to be bee captured during the P1 situation with proper timelines update on the situation. Must maintain that no escalation happens during the P1 issue. Required participants are being called out and engaged during the Major & High Major situation. To ensure the proper resolution is provided before closing the bridge call and maintain proper information has been captured. Ensure Dashboard is used during High Major and Major incident incidents. Maintain proper shift handover to another incident manager. Maintain End-to-end ownership of Major incidents.

title: Data Engineer
description:
About Flatiron is a global remote software development company with engineers located around the world. We unite experts from diverse backgrounds and experiences in a collaborative culture to deliver exceptional products and services for our clients. As a forward-thinking software engineering company, we provide industry-leading solutions to complex problems in both the US and the UK. Operating in a fast-paced, agile environment, we specialize in software consulting for our clients. We offer a stimulating and rewarding environment for our team members. We value innovation, continuous learning, and professional growth, and we strive to create a workplace where everyone can thrive. Join us at Flatiron and be a part of a team that is shaping the future of software development.

Job Summary This is a full-time fully remote working opportunity where you will be working as part of a Scrum team which requires working closely with other software engineers, stakeholders and contributors on the project. Working with respect to the US timezone is a requirement for the position. Attending meetings, being actively involved in the decision making process and collaborating with all of these stakeholders are essential parts of this position.

Responsibilities Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines using

Apache Airflow . Build and optimize data infrastructure to support machine learning and AI models. Collaborate with data scientists and AI engineers to understand data needs and provide optimized data solutions. Develop data models and perform data cleansing, validation, and transformation. Ensure data quality and consistency across various platforms and systems. Automate data ingestion, processing, and analysis workflows. Monitor and improve the performance, scalability, and reliability of data pipelines. Integrate AI-driven insights into data infrastructure to enhance business decision-making. Implement security and data governance best practices. Document data architecture and processes to support future development and troubleshooting.

Minimum Qualifications Advanced level of written and oral English proficiency 4+ years of experience as a Data Engineer or similar role. Experience working with

AI and machine learning models . Strong proficiency with

Apache Airflow

for workflow orchestration. Expertise in Python and SQL for data processing and analysis. Experience with cloud platforms such as

AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure . Familiarity with database technology such as MySQL, Oracle, or MongoDB Understanding of Object Oriented Programming principles Understanding of Agile development principles

Benefits Yearly Office Allowance Budget Macbook Purchase Support Wellbeing Support

If you are a good fit for the position, please apply through . We only accept CVs that are in English.

Flatiron has a zero tolerance to discrimination policy. In this regard, during the course of the evaluation of your job application and all your employment relation, if any, all discriminatory factors such as race, sex, sexual orientation, social gender definitions/roles, color, national or social background, ethnicity, religion, age, disablement, political opinion or any status that is protected under law shall be disregarded.

O que buscamos: Profissional que atue com

Desenvolvimento Backend - ID 122586 , para implementar e manter aplicações utilizando Python e e gerenciar aplicações em Cloud AWS.

Responsabilidades: Projetar, implementar e manter aplicações backend utilizando Java Spring Boot e Python; Criar e consumir REST APIs seguindo boas práticas de design, segurança e escalabilidade; Desenvolver e sustentar soluções baseadas em microserviços e aplicações distribuídas, garantindo alta disponibilidade e baixa latência; Integrar e gerenciar fluxos de mensagens utilizando serviços como Kafka, SQS e SNS; Construir e gerenciar aplicações em Cloud AWS, utilizando serviços como RDS MySQL, DynamoDB, Lambda, ECS Fargate, ElasticCache Redis, API Gateway, EventBridge, Secrets Manager e KMS; Implementar soluções otimizadas e seguras para atender a demandas de grande escala e processamento de dados; Trabalhar com Docker para containerização e utilizar Kubernetes para orquestração e gestão de ambientes distribuídos; Escrever e manter testes unitários para garantir a confiabilidade do código e contribuir para a implementação de boas práticas de qualidade e cobertura de testes; Configurar, monitorar e manter pipelines de CI/CD utilizando ferramentas como CodeCommit, CodePipeline e CodeBuild, automatizando processos de integração, teste e entrega contínua; Colaborar em equipes ágeis aplicando conceitos de Scrum, Kanban ou outras metodologias ágeis; Promover a cultura DevOps, contribuindo para a automação, integração e entrega contínuas; Realizar manutenção evolutiva e corretiva em sistemas existentes, propondo melhorias para aumentar a eficiência e reduzir a complexidade; Monitorar o desempenho de aplicações e implementar melhorias proativas.

Requisitos e Qualificações: Java SpringBoot; Python; Experiência na identificação e resolução de problemas de

performance e disponibilidade

no backend, incluindo o tratamento de

rajadas de requisições

(throttling, rate limiting, caching, etc.). Conhecimento em

balanceamento de carga

em ambientes com múltiplas

PODs , garantindo escalabilidade e distribuição eficiente do tráfego. Implementação de

estratégias de observabilidade , utilizando ferramentas como

Datadog

e

Splunk

para monitoramento, logging e tracing. Aplicação de

estratégias de resiliência de código , como

Resilience4j , para lidar com falhas e garantir a estabilidade dos serviços. AWS (RDS MySQL e DynamoDB, AWS Lambda utilizando Python, ECS Fargate, ElasticCache Redis, API Gateway, EventBridge, Secrets Manager, KMS); Conhecimento em REST APIs; Docker; Kubernetes; Serviço de Mensageria: Kafka, SQS, SNS;

Descrição comportamental: Procuramos uma pessoa que: Goste de trabalhar em equipe e seja

colaborativa

em suas atribuições; Tenha

coragem

para se desafiar e ir além, abraçando novas oportunidades de crescimento; Transforme ideias em

soluções criativas

e busque qualidade em toda sua rotina; Tenha habilidades de

resolução de problemas ; Possua habilidade e se sinta confortável para trabalhar de forma independente e

gerenciar o próprio tempo ; Tenha interesse em lidar com situações adversas e

inovadoras

no âmbito tecnológico.

Big enough to deliver – small enough to care. #VempraGFT #VamosVoarJuntos #ProudToBeGFT

68/99.
